Still intrigued, Jafit slid the cake she was eying closer so she could nibble away at it as she thought, it was so sweet of Dr Hinamizawa to not think ill of her for eating during their meeting.
"A supplement?" asked Jafit between a mouthful of cake whilst using a finger to coax a rogue crumb back between her lips.
"Something like that, yes" continued the doctor "at Yeng we have a whole division committed to wellbeing and health and their latest discovery is a universal supplement that, upon consumption, allocates itself to fill any gaps the body may have on a vitamin or mineral level due to poor diet". Hinamizawa looked at her colleague all knowingly but picked up on Jafit's confusion as her chewing slowed leaving a look of bemusement in its wake.
"Sorry, that's the explanation I was given and it's not all that simple" the doctor laughed innocently.
Jafit laughed as well, although she wasn't entirely sure why. At this particular moment she felt comfortable talking to the doctor and was looking forward to knowing how she might be able to help with her project.

"Let me start again" declared Hinamizawa, clearing her throat "basically what we have is a substance that can keep people healthy, regardless of their diet, and we would like you to help us by implementing it into recipes and seeing how it reacts when used in food"
"So you want me to add this to my food when I cook, yes?" asked Jafit, still seeking clarification as she was still confused as to what was being asked of her.
"Exactly that my dear, all we ask is that you are open to have me drop by every so often and check in on how you're getting on" smiled Hinamizawa.
"Well I think that would be possible to do" nodded Jafit, sliding her cake out of the way again "when would you like me to start?"
"You can start immediately if you wish" replied the doctor, leaning under the desk they were sat at and producing a case that Jafit had not realised she had before "there are a load of samples for you here, please feel free to use them all if you can"
"Oh, well thank you very much. I do look forward to trying this 'supplement' out with my food" replied Jafit, taking the box and sitting it to one side to take with her later after classes.
"I'm glad to hear you so enthusiastic about this project, I hope we can get some wonderful results by working together" beamed Hinamizawa, extending a hand to the Spaniard "I'll be in touch so we can organise a meeting to gather your initial thoughts and feelings on the matter." Hinamizawa grasped the younger woman's hand and shook it briskly before turning on her heels and marching back out of the classroom without another word.

Slightly stunned by the interaction, Jafit stood looking at where Hinamizawa had once been and then glanced down at the box of sachets under her desk.
Although she wasn't entirely sure what she had agreed to, Jafit could not help but feel excited at being part of such an obviously important project.

*****************

"Yes, I've just been to see Miss Gamor and have left the package with her. She seems compliant enough and willing to help us". A wry smile cracked across the doctors lips as she spoke.
Whoever was on the line seemed pleased as well but then said something that nearly stopped Hinamizawa in her tracks. Rather awkwardly, she quickened her pace towards an empty classroom, slid herself round the door and closed it firmly behind her.
"No she does not know what it REALLY is" hissed the black haired doctor "who do you think I am? Of course I didn't tell her she's testing a highly experimental weight and metabolism enhancement drug!" Hinamizawa was quite angry at this point, spots of spittle had sprayed her phone and a vein was angrily pulsing in her left temple.
"As far as Gamor is concerned she's helping us test a vitamin and mineral supplement for general health" anger subsiding slight, Hinamizawa rubbed her eyebrows to vent her aggression as she listened to her contacts response.
"Yes I will be keeping tabs on the situation and keep records of Gamor's progress with the substance" anger eased, the doctor began to pace to stretch her legs as she spoke
"Thank you for your ongoing trust in my abilities" snapped the doctor sarcastically "yes, goodbye, bye"
Angrily stabbing at the end call button with her finger, Hinamizawa put her phone away and exited the room she had hidden herself into, striding away at a great pace.

She must have just wandered in, staff was practically non-existent at this hour.

         Angela loudly cleared her throat and the woman quickly swiveled around, revealing a stuffed pot belly hanging out of unzipped, unbuckled pants and an embarrassed face with cheese and slight barbeque sauce residue around the mouth. However, to Angela's surprise, this was not a student. She was clearly a faculty member.

         Angela, sternly with her hands on her hips asked, "Who are you, and what are you doing eating my macaroni and cheese?"

         Clearly flustered, the woman responded, "Hi! Uh, I'm Jafit Gamor, I'm the, uh, cooking teacher. I'm surprised we haven't met before, are you the chef here?"

         "My official title is 'head of kitchen' but I guess. Again, why are you eating my macaroni and cheese?"

         "I'm really really sorry, uh, I didn't catch your name?"

         "Angela."

         "Angela. I'm sorry Angela. I came down here because I... er, one of my students had the most HEAVENLY burger they've ever eaten and they wanted me to come ask for a recipe, but the macaroni just looked so delicious! Ha. I apologise again. If there's anything I can do to make it right I'll do it." Nice save Jafit. Wouldn't want the nice kitchen lady to think you're anything less than a sophisticated, independent woman, huh?

         Angela took her hands off her hips and sighed. "Don't worry about it. It would have been a problem if you were a student but since you're faculty I'll let it slide this time. But if I see you back here again with your face in my food like a pig with a trough, I'm talking to Polluck. Is that clear, Miss Gamor?"

         "Crystal clear. And call me Jafit, please. Miss Gamor always makes me think of my stud-BWOOOOORP."

         There was an awkward silence in the kitchen. Jafit put a hand on her bulging stomach and looked at Angela like a deer in headlights. So much for sophistication, I guess. She muttered a breathy "excuse me", eyes darting away from Angela's.

         Angela broke the silence, preferring to overlook the outburst. "Well Jafit, as to your student's question about the burger recipe, I'm afraid I won't be able to answer it. Actually, nothing on the menu here is my own. They're all trade secrets of the Yeng Corporation. I'm sure you understand."

         "Oh, uh, okay then."

         "Yeah. I'm sorry, if I was able to tell you I would but they have this stuff locked down tight. I need a fingerprint just to get in the prep room, see?" She gestures without looking toward the door to the back room. "Now, if you excuse me, I have to get back to work. If you have any other questions don't just come in here. Find me or ask to see me."

         "Okay, thanks for talking to me, Angela. It was nice meeting you."

         Angela had already begun to walk away. "Yeah, you too."

         On her walk back to her room, questions swirled in Jafit's mind. Why does Yeng own the recipes for the greasy cafeteria food? Why do they keep it so under wraps? Why is it so goddamn good? Why couldn't she help herself around that macaroni and cheese? Why did that burp make her feel so... hot and tingly? And why was she craving aerosol can cheese right then?

As Jafit continued on Dr. Hinamizawa's supplement, she found herself falling into a routine on weekdays. She would wake up in the morning and prepare herself something "healthy" to start her day: perhaps a smorgasbord of eggs or a big savory bowl of oatmeal along with her supplement pill. Then she'd go in to work. She had three periods of class every day: cooking on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays or Hebrew and Study Hall on Tuesdays and Thursdays.

         In between the first two periods and the last two periods was lunch. Not having enough time to prepare herself a true dish and almost always being extremely hungry by then, Jafit would often elect to visit the cafeteria, pile the greasy food onto a plate and go up to her office to eat. Despite her always positive demeanor and beautiful exterior, she was a true introvert, not being particularly close with any of her colleagues and preferring to have a bit of alone time for her lunch hour. And what an hour it was! The cafeteria food was becoming the guiltiest of pleasures for Jafit, her oncoming lunchtime feast occupying her mind every minute of the morning. The pulled pork, the french fries, the macaroni and cheese, the fried chicken, the pizza, and oh GOD the burgers were some of the best food she had in her entire life. From someone who had toured the world multiple times, sampling the best dishes from the greatest chefs of her generation, this was extremely high praise.

         After lunch, Jafit would change her clothes (What? Jafit gets very sweaty when she eats this kind of food. It's not that weird... Right?) and go to third period. Afterwards, she'd go back to her office for office hours, grade some papers, pop another supplement, and go home to wind down. She'd proceed to put on the TV, flop on the couch and decide what to do for dinner, the choice of which depended on how lazy she wanted to be. Before getting on the supplement Jafit almost always cooked herself something new for dinner, either an new spin on an old dish or something completely fresh. Post-suppliment, however, Jafit found herself less adventurous in her food choices. The more food she could make with less effort was the best. Often she elected to order delivery, getting large amounts of pizza or fast food from UberEats to her door and devouring every scrap before ordering more. Every night she'd down a whole box of wine and a tub of ice cream for dessert, then pass out hopefully in her bed, sometimes on the couch.

         This is how it was. This lifestyle obviously was having consequences, but not really on her waistline. Sure, Jafit had gained a bit of belly pudge, but her tum was never close to how big it gets during a binge. No, the damage was almost exclusively on her T&A. Her breasts were noticably bigger and fuller than they were before, spilling uncomfortably out of the tops of all her bras like over-raised muffins. Her shirts would get stuck covering her boobs, uncovering another kind of jiggly muffin top around her waist, and her blouses would outright require for cleavage to be shown as it was a pain to get all of her buttons buttoned, not that Jafit had any problem with that.

         But her butt... Oh Lord, her butt. Jafit had ripped three pairs of jeans, two pencil skirts, and four sets of panties in the past two weeks. She thought this was the work of the new dryers that had been installed in her dormitory's laundry closet. This was not the case. Obviously. Jafit's ass, once a booty that demanded attention, was now a black hole that sucked any innocent bystander's gaze directly to its perfectly round form. Any bottom clung mercilessly to every contour and curve of her butt, leaving absolutely nothing to imagination. To call it a bubble butt would be an understatement, it stuck out behind her like a taut, overfilled, oversized water balloon. Her thighs became much thicker as well, her fat but somehow still toned legs being her third-best feature. Even with the extra pounds, though, Jafit didn't have a single hint of cellulite. This was one of the big reasons Jafit didn't realize the gravity of her weight gain, but I digress.

         The day Jafit realized how fat she had gotten was a Thursday. It was the day of the first exam for Hebrew class, so she was ready for a more relaxed day of work. After study hall and her first Hebrew period, Jafit enjoyed a typically big lunch, today a huuuuge helping of spaghetti and meatballs along with 7 big pieces of garlic bread and a couple regular sized bottles of root beer. Sweaty and bloated, but nearly always dressed to impress, she went to change into a grey pantsuit from her office closet. The deep v-neck undershirt and coat came on easy enough, just gotta leave some buttons unbuttoned of course. But then the slacks. These slacks had been giving Jafit trouble recently, especially around her bountiful booty, but she managed to get them on after a little bit of jumping and pulling. After a quick belly rub and some unladylike belches, she could even get them zipped and buttoned too!

         Jafit did some model poses in front of her newly installed office mirror. She thought something like, "God, what a sexy beast you are, Jafit. Your co-workers are so damn jealous of your figure." Then, she realized it. She forgot the belt! Ugh, so glad she caught that. What would my reputation as this school's sophisticated fashionista be if she forgot the belt? Oh, and there it was, on the floor of the closet. Gotta just bend over and-

         *SHRRIP*

         Oh no. Not again. Jafit rushed back over to the mirror to discover that her pants had a giant rip in their seat, exposing her little pink panties wedged up her crack, as they usually were. Shit. She couldn't wear this. Not at all. And she didn't have anything nearly as snazzy as that pantsuit in the closet, all of the clothes were either dirty and sweated through, as today was laundry day, or way too casual for... wait. Just then, Jafit saw some workout clothes in the closet and got an absolutely brilliant idea. She quickly put them on and rushed down to the cafeteria for a quick bite.

         "Good afternoon, everyone!", Jafit greeted the class, striding into the room 5 minutes late in a sweat-stained wife-beater, a visible, straining sports bra, and little grey shorts that only covered 2/3rds of her ginormous ass. "I apologise for my attire today. Instead of having lunch I elected to take a run instead. Gotta stay healthy if you want to be a chef!" Her vastly bloated belly fooled no one, but nobody spoke up.

         Then, she remembered something. Some of the students had bakery items on their desks. Shit. A few days ago, Jafit had told her class a fun exercise she had planned: since she was the cooking teacher, if you brought in a dessert you baked, you'd get 5-10 points of extra credit on your test based on how good of a job you did. And there they were, about half the class had taken her up on this offer. Cookies, brownies, cupcakes, one student who had been struggling baked a damn pumpkin pie. Great. And she had to eat these to grade them. She could do that at home tonight but... they look... really good. Shit.

         Jafit passed out the tests and the students passed up their baking. She wedged herself into her swivel desk chair. The room was quiet. The food smelled SO good. Well, she guessed it was time to dig in.

         30 minutes later, Jafit's belly was roaring for mercy, stretched against the elastic of her shorts. Only a few brownies were left, the rest of the food demolished in record time. Sweatier than she was when she entered the room, Jafit slumped down in her chair, defeated. This was the most full she ever was, and a little voice in the back of her head told her that all of those calories would be going STRAIGHT to her ass and thighs. God, that's... hot? Jafit's pupils dielated. She thought about her bulbous butt. She thought about a man kissing her behind while another one fed her the last few brownies. Oh no. She thought about ripping her pants earlier. She couldn't be doing this now, she's in class! But she can't stop. She has to go the bathroom. She needed to get it out of her system

         Jafit stands up, but her bottom is wedged tight in the chair. There's a silence as every pair of eyes in the room go straight for the scene in front of them. Here was the thought process:

         First, panic. "Oh my God this is embarrassing, I can't believe this is happening to me, how am I gonna get my butt out of this? Do I need to ask for help?"

         Then, realization. "Wait. My ass fit perfectly in this chair a couple weeks ago. My clothes haven't been shrinking. I got FAT. Holy shit I need to work this off."

         Then... "God, my butt is huge. Imagine what they'd think at the gym. Some cute guy might come up to me and... ask me out cause he thinks I'm cute... and touch me and feed me and... wait... shit. I need to talk to someone once I get out of this. Shit."

         What does Jafit do?

Jafit heaved herself out of her Toyota Prius, taking in the sight of the luxury apartment complex that Shiro pointed her to. It had to be one of the newest and fanciest in the greater Wellington area, a shining, modernist, five story monument to wealth, decadence, and around-the-clock exterior maintenance. Seriously, it seemed like the building's white facade had nary a speck of dirt on it and every window glimmered in the sun. How much was Shiro making at Buttercombe, anyway?

Jafit had left campus early today to prepare for this big day. Even though the gym was a staple of many people's lives, Jafit had never actually gone to one before. Back when she lived with her family in Barcelona, she would often go on jogs by the sea in the early morning and watch the sunrise over the water, eliminating the need for a real gym habit. However, upon moving to America she fell out of this routine. With work taking up her time and the fact that Wellington wasn't nearly as beautiful as her home city, it was quite an easy fall.

Jafit made two stops on her way to the apartment, which she now stepped inside through its automatic revolving door. The first stop was to her own apartment to change. She had gone on a shopping spree on Saturday, picking up all sorts of new garments for her fuller form. One of these, which she was currently wearing, was a two-piece late-80s or early 90s inspired gym outfit, black with hot pink accents and tights. It was a size too small maybe, but it was just too cute to pass up. The only thing that mattered was that the top restrained her tits, which had proven to have a mind of their own lately. While the bottom fabric clung tightly to her butt, as most things did, and the midriff gap between the two pieces let out a decent roll of chub, she thought it looked great on her, and it really really did. Pink was a surprisingly great color for Jafit and it contrasted nicely with her barely-brown skin. With it she had tied her short-ish hair up into a little ponytail with a matching pink scrunchie and around her waist was a fanny pack which she had filled liberally with Hershey's kisses.

Jafit's second stop was to McDonald's for some drive-thru fast food. Entering the gym, in her hand was a classic paper bag containing her typical order: twenty nuggets, two cheeseburgers, two Quarter Pounders with cheese, a Big Mac, three large fries, and four apple pies. In her other hand was a drink carrier holding a large Sprite, Coke, and Dr. Pepper. Jafit was always embarrassed by her large fast food orders, so she'd try to make it look like she was ordering for a few different people.

The gym was robust and, as Shiro had assured, totally empty, with a sign on the door saying it had been reserved. It contained all manner of equipment: treadmills, benches with weights, a rowing machine, exercise balls of various sizes, you get the picture. Balancing on top of one of these exercise balls was Shiro, patiently waiting. In contrast to Jafit's shocking curves and soft... everything, Shiro was a total hardbody. She sported a robust six pack, most of the muscles on her body clearly defined. While her chest sported barely anything to speak of, Shiro had a firm, round butt, clearly the result of a strict regiment of squats.

When the two of them recognized each other, Shiro's happiness to see her friend outside of work was slightly dampened by the McDonald's. The first thing that came out of her mouth was a playful but disappointed "Jafiiiit! You seriously brought fast food to the gym?"

"Girl's gotta eat, Shiro!" She patted her lightly padded middle.

The two embraced briefly, after which Shiro glanced at the food Jafit had placed on a lifting bench. "Well just remember you're here to LOSE weight, not gain it."

"Okay, okay, I know. What are we doing today, then? Is it leg day?"

"I think we'll start with cardio. It's self-explanatory, I won't have to teach you anything."

"I'm a fast learner!"

Shiro strode past Jafit, lightly tapping her on the shoulder. "I know you are. Let's do some running."

For the sake of time, let's run through some of the highlights of the workout:

-The two started on the treadmills. Jafit was a natural, booty bouncing in her tight leggings like a jello pillow tumbling down a staircase. She tired out quickly, though, and took a food break to wolf down her quarter pounders and chug the Sprite.

-They moved to the bikes. The small seat was uncomfortable for Jafit, for obvious reasons. They decided to skip them.

-On the stair climber, Shiro noticed that Jafit had been removing and subsequently eating chocolates from her fanny pack. Upon question from Shiro, Jafit burped and changed the subject to Shiro's apartment.

-While waiting for Shiro to be done on the gym's singular rowing machine, Jafit downed an entire 10 piece McNugget in one mouthful. This was very impressive and kind of weirdly turned her on, but nobody else saw.

-Shiro tried to get Jafit to jump rope. She was unsuccessful. Jafit went to jog on the treadmill instead, taking some fries with her.

And so, by the end of the workout, Shiro was revitalized and pumped and Jafit was totally pooped and full of greasy fast food. She had eaten her whole double family-sized order over the course of the 90 minutes, her stuffed belly squashing uncomfortably over the elastic of her tights.

Shiro wiped sweat off her forehead. "Whew! Well, that was a start, wasn't it?"

"Yeah-*bwuuurp* yeah it was. I wanna... relax."

"Do you wanna hit the sauna, sweat it out?"

And so they hit the sauna, which the apartment gym somehow had. Jafit resembled a cavewoman who had been feeding on mammoth, having to use two towels as a makeshift bikini. She sat down the bench from Shiro, massaging her overtaxed stomach, unstifled belches erupting from her mouth as it went down in size. Shiro was fascinated by the way her belly receded so quickly after such a huge meal, but she didn't say anything.

Jafit broke the relative silence. "Shiro?"

"Yes, Jafit?"

"Do you think I'm sexy?"

The question caught Shiro off guard. "I, uh, I'm sorry Jafit, I... I don't swing that way. I thought you knew that!"

Jafit was surprised at her response. "Oh, no, no, no! I don't mean it THAT way! I just... It's just... I've been having a lot of thoughts lately. About my body. And I'm not sure if I'm actually sexy or... not. Do you know what I mean? You know I put on a lot of weight recently. Like, am I still hot?"

"...yeah."

Jafit laughed. "All the time. God, he was great. I miss him a lot. We broke up... a year or so before I came to America."

"Have you given any thought in getting back into dating?"

Now though, she had been delivered her idol on a plate and they would be spending ALOT of time together.
Hopefully...

*************

Darting and weaving between the crowds of people in the corridors, Felicity carefully navigated herself towards her new target, lost in her own world still as she meandered the sea of people.
A couple of previously assigned tutors called to the red head as she walked but, so lazer focused, the T/PA soldiered on through without breaking her gaze from her path.
Finally, as she crossed the glaringly obvious division from the school's original architecture and into the much newer living quarters that had been built alongside the original structure, Felicity found herself sweeping side to side on the hunt for one very particular door.

'I wonder if she'll recognise me?' mused the red head to herself as she scanned door after door.
Shaking her head to answer her own question, Felicity powered on, realising she was on the wrong floor.

'Well, I wonder if she'll sign a book at least...or maybe all of them...'. Still lost in thought, the young assistant bit her lip in cautious contemplation as her nerves started to build, her feet pounding against the marble stairs as she ascended to the right floor.

Pushing the door open with the palm of her hand, Felicity stepped out onto the right floor before taking a gentle deep breath. This was it.
As she slowly wandered down the corridor, the thoughts continued to pour in.
'Surely we'll at least be able to talk recipes and cooking, right?' pondered the red head as she found herself outside of the door
"Here goes nothing" whispered Felicity, to herself.

*****************

"Come in!" came the silky accented voice from within in response to the knock at the door.
With as little hesitation as she could muster, Felicity proceeded to allow herself into the apartment only to find herself halting again after crossing the threshold.
Eyes fixed wide, Felicity found herself unable to even blink as Jafit stood up from her sofa and THEN proceeded to grab a delicate velvet robe from the arm of another chair and put it on.
Not before giving the young assistant an absolute eye full of her naked ripened figure, mind.

Completely stunned on the spot, Felicity was unable to move as Jafit approached her before turning sharply into the kitchen, everything bouncing or jiggling as she went.
"Please, sit down whilst I get us some refreshments" purred Jafit from inside the fridge, long tanned fingers clasping the door whilst her sizeable rear arched into the air, a telling line of an undergarment struggling for dear life encasing the immense wobbling cheeks.
'Wowsers, that never happened on TV' internally gasped Felicity as she awkwardly and rigidly trotted to the sofa, scared that too brisk a movement would cause a through draft and blow her idol's robe clean off.

It wasn't long before the celebrity chef returned to the sofa though, a large glass in each hand along with distinct evidence that Miss Gamor was not a believer in robe ties, allowing for her rounded stomach to distend past the limits of the thin material in an almost elegant sunkissed curve.
God only knows what miracle was implored to prevent the chef from exposing herself more as the flimsy gown clung to her breasts, each boob, Felicity noted, appeared to be bigger than her own head.

"Now darling, I know you're here to work but I'm relaxing so let's not be too serious, ok?" cooed Jafit, an air of arousal radiating from the exotic kitchen maestro.
"S...Su...Sure" stumbled Felicity, trying not to stare too intently or directly as she spoke.
"Excellent!" cheered Jafit before thrusting one of the glasses into Felicity's hands "So, drink that and get us something to eat yes?"
"Yeah, sure" nodded the red head, confidence growing again slightly as her professional head started to take over.

Without hesitating, the moxy assistant strode to the kitchen, glass in hand before calling over her shoulder "What can I get you Miss Gamor?"
"Please no 'Miss', we're going to be friends yeah? Call me Jafit" interjected Jafit from her seat on the sofa, half of the contents of her glass already gone with a slither of it remaining around her lips "and just bring everything"

'Everything?' asked Felicity to herself 'surely not'
As she continued to muse, the red head took a tentative drink from her glass.
As she poured over the many cupboards, finding shelves and shelves of food, Felicity couldn't help but think her new senior was exagerating about bringing 'everything'

"Sorry, you wanted...everything?" asked the assistant, searching for confirmation whilst taking another sip from her glass
"Absolutely, you don't have to bring it all now though" smiled Jafit, gently rubbing her stomach as she spoke
"M'kay..." muttered Felicity as she grabbed a dense square ginger cake from one shelf, taking a much larger sip from her glass as she did.

***************

"Are you ok in there Fiona?" asked Jafit, a little concerned, mostly due to her growing hunger which had not be sated yet.
"Absolutely fine" bubbled the red head as she marched back to the living room, arms laden with a multitude of food items "and its, erm...Felicity by the way..." corrected the younger girl as she dumped the items on the middle cushion that would be between the two women.

"Oh sorry dear, I do get confused when I'm hungry" replied Jafit, with a small smile "do sit down"
"Just a moment" responded Felicity, rocking on her feet slightly "I was just going to top up my glass, this stuff is delicious" she smiled as she showed off her drained glass
"Isn't it?" smiled Jafit, knowing all too well why "Do get me one also whilst you're there?"
"Will do, Jafit" smiled Felicity as she took the tutors glass from her and pranced back to the kitchen.

11232212112421.content:
The past couple of weeks had been rather intense.

As a fairly seasoned T/PA, Felicity was more than accustomed to the hearty appetites of the corpulent staff and the obscene quantities of food that came with that territory.
Jafit Gamor was proving to be a whole different experience though.

“How is it going in there Felicity?” called Jafit from her plush sofa perch.

“Nearly there...Jafit” replied the young assistant as she peered into the oven, looking over her creations.
The redhead’s professionalism had jarred at the prospect of calling her superior by her first name but, not one to decline a request, Felicity found herself unable to stop referring to the plumpening teacher as such.

Any ill feelings were quashed swiftly in light of their arrangement though as the two settled in to each other’s rhythm.
Felicity’s nerves were also settled after her first successful offering of food as prepared by herself.

The dream was truly coming together, working alongside her idol and THEN getting to cook for her...Felicity had never enjoyed her job so much as she did right now.

“Those smells are quite...delightful” purred the Israeli Spaniard from her seat, a gentle movement causing the furnishing to creak softly beneath her bulk.

“I’m glad you approve Mis...Jafit, I hope it tastes as well as it smells” smiled Felicity, thinking back to that first meal.
The poor girl had tentatively set the plate before her senior and then stood back like any nervous waitress at a Michelin restaurant.
Her nerves were misplaced though as Jafit had not only devoured the offering but also requested more...multiple times over.

It had all fallen into place from there really.
Felicity had taken to cooking and baking for Jafit everyday as part of her assistance duties and Jafit had continued to slobber over said cooking, literally and figuratively.

“Ok, I hope you’re ready” called Felicity, bobbing up from the oven as she spoke.

“Always, my dear” cooed the ever silky Jafit as she delicately swing her legs from the sofa and placed her feet gently onto the hardwood floor beneath, awaiting her feast.

“Well here it comes” returned Felicity, arms laden with an array of foods.

Jafit hungrily licked her lips as plates were placed before her, filling her nostrils even more so with the beautiful aromas she had already tapped into.

Felicity wandered back and forth more than once with additional plates as the food piled up before her superior.
Meats
Sausages
Three types of potato
Cauliflower cheese that was more cheese than cauliflower
And, of course, the obligatory pitcher of Jafit’s supplement infused full fat milk

“Oh you have outdone yourself today, my dear” purred Jafit, hungrily leaning over the table before her and inhaling deeply

Felicity smiled to herself whilst holding her hands behind her back
“Well I am here to assist” prattled the redhead automatically “please tuck in before it gets cold”

The sun kissed tutor did not need telling twice as she immediately dove in, tearing bites from as much as she could fit into her mouth at once.

As Felicity looked over her, inadvertently acquired, friend, she couldn’t help but notice the tanned woman before her was ever more present, even compared to their first meeting but a couple of weeks before.

It was true, Jafit Gamor was still expanding at a steady rate, undoubtedly assisted by Felicity’s near constant attention.
With Felicity on beck and call, Jafit had found little reason to over exert herself whenever possible which only continued to influence her growth.

With Felicity able to cover her classes, provide her with food and collect anything she may require, the Israeli Spaniard was living like a Roman empress, reclined seating and skimpy robes to boot.
Skimpy was proving more and more apparent as the days rolled by.

The uncontrollable combination of her swelling backside, enormous breasts and rapidly catching up belly had meant that not a single piece of Jafit’s wardrobe fit her properly, least of all her favourite silk robes which rarely found themselves tied, never mind held around the buxom woman’s figure.
As such, her exhibitionist tendencies had only increased as Felicty became more ingrained in her life.

Indeed, Felicty had become accustomed to seeing bulges of flesh usually left covered even by the largest of her clients, and the more intimate features of Jafit’s body but found she was able to gloss over most occurrences.
All the while, Jafit wasn’t phased at all and, to a more suspicious eye, may have even taken enjoyment from her flashes of exhibition.

To say Jafit was the only one to expand since their partnership began would be a little cruel though and, for the first time in her extensive career at Buttercombe, Felicity had gained weight.
In the grand scheme of things, most people wouldn’t notice and, given the general audience of the institute, Felicity’s measly 15lbs was hardly cause for concern.
Felicity, however, had noticed and was feeling a little more shy about it than her employ.

The younger girl did find the sudden swell rather strange having never gained weight before, but she knew that Jafit’s influence was not a limited one and she only had her own will power to blame for the extra weight that had settled around her middle quite comfortably.
She couldn’t help but notice that she was most hungry after drinking some of that peculiar milk that her assigned tutor was so fond of though...

“Please do help yourself Felicity, you’ve worked so hard” purred Jafit between mouthfuls, glancing over her shoulder.

“Oh I shouldn’t, this is only lunch after all and I have other teachers to see this afternoon” nervously responded Felicity, hoping to avoid another serious binge.

“Oh nonsense, you must eat otherwise you’re no help to anyone” replied Jafit, rather sternly “sit”

“Oh fine” conceded Felicity with a smile as she circled the sofa and plonking next to Jafit, noticing a rather prominent caramel coloured muffin top engulfing the teachers hips.

“Good” smiled Jafit as she returned to her own gorging, the aforementioned muffin top swelling outwardly as the owner of said feature lent forward “I did prepare some eclairs for us to enjoy after as well” continued the culinary teacher with a gentle stroke to Felicity’s arm.

“Sounds lovely” responded Felicity, a touch of nerves still niggling in her mind as she automatically took to pouring herself a glass of milk without thinking.

‘Oh boy’ thought the young assistant as the milk passed her lips and her hunger kicked in from nowhere just moments before her hands were reaching for various morsels of food laid out before her.

112322121124211.content:
"I'm sorry Jafit, the request came from high up" asserted Felicty weakly as she explained the change in circumstances to the corpulent woman before her.

"Oh but we were having such a good time were we not?" asked Jafit, her smooth accent flowing warmly through Felicity's ears in a way she wished it wouldn't.

"Yes, we were, but unfortunately I have to do my job otherwise I'll be kicked out of the academy" sighed the redheaded assistant as she glanced down at her feet, not wanting to make eye contact with Miss Gamor.
Things HAD been going incredibly well and the friendship forming between teacher and assistant was more than Felicity had ever dreamed of when it came to her culinary idol, but unfortunately the decision was not hers to make.

"Well I suppose I can not ask you to risk your career" nodded Jafit slowly "you would always be welcome to visit me though, especially if you brought some food along"

Felicity couldn't help but smile at this point as her mind played a memory reel of their times eating and laughing together.
A casual hand grazed the younger girl's stomach as she reminisced, memories were not the only thing she took away from this experience after all.
With her figure looking slightly fuller still, a moment of realisation had allowed Felicity to reign in her habits marginally and only add a further 5 pounds to her svelte frame but that was plenty more for the redhead's liking.

Needless to say, however, her superior had certainly not held back in the same time and, if anything, seemed to gain even faster.
"274" the Mediterranean beauty had proudly declared only the day before to a vaguely listening Felicity who was far more occupied with a large slice of chocolate cake.
In a strange way, Felicity actually envied Jafit's apparent ease of mind when it came to her weight, hell, she even seemed to enjoy getting bigger as the days rolled by.
As the pounds kept coming though, so did the inches and, as such, Jafit's ample body just kept growing outwards in outrageous bulging curves that she was not afraid to display at every opportunity in the name of staying comfortable.

Realising a gap had formed in the conversation as she wandered with her thoughts, Felicity hurriedly responded the the kind offer.

"I would like that alot, I'd hate for our friendship to suffer from me not seeing you every day" smiled the assistant, feeling slightly more at ease at revealing her reallocation.

"Absolutely not!" beamed Jafit "please do not be a stranger, particularly with those cooking skills of yours"

"Ok then, I won't" replied Felicity, truly at ease now knowing she hadn't ruined her chances with staying in contact with the celebrity chef before her.
"Well, I really must be off now, new clients to get accustomed to and all that" announced Felicity in a jokey manner so as not to sound rude.

"Oh yes, don't let me keep you, can't have you getting fired now" nodded Jafit as she sashayed towards the redhead, wrapping her in a warm and exceptionally soft embrace
Felicity took a moment to enjoy the contact, intoxicated by how curvy Jafit really was before allowing herself to be released to head for the door.

"Oh, before I go" started Felicity, turning away from the door "you have a class at 3pm but you won't have any preparation as the girls are just practicing desserts and sweets for you to assess"

"Sounds lovely" smiled Jafit, an easy class to get back into things sounded perfect
Felicity nervously smiled as she turned to the door again, promptly opening it and departing down the hallway before the door even clicked shut.

"Such a sweet girl" mused Jafit to herself as she turned away from the spot that her former assistant had been stood and made a beeline for her plush sofa.
As the zaftig woman plopped herself down quite heavily she glanced at the clock mounted on the wall.

'11:30, I have some time' smiled the teacher as she slowly returned to her feet and made her way into the kitchen.
Although the prospect of having to work without Felicity's aid, Jafit felt rather content with the situation as she automatically prepared herself something to eat and, of course, something to drink.
As the buxom chef made her way back to her seat she couldn't help but smile to herself...
'Besides, three hours seems like a fitting send off feast for such a good friend'

***********

Whilst working for Jafit, part of Felicity's role had included keeping on top of the teacher's wardrobe requirements for the few occasions when she had left her apartment and, although a tricky task to gauge, the redhead had done as good a job as anybody could.
With careful monitoring and adherement to Jafit's particular styles, her assistant had done a fine job in keeping her clothed and rather sexy if the chef dared add herself, even if her current run of clothing was starting to pinch a little bit in places.

Were she less amorous about her weight at this point though, Jafit might have been more concerned about the skimpiness of her outfit rather than its actual appearance.

On this particular day, Jafit had chosen (read: struggled to fit into anything other than) an obscenely tight pair of black jeans that hugged her thickening legs and enormous rear so closely they looked painted onto her olive skin.
Although partly concealed by a full length cardigan draped over her shoulders, Jafit's upper half was barely more decent as she donned a navy blue cropped satin shirt which only served to draw any wandering eyes to her chest which was accented by the material crossing over her hulking breasts, whilst cavernous cleavage bounced with each thigh rubbing step.

The cropped element of her shirt did nothing to conceal the thick roll of tanned belly fat that was currently spilling out of her outfit.
In keeping with her natural figure, her middle did still taper inwards at her waist to maintain her hourglass figure but this simply accentuated the size of her muffin top and belly as they jiggled above her denim waistband.

Regardless of any onlookers opinions of her, Jafit Gamor still felt like a queen as she strode into her culinary class, swiftly pushing the last bite of doughnut between her plump lips as she crossed the threshold.

*************

"Good afternoon girls, I'm sorry I've not been with you much as of late" apologised Jafit as she swallowed her breakroom doughtnut behind her slender fingers, heading towards her desk at the front of the class as she did.

"Jeez, she might not be as big as Walker but she's piling it on don't you think?" whispered an all too familiar girl to her friend next to her.

"You're one to talk Tabs" smirked the other girl, jabbing the first gently in the hip

"Oh piss off Sapphire" hissed Tabitha, not too impressed at having her hypocrisy called out like that "You're hardly a beanpole these days"

Although true, Sapphire was, in comparison to Tabitha, much more shapely and akin to Jafit herself in her weight gain.

"Am I disturbing you ladies at the back?" called Jafit, having noticed the two girls bickering.

"No Miss!" chimed the pair in well practiced unison, having often caught the wrong eye of their teachers in the past

"Well see me after class all the same" retorted Jafit.

Instantly silenced, the two girls scowled their discontent straight forward with no response from their disciplining teacher.

"Anyway, as I was saying, I understand you are all practice desserts and other such sweet treats so please just get on with your tasks and don't forget to enjoy your baking!" smiled Jafit as she ushered her class to their tasks.

Watching carefully as the students took to their cooking, Jafit drew a insulated mug from her bag and placed it on her desk after taking a long drag from it.
To any passer by, the mug was likely to contain coffee to help the Spaniard through her class although Felicity would be able to tell anyone that it actually contained the teacher's favourite milk concoction.
An addict has to feed the habit after all, even if she has a job to do.

As Jafit lent back in her chair, she smiled softly, remembering how much she actually enjoyed teaching.
As fun as binging day in day out had become to her, and still was for that matter, her true love was sharing her talent with others who were willing to learn.
Besides, she stood to get food aplenty out of the position anyway so two birds with one stone right?

1123221211242112.content:
Tabitha and Sapphire were quite typical seniors, certainly by Buttercombe standards anyway.

Having endured nearly four years of Buttercombe tutelage together as close knit friends, the pair had settled into a very mundane routine of going to classes, passing said classes and indulging in their shared past time of the schools meal plan.

Having met in the great hall during their welcome feast as lowly freshmen, the two girls had rarely found a time to be separated forming a deeply rooted friendship over the years.

Whilst proving to be a beneficial relationship when it came to muddling through class assignments, a rather unexpected (albeit predictable) side effect had been their combined self gratifying tendencies had seen the pair enjoy typical Buttercombe figures.

Tabitha was a near spitting image of her mother, raven black hair, piercing green eyes, slender sculpted facial features and exceptionally bottom heavy.
Naturally, her youth garnered a degree of perkiness and sprightly beauty her mother no longer possessed, not to mention the nose ring that her mother didn’t approve of, but Tabitha was undoubtedly her mother’s daughter.

As soon as the pounds started to accumulate, Tabitha’s rear ballooned into a matching pair of wobbling, cellulite dappled cheeks that outgrew every skirt she owned.
Her vast thunderous thighs saw to it that any remaining flow in her skirts was vanquished, leaving the material to cling to her lower half when the black haired girl stood still.

On the other side stood Sapphire who wasn’t quite as straight laced as Tabitha was.

The ombré styled brunette senior also donned a nose ring but, in contrast, her mother supported it whole heartedly.
Just that afternoon before Miss Gamor’s class, Sapphire had been telling Tabitha how her own mother had booked tickets to go to a music festival, just the two of them, after having such a good time this summer at one such event.

Oddly for most parents, Sapphire’s mum had also proven nothing but supportive of her daughter’s...expansion at school which probably went a long way to enhance Sapphire’s natural gluttony.

That and her luck in the genes department certainly wouldn’t slow a girl down at any rate.
In contrast to the increasingly bottom heavy Tabitha, Sapphire had been fortunate enough to develop much more evenly giving her a very full senior class hourglass figure.

As well as being a notorious skirt stretcher alongside her best friend, Sapphire had a reputation as a sweater stretcher as well having given many a student and member of staff an eyeful when failing to stay ahead with her wardrobe sufficiently.

Despite her natural curves however, Sapphire’s great gluts had also gifted her quite the pot belly to round out her figure and sported a much fuller face than Tabitha, even if her roundness of cheeks and the hint of a double chin only enhanced her appearance.

***********

Things were not always glitz and glamour for the two girls though and, with a penchant for gossiping, had found themselves staying after class with Jafit Gamor having being caught disrupting her lesson.

However, despite her earlier sternness on the matter, Jafit was now far too occupied with devouring the many delicacies the class had prepared for her to even notice the two girls stood before her desk.
Brazen as ever in her own self comfort, Jafit had even popped the button on her jeans to allow her bulging stomach to sit freely on her lap whilst her already limited shirt rose that bit higher over the bulge of fat.

“Ahem, you wanted to see us miss?” interjected Tabitha by means of clearing her throat.

The sudden sound seemed to nearly startle Jafit as she slowly tilted what appeared to be a trifle towards her lips.
Sitting the container to one side for now and hungrily licking her lips, Jafit then cleared her own throat before proceeding.

“Ah yes, sorry to have you wait” began the tanned chef, idly laying a hand across her bloated middle “please don’t talk whilst I’m trying to teach you, ok?”

“Sorry miss” chorused the two girls, sending a greater telling off was yet to come

“Great” purred Jafit before scooping up her trifle dish once more

Tabitha and Sapphire looked at each other, unsure of how to proceed.

“Sorry, do we not have detention or something?” pried Sapphire, fiddling with her fingers as she spoke.

“Hmm?” mutter Jafit as a line of custard escaped her mouth “oh no, you may go, no trouble today”
The culinary teacher offered a rather disarming smile to the two students before returning to her dessert.

Again, confused and unsure, the two girls looked to each other before stepping away and heading for the door.

“Erm, ok, we’ll see you next week miss” called Tabitha as she crossed the threshold of the classroom

Barely noticeable past the sizeable glass dish in front of her face, Jafit simply nodded, not wishing to break off her feast any more than she already had done.

**************

“Urgh, what a crazy bitch” declared Sapphire as she tussled her hair in the bathroom mirror over the sink.

“Hey, at least we didn’t get into trouble” retorted Tabitha as she also looked at her reflection with her belly gently grazing the cool ceramic in front of her.

“I mean, we were nearly late to dinner because we spent 10 minutes watching her gorge herself” sighed Sapphire, turning to face the room as a whole with her shapely rear perched on the sink behind her as a faint gurgle of hunger rang from her own swollen middle.

“I know! The irony” muttered Tabitha as she slowly reapplied her eyeline.

“Well, we did get something out of all this” chirped Sapphire as a grin adorned her lips.

“Oh yeah, what’s that then?” asked the raven haired girl as she turned to face her friend, seeing a shiny silver insulated mug in her friends hand “oh Saph, you didn’t steal Miss Gamor’s mug now did you?”

“Totally” beamed the spunky brunette “I mean, the way she honks down on this thing it’s got to be booze or something right?”

“I don’t know...” Tabitha faltered. Although she got into trouble semi frequently, she didn’t enjoy it and much preferred to stay on teacher’s good sides.

“Oh come on, let’s give it a go” goaded Sapphire, shaking the mug in front of her friend as she did “call it retribution”

“Erm...”

“Ok look, I’ll drink half, then you finish it off and THEN we’ll go for dinner, ok?”
Sapphire knew that Tabitha could be a little flakey when it came to rule breaking so figured a little incentive would go a long way to helping her friend.

Relenting to the offer, Tabitha modded “fine, but you go first”

“Deal” smiled Sapphire before swiftly putting the mug to her lips and throwing her head back.

A moment passed as the brunette chugged but it wasn’t long before the vessel was being passed over.

“Who knew Miss Gamor drank like a Russian, tastes like cream or milk or something”

Rather unclear on the reference, Tabitha found solace in knowing the liquid tasted of dairy product and followed suit, draining the mug in quick succession.

“Wow, that’s really nice” mused Tabitha as she set the mug down on one of the sinks

“Right? Now come on, I am absolutely starving” purred Sapphire, swiping the mug back into her bag and grabbing Tabitha by the arm.

“Me too, swear I wasn’t this hungry a moment ago...” pondered the dark haired senior

“Hurry up!” shouted Sapphire, her zaftig figure already bee lining for the bathroom door

11232212112421121.content:
"Christ Tabs, hurry up!" shouted Sapphire as she lumbered through into the great hall, eying the queue length as she did.
Given her body shape, Tabitha was not a fast mover, even in a school full of rather slow patrons but she finally crossed the threshold to join her friend.

"Slow down Sapphire, you know I can't go as fast as you" panted the dark haired girl as she bent over slightly to suck in great mouthfuls of air.

"You're fine" mused Sapphire, flicking her hair back before waddling towards the food queue.

Tabitha looked up to see her friend jiggling away ahead of her, breath still eluding the bottom heavy student as she straightened up, tugged her cardigan abruptly down before following after Sapphire

"About time" teased the brunette as she nudged Tabitha's arm upon finally joining the queue

"I told you, I'm not as fast..."

"as you, I know Tabs, we don't all have that enormous backside you carry around" teased Sapphire again.

The banter built between the two over their years of friendship allowed for a great deal of teasing, even if most of it was aimed at Tabitha, but it was all meant in jest and lines were never crossed where they shouldn't be.
The queue for dinner was far less pleasing than their shared banter though.

"You know, I think Miss Gamor should let us go early next week for wasting our time" announced Sapphire as she awkwardly adjusted her bra.

"Well you did kind of steal her flask Saph, I think we're even" muttered Tabitha, keeping her voice down for a non-existent observer.

"I suppose, I just wish I wasn't so hungry now, this wait is killing me" grumbled Sapphire, feeling a heavy rumble ride through her impressive belly.

"I know what you mean" complained Tabitha, holding her own rumbling belly for a moment as if listening to its woes and problems.

As the line slowly made its way through the hall, Sapphire suddenly found a new wave of impatience.

"Tabs! Tabs!" she hissed at her dark haired friend whilst jabbing her in her flabby arm.

"What now?" groaned Tabitha, enthusiasm the last thing on her mind.

"They've got steak AND that cheesy pasta they bring out every so often" chirped the hourglass shaped girl with a great deal of insistence in her voice.

"Really?!" squawked Tabitha, suddenly more engaged in the conversation at the declaration of her favourite food being on offer for the first time in weeks.

"Really!" repeated Sapphire as she turned back to the face the queue again, accidently nudging her vast belly into the back of an unsuspecting Freshman

"Woah, sorry kid" purred Sapphire as the thin girl looked at her like a deer in the headlights "its a special day today, you'll see"

"Freshmen, they just don't get it" joked Sapphire with a sly glance back to her friend.

Tabitha could only nod as the aroma of cheese filled her nostrils and her inflated hunger growled once more.

************

"Urgh finally" sighed Sapphire as she heavily sat on one of the benches laid out, a deep groan radiating from the wood as it braced against her weight.

"I know right" mumbled Tabitha, insighting a similar reaction from the opposing seat as she sat to face her friend so that they could talk, little did they realise how little conversation would go on once they started.

It started with a single forkful of cheese drenched pasta for both girls but it certainly didn't stop there.

"Oh god, this is delicious" cried out Tabitha between large mouthfuls of meat and pasta.

Sapphire could only nod her agreeance as she loaded her mouth up the second it emptied enough to fit her fork in.

The girls gorged in unison, large mirrored mouthfuls disappearing between their opposing lips, punctuated with sides aplenty.
Garlic bread followed steak.
Thick fluffy fries followed sauce drenched pasta.
Onion rings and creamy mash mopped up steak grease and pasta sauce alike before being deposited into the girls mouths bit by bit.

**********

It didn't take long for their respective piled plates to empty but a familiar face soon joined the pair.

"Oh hey girls, Ja...Miss Gamor really worked you guys hard today huh?" asked Felicity as she glided past their table, noticing the empty plates alongside the familiar students.

"Oh yeah, REALLY hard" mused Sapphire, licking her lips whilst wondering how acceptable it would be to lick her plate clean as well.

"Definitely" added Tabitha, mostly just to seem polite as she was more focused on her own plate, wiping sauce trails with her fingers before popping them in her mouth.

"Glad to hear it" smiled Felicity as she went to move on "Hey, do you two want a top up, you do look really hungry today"

Sapphire and Tabitha looked at each other, almost confused at the offer.
Although they had heard of it, they themselves had never had TA's offering to get them more food before.
The prospect of queuing again did not sound appealing though whilst the thought of more food certainly did pique their interests.

"I don't know, would that be a problem?" asked Sapphire, playing her cards closely as she probed at the validity of the offer.

"Absolutely not, I am here to assist after all" smiled Felicity before shooting off towards the food counter.

"Well that's never happened before..." mused Tabitha as she put her plate down on the table, wiping her mouth delicately with a napkin.

"Isn't it great?!" cheered Sapphire, gently pawing at her belly, feeling completely empty despite having just devoured a huge plate of heavy food.

**********

The girls didn't have to wait long, thankfully, before Felicity returned in a rather unexpected manner.
The bouncy redheaded TA was strutting towards Sapphire and Tabitha with a tray trolley in each hand, each one stacked with three large plates of food.
The girls glanced at each other almost cautiously as Felicity approached, wondering if the TA had been caught by another member of staff or student to bring a refill.
Caution proved to be unnecessary though as all became clear.

"Well I wasn't sure exactly what you girls would want so I just got you plenty of everything" purred Felicity, parking a trolley beside each girl "not to worry if you don't finish it all, I'm sure somebody else will make use of it"

Tabitha looked almost fearful at her friend, hoping for some silent reassurance about what was going on but Sapphire was on another planet at that point.

"You're so great Miss, thank you!" cooed Sapphire as she unloaded her trolley, placing all three plates in front of herself.

"Oh you're welcome" smiled Felicity with a small hostess bob as she spoke "anything else whilst I'm here?"

"Oh I think we're fine thank you" smiled Sapphire, wanting nothing more for Felicity to leave so she could tuck in.

"Great, see you soon girls" smiled Felicity as she turned on her heels.
As she started to walk away though, a flash of silver caught her eye under the table where Sapphire was sat.
A thermal flask.
Having spent so much time doting on Jafit, Felicity was all too familiar with those particular vessels but was surprised to see a student with one.
Never too suspicious of people though, Felicity shrugged it off before wandering up the hall to see if anyone else required her assistance.

"She's so nice" mused Tabitha as she turned back to the table to talk to her friend again, although conversation was the last thing on the brunette's mind as she began to tear into the array of plates before her.
Rolling her eyes, Tabitha delicately found herself putting together a fresh forkful of food before placing it into her mouth and feeling the deep hungry sensation rising again.

**********

"Oh my god, I don't think I've ever eaten so much in one sitting" groaned Sapphire as she slowly lumbered across the shared living area within the flat that her and Tabitha shared.

"Me neither" groaned the black haired girl as she stumbled slightly, unintentionally pressing her firm and full belly against the doorframe which pushed a loud burp out of her mouth.

"Making room already?" teased Sapphire as she lowered herself carefully onto the sofa in the middle of the room.

Tabitha could only shake her head as a rasping groan escaped her lips as she lowered herself next to her friend, the two girls taking up all of the three seater sofa between them.
Sapphire chuckled as she parted her school cardigan before slowly opening the buttons on her greatly stretched shirt, bulges of belly fat slowly surging forward as each button released pressure around her immensely full gut.
Tabitha only glanced at the brunette, having seen her friend expose herself regularly in the common areas of their flat to relax after a great feast, even if none had compared to the one they had just indulged in.

The two girls sat in silence as they massaged their respectively bloated bellies, neither girl able to make much more of a sound than the occasional groan or dislodged burp.
Eventually though, after releasing a particularly large belch, Sapphire broke the silence.
"Do you think that booze had something to do with this?" she asked her friend, still massaging her belly.

"I don't...think so?" replied Tabitha, not entirely sure why alcohol would make them pig out so much.

"Huh, I just wondered is all" purred Sapphire, resuming her belly massage a little more firmly to dislodge yet more burps.

Tabitha could only giggle at her friend as she did the same, leaving the two girls in an unofficial burping contest in their living room as they nursed their bloated figures.

112322121124211211.content:
"Ok class, you've all done a wonderful job today but we are now at the end of our time unfortunately" called Jafit as she rose from her chair behind her desk.
A sea if eyes turned to look at the exotic teacher as she spoke, although most of the girls were tipped off as the chef's desk chair groaned a great creak of relief as her curvaceous bulk was lifted from within the confines of the wooden arms.

"Now I will be assessing your work again today so be prepared for some feedback during our next classes" purred Jafit to her avid audience as they set about finishing their dishes and slowly brought them towards the front of the class upon hearing they would be assessed...again.

"Don't you think we get assessed A LOT in this class?" muttered one girl to another as they carried a tray of peanut butter cookies and Mediterranean skewers respectively to the front.

"I guess? I don't know, they seem to take culinary arts really seriously here" replied the girl as she laid down her skewers and scuttled back to her desk to grab her bag, just as Jafit loomed behind her friend.

"Those cookies look delightful Cynthia" purred Jafit as she reached over the girl's shoulder to grab three of the saucer sized biscuits before taking a large bite from one of them.
"Mhm, you will be getting a wonderful grade for these" moaned Jafit through a mouthful of sweet sticky crumbs before marching back to her desk, eating all the way there.

*****

It didn't take long for the entire class to file out and, as the heavy wooden door banged closed in its frame, Jafit sighed her content upon realising the teaching day was over.
Since returning back to her usual schedule after Felicity had been reassigned, Jafit had been kept busy more than she remembered but it was days like this where she had had four classes which all needed assessing that made the chaotic long days worth while.
Scanning the entire length of the classroom worktop with dark sultry eyes, Jafit also recalled that the two large fridges were also packed with dishes that had been prepared that day and the chef knew she would be lying to herself if she didn't admit she found the task ahead rather exciting.

Without a second thought, Jafit gradually ferried the peanut butter cookies, a large pot of chili, a smorgasbord of deep filled omelettes (a dish many of her students had taken a fancy to lately) and a family sized chicken pot pie.
Practically drooling as she looked over her first offerings, Jafit proceeded to hook her fingers into her stretchy jegging waistband and peel them from her concealed belly.

It had taken a few jean mishaps to learn the lesson, but Jafit had come to realise the comfort and stretch of jeggings were the way forward for a stylish woman who loved to eat, especially on marking day.
It had also dawned on the teacher that she was quite fond of the feeling of release as she let her ever growing stomach free of its stretchy confines.
Today was no different as her belly bulged free like melted caramel, pouring over her retreating waistband one heavy pound at a time before finally bouncing free and jiggling for a moment, exposed to the elements.

The burgeoning chef moaned softly at this before squeezing her fattened hips into her chair once again and diving into the first of many meals that night.

*****

Any observer would have been excused for thinking that Jafit was possessed as she tore into her food like a wild animal but, in truth, the chef was simply in euphoria with every mouthful, be it sweet or savoury, an absolute delight in her mouth.
A cacophony of cutlery clattering against dishes and mindless grunts could be heard from the teacher's desk as she mounted food into her mouth nearly faster than she could chew it so as to ensure the maximum amount of calories could be crammed into her stomach in as little time as possible.
Despite her feasting, Jafit was still a diligent teacher though and, as often as her appetite allowed her, she did make genuine remarks about her students dishes in her records...albeit most of them were unsurprisingly swung towards the higher end.

As her fork clattered into the bottom of a ceramic dish that had contained a sizable portion of hand made carbonara, Jafit leaned back heavily in her chair, browsing her options for her next course.
Licking her plump lips clean of cheese sauce, Jafit's eyes glazed ever so slightly as she massaged her belly out of arousal rather than discomfort before a wickedly pleasant thought had crossed her mind.

Tina Cooper was a promising student in one of Jafit's many Sophomore classes and, despite her age, was constantly pushing herself to make all of her dishes bigger and better much to the joy of Jafit over the passing weeks and today had been no exception.
Over the course of the double period Tina had managed to construct a three tiered cheesecake, a cake which Jafit had been daydreaming about since laying eyes on it.
Now that her stomach was suitably lined and prepared for such a culinary delight, it felt like the right time to carry out Tina's latest assessment.

Licking her lips again, this time hungrily, Jafit placed both hands on her chair and, with a mighty heave, released her bloated hips from the increasingly tighter seat.
With her shoes long discarded, the tanned chef waddled barefoot to the fridge where her prize awaited her, thick bulging love handles jiggling with each step atop her seismic arse which was held tightly in place by her jeggings.
Panting slightly as she reached the chiller, Jafit whipped the door open, smirking as the cold rushed out and hugged her exposed belly before laying eyes on her quarry.
Drenched in chocolate and loaded with heavy cream, the huge dessert was Jafit's hunger embodied and there was no hesitation in her dragging the large cake out and placing it on the floor clear of the door.

A moment of contemplation washed over the chef as she closed the fridge door and, with a begrudging glance to her desk, resigned herself to her previous perch being too far away to carry her new feast.
With a tired shrug Jafit instead placed her back against the fridge and slid down it, landing heavily in arms reach of the cheesecake she was about to devour.
Her landing had little grace in it as the growing chef dragged her food a little closer, thighs stretching her jeggings a little further and her belly sat heavily on the stretch denim. Her ever swelling boobs also settled heavily on top of her gut although her oversized bra did require a minor adjustment to keep its bulging contents secure.

Sufficiently comfortable, Jafit pounced once again into creamy decadence.
"Oh god, this is so good!" she moaned through full lips as her hands worked over time to keep the dessert coming as fast as she could eat it.
It didn't take long for the culinary teacher to feel awkwardly twisted to her side as she ate and, mostly dragged by her own front weight, she ended up on her knees facing the cake straight on which only served to hasten her eating as the first tier disappeared into her gut.
Arousal kicking in more as she ate more, one hand trailed off from feeding to knead the rolls of fat bunched at her side eliciting a deep moan from the chef, spurring her frenzy on even more like a jockey pushing an exceptionally fat horse.
With time completely lost on her, Jafit was only aware of her eating and indulging blindly in the most amazing cheesecake she had ever eaten, or, at the very least, the most amazing cheesecake she had eaten that night.

*****

Silence had befallen the classroom.
No more clattering of cutlery.
No more animalistic grunting.
No more...

"BUUUURP!"
The gut wrenching belch was followed by a soft accented giggle as Jafit gently dropped the now empty cheesecake plate to her side, her back once again rested against the fridge which it had come from.
Although a now seasoned binger, Jafit had never eaten so much in one sitting and she felt a little drunk off the sensation.
She had vague flashes of memory from eating the cheesecake now that it had gone.
At one point she had taken to all fours to eat straight from the plate before reverting back to her current seated position to shovel the last remnants into her hungry mouth.
All Jafit was truly sure of at this point though was that her belly as sat very heavily on her thighs and it felt so good.

As the bloated chef sat on the floor massaging her exposed gut, giggling and belching all the while in her stuffed euphoria, many things crossed her mind...
None of which she got to fully consider as a sharp knocking rang through her classroom door.

Immediately shaken from her daze, Jafit realised she was sat on the floor, empty serving receptacles scattered around the room with her belly on full display and now likely too small shirt bunched up under her boobs.
All of that was without drawing attention to the fact that her arse was completely exposed also as she'd had to roll her jeggings down as they were too tight for extensive periods of bending over.

None of that mattered though as the classroom door swung open to reveal...

These characters are freshmen. And as such, they have a lot to look forward to! But they're also the most unfamiliar with the campus. However, you have a lot longer to tell their prospective stories!

She's much brainier than any of the other women in her family, with high test scores and qualifying for the Yeng Excellence Scholarship. She excels in most areas academically, but what she doesn't have that her sisters and mother do is a winning personality. 1211.content:
The size of this place alone was intimidating.

Hunter came from a town where tall buildings were for places of business. She’d never been to any kind of campus that had six stories and three wings and a courtyard and a dome at the top in the middle and creepy stained glass windows. They didn’t have buildings like this back home. In her little beach town, this place would have gotten destroyed. It all looked so new and exciting…

But also 100% absolutely terrifying at the same time.

Was that weird?

Like, as a logical person she knew that she shouldn’t be afraid of a building. Or intimidated by the size of the campus. It was just a bunch of land with a lot of bricks on it. But the cabins along the mountainside and the golf carts puttering up the gentle slopes of the unofficial road system that had been paved, catching the harsh morning sun against the bright gray pavement… it all looked so… so…

“Aw geez, this place is creepy.” her mother said with a little laugh as she touched her daughter by the shoulder, “It’s like something out of a horror movie, right sweetie?”

“Mom!” Hunter whipped around, beet-red as she felt her mother’s hand touch her shoulder, “Stop that!”

“I’m just saying—like, you are going to come home right?” Mz. Black snorted, “You’re probably too young to remember the Outer Limits, but—”

“Oh my God.” Hunter squeezed her eyes shut, “It’s not… It’s not that creepy!”

“Kind’ve creepy.”

“Stop!”

“Probably gonna replace you with a robot.”

“Mom stoooop!”

This was Hunter’s chance. She knew that—and so did her mother, Harper.

Without her sister pulling these connections with her old boss, there wasn’t a snowball’s chance in hell of anyone from the Black family ever making it in this ritzy Academy. Even with her grades, good fortune rarely smiled on the often-bullied, hand-me-down-wearing, too-smart-for-her-own-good Hunter Black. She knew that—and so did Harper.

It was just something of a Black family tradition to joke around in light of serious situations. It’s how they dealt with things back home in their little mill house.

It was easier than admitting that this was going to be the first time that sweet baby Hunter Black had ever been away from home longer than a sleepover. Or that Harper was officially going to have an empty nest before 50. They were both scared, and that was okay. Not necessarily of the campus, but more of what it represented. “Change and stuff” as her mother had put it awkwardly during the 6-hour car ride. Multiple times.

“I’m gonna miss you, kiddo.” Harper said as she wrapped her arms around her daughter, “You make sure to call me.”

“Okay.” Hunter hugged her mom tightly

“Or unless this weird Stepford School has something against that.” Harper snuggled tighter, “Then you text me.”

“Okay.” Hunter grunted

“E-mail. Skype. Whatever apps you kids are using.”

“Mama.”

“Your youth keeps me young.”

“MAMA.”

***


There wasn’t a lot of sense in bringing her wardrobe to an Academy like this. They would provide her with her uniform(s?) and all the other clothing she’d need. She’d brought along a few of her favorite shirts—mostly hand-me-downs from her sister Piper. But for the most part, her suitcases were filled with whatever she could fit from her bedroom back home. Family photos, posters from her wall, some knick-knacks.

Just something to make all of this feel more… normal, somehow.

Hunter didn’t really see that happening.

But if she wanted to go anywhere with her life, she would have to suck it up. She wasn’t going to get into a good college by staying in Daven’s Port. And this was a once in a lifetime opportunity that had literally been handed to her. A full ride to one of the most prestigious schools in America? How could she refuse?

So there was little Hunter, wheeling her suitcase behind her as she set foot onto this huge, foreboding fortress of higher learning.

The only question was… where the heck was she supposed to go?
1211.title: Accepting Hunter Black

choices: Hunter hears the door—it must be her roommate!
