Hunter unpacks her room, and saves her basket for later.
12111.content:
Hunter didn’t bring a lot of personal items with her. Why would she, right? But even her paltry suitcase filled with what she had chosen to bring along with her seemed at least twice as heavy after having to lug it up four floors.

She would have taken the elevator, if there had been room. A flock of girls, each about the size of a tank, had decided to fill it up before she could make her way inside. There wouldn’t have been enough room for little ol’ her inside, let alone her suitcase, if she decided to squeeze next to that big blob of chocolate pudding or that redhead with the tits.

So the stairs it was—looking at those girls was enough motivation to take the stairs anyway.

But God if lugging her crap up all those stairs wasn’t murder on her back.

Well, slight correction. Her breasts had been the most murder on her back. The ol’ Black Family Boobies hadn’t left her much for vertebrae. Add into the fact that she was very much an “indoor” girl and voila—you’ve got an aching back and boob sweat.

Oy vey, she sounded like her mother…

Never mind. The point was that, after four flights of stairs, Hunter was finally right where she needed to be. 5th Floor, East Wing, in the Spencer Suites.

This was a newer part of the building, as were the two floors above it, with this floor’s construction in particular financed by the backers at Boonliang International. The hardwood flooring was of a different grain than the floors below. The Vandergriff suites were above, and the Hammond were above that. This Academy could hold an army if it had to—Hunter was just grateful that she only had to go up to the fifth floor. She didn’t know who the fuck these Boonliang people were, but it wouldn’t have killed them to have their suites a few flights lower.

Room 114, 115…

At least there was an elevator on either side of the hall. It must have started on the second floor, because Hunter certainly hadn’t been presented with the option of not taking the stairs…

116, 117…

Lots of vending machines on this hallway.

122, 123…

Room 123! Just the one she was looking for. Easy to remember and relatively near the elevator. Awesome.

Hunter held her Student ID up to the iris on her dorm’s security device and waited for the light to turn green. Wheeling her suitcase inside, Hunter was greeted with the sight of her lavish new dorm room—a million times nicer than anything she had back home!

Big couch, big TV (and no dumb sisters/Mom to crowd it!) and a full kitchen set. Bedrooms by the looks of it, each with their own closet and bathroom…

Moving towards the door on the right, Hunter touched the light switch. She had a Queen bed, all to herself, and a dresser, all to herself, a neat little desk, a closet and the cleanest bathroom that she had ever set foot inside…

Hunter should have moved out a long time ago!

But the kicker? On her bed was a great big welcome basket, full of snacks! Her older sister Piper used to work for Yeng so she’d grown up on all the good stuff. It wasn’t name brand, but it was better! Honey buns, apple pies, cupcakes and muffins… Hunter hadn’t had some of these in years!

“That almost makes the flight of stairs worth it.” Hunter smacked her lips as she unwrapped a chocolate cupcake, “Almost.”

Without further adieu…
12111.title: Lap of Luxury

choices: Hunter decides to separate from Lucy, maybe she can meet someone friendlier
Hunter spends her first dinner with Lucy...
Someone approaches Hunter before she reaches the cafeteria
121111.content:
...Hunter began digging through the welcome basket's content.

Her taste buds were going crazy. The Black family has never been rich, and yet never managed to be short of food. However the lunches were, for the most part, either the usual five ingredients Harper cooked in different ways, or a fast-food takeaway.

But these sweets, the cupcakes, the honey buns, the chocolate bars, were stuff the black-haired girl had eaten once every blue moon. Did this school have an infinite supply of these? She hoped so as she grabbed another of those soft treats. This time it was a chocolate with a milky cream inside.

Despite being seized in the middle of the tasting, Hunter's ears pricked up as she heard the door opening, followed by some heavy steps. She got up from her seated position on the bed and peeked through the open door.

The girl who had just entered had shoulder-length messy dirty-blonde hair on her round face with a piggish nose. She was breathing heavily, and Hunter wasn't surprised by it, this girl was fat. She was probably a good fifty pounds or likely more heavier than the dark haired girl. On top of it, Hunter noted with some discomfort that the blonde's chest couldn't rival hers; instead her bottom got the lion share of lard, along with a rotund belly.

The new girl looked around with her small and sharp green eyes, and when she turned to Hunter's room, the freshman hid herself behind the door. Her chest shook from the movement.

Hunter slapped her forehead. "You idiot!" She whispered to herself "She's your roommate, you will share the year with her".
The girl remembered that the school has a "big sister program" where, save special requests, every freshmen is paired with an older student to help them getting acclimatized.

She glanced back at her "big sister", and big was indeed the right word, and saw the blonde dragging her suitcase in the other room; then she left the room and was going to the other one.
Hunter panicked as she saw her roommate’s large figure looming towards her with heavy steps. Then she closed her eyes, and took a deep breath as her roommate opened the door.

The bottom heavy blonde looked at Hunter straight into the eyes. The dark haired girl remained quiet, and then slowly waved her hand.

"Hello, my n-name is Hunter Black. You're my roommate, right?"

A smug smile appeared on the blonde's face "I knew you were already here” while she was talking, she glanced at the welcome basket on the bed. "My name's Lucy" she said as she moved to the basket.

"Lucy what?" Asked Hunter in an attempt to get to know her new roommate. Knowing the full name seemed the least, after all.

"Lucy notyourbusiness" blurted the pear-shaped girl. Then she took a look at the basket; Hunter ate just a few treats, and there were still three quarter of the sweets left.

"Oh good, chocolate brownie" said Lucy licking her lips. Then she picked a small brownie and pressed it whole into her mouth, only to gulp it down in a couple of bites.

"Hey! That is actually mine!" Said Hunter pointing at the basket.

Lucy stared her down as she picked up a chocolate bare and gave it a large bite.
Then she went to Hunter, so close that her belly was squished against Hunter's flat one.
The blonde was almost a head taller than the freshman, and larger all over (except in the chest). Hunter zipped her mouth as she felt her roommate’s glare.

Lucy took another bite of chocolate "Ok, let's make some rules so we can live civilly. Rule number one, I'm older, so I make the rules" she took the last bite of chocolate. "Rule number two, the younger must obey the older" she gulped down. "Rule number three, everything in this dorm room is mine" as she said the last line, she picked the basket and left the room.

Hunter leaned from the door "Wait! That was for me. Don't you have one?"

"Of course I do, but two is better than one, don't you agree?" Lucy then plopped onto the couch, her butt taking up almost half of it, and turned on the tv.

"Hey, you can watch this movie with me if you want" said Lucy from the sofa.

Hunter sighed. That wasn't the best way to start off a new year. She had already dealt with these kind of girls back at Daven’s Port and knew that it was better to not reply or fight back, otherwise she would've probably received a punch in the face. Lucy was fat, but seemed to be quite strong too.

So Hunter sat next to her looking at a boring and generic action movie. The freshman looked at the blonde pushing a cupcake through her pillowy lips and started to salivate a bit. She would've really wanted another one of them but was afraid to even ask.

-----

"Hey, pipsqueak, go to my dorm and get my second basket" ordered Lucy once she finished the snacks, throwing the empty basket away.

"C-can't you do it yourself?" Asked Hunter.

Lucy frowned and patted her stuffed gut. "I'm too full to get up" she snarled.

The black-haired girl didn't reply back and got up. She knew Lucy could get up if she wanted, but also that she would've gotten punished if she disobeyed.

She went into Lucy's room. It was just the same as hers: personal bathroom, desk, wardrobe and a queen sized bed. On the latter there was the welcome basket, still untouched. As she picked it, Hunter was really tempted to steal a snack, even only that little honey bun. But she was afraid that Lucy might notice it missing, so she resisted.

Before leaving the room, her attention went to the case, still not emptied and simply abandoned next to the wall. As she got closer, Hunter could read a plate that said:

"Lucy Longbottom"

She couldn't help but giggle upon learning Lucy's surname. It was just too silly, and found it particularly fitting for a girl with a large butt like her.

"Hey! Why are you laughing?" Asked the blonde from the couch.

"Uh... I wasn't laughing" replied Hunter as she left the room, and could see her roommate looking at her with suspicion.

----

Hunter had to remain next to Lucy for the entire movie, all while the latter was stuffing her face with delicious snacks. The blonde made some jokes once in a while and Hunter had to laugh if she didn't want to anger the sophomore.

However, after a while, the busty girl raised the nerve to speak up, and asked; "Isn't there anything else we can do?"

Lucy looked at the clock on her phone. "Sure, dinner has begun half an hour ago, and I'm quite eager to fill my stomach".

"Isn't that all you've done until now?" Thought Hunter gazing at Lucy's belly, which was protruding over the belt of the uniform, looking for taut than earlier.

Without any effort despite her size, Lucy raised herself from the couch and opened the dorm's door.

"Follow me if you want to know where the cafeteria is" said the blonde in a tone that made it seem more like an order.

However, Hunter intended to follow her anyway, hoping that a rich dinner could improve her first day of school.
121111.title: Ravenous and ruthless roomate

choices: to the cafeteria, by herself—she'll just avoid Lucy; and besides, she's hungry!
for a walk outside—Hunter discovers some older girls partying at the old track!
to the library—at least it'll be quiet...
Before she can decide, Hunter bumps into a big ol' booty belonging to her RA!
1211111.content:
“Uh, yeah, I’ll…” Hunter bit her bottom lip contemplatively, “I’ll meet you down there.”

This was met only with a curious cock of a disdainful eyebrow as Lucy Longbottom looked her up and down. With just one look she seemed to dare her to say it again. The bigger girl let out a small noise—a petulant puff—from her piggish nose.

“I’ve, uh… gotta pee.” Hunter smiled sheepishly, hoping to abate her roommate

“Suit yourself.” Lucy rolled her eyes and turned, her belly bobbing in front of her, “Don’t blame me when you get lost then.”

And with that, Hunter’s roommate walked out the door and slammed it behind her—what a bitch!

‘I can’t believe I’m going to have to live with that hog…’

Hunter relaxed for the first time since her night with Lucy began. She sank into her seat on the couch and leaned her head back. God what a pain—she’d had to deal with older sisters growing up, but she’d never had to deal with someone so entitled as Little Miss Longbottom!

***


The halls of Buttercombe Academy were wide. Everything had this sort of wholesome pale-yellow, kind of creamy color to it. Like everything was put through an Instagram filter. The sconces on the wall gleamed against the tiled floors, freshly waxed for a new semester, and Hunter’s footsteps echoed back at her from the end, there.

Click-Clack, Click-Clack

It was hard for her to believe that there weren’t more girls around. Classes did start Monday, right? It was only Saturday—should a school this size still be this empty?

At least she wasn’t trapped with Lucy Longbottom.

God, what a bitch.

Being alone was preferable to being trapped with someone who held you hostage. Even if it was in a new place. Full of new people. Away from her friends. Away from her Mom…

A shiver ran up Hunter’s spine—she was suddenly aware of just how stranded she was in a place like this. It reminded her of being a little girl at a sleepover. The other girls would tell ghost stories and she’d cry that she wanted to go home… except this sleepover lasted 4 years and she was graded on it.

‘Well that was depressing.’ Hunter thought to herself, soured by her own inner monologue, ‘Maybe I should explore a little? Maybe get my mind off of how friggin’ sad I can make myself…’

The only trouble is, in a place as big as this, where was a freshman girl to go?
1211111.title: Ditch Your Roommate!

choices: A tiny girl with a large presence
A surprisingly fat girl for a freshman
A girl who speaks with a thick foreign accent
12111111.content:
Hunter felt completely alone in those wide and void halls. Alone in a place she didn't know, like an explorer lost in an old cave; a colorful one, but still empty. The only sounds were her steps that echoed on the walls. If only she could meet someone else nicer than that fat hog of her roomate - not that it was much - but it seemed all the students have disappeared. That couldn't be possible. Just an hour ago, there were dozens of girls literally filling the school with their fat bodies.
Of course, you didn't need to be as smart as Hunter to guess where all these fatties could have gone: to the cafeteria.

She thought that maybe she was being stereotypical, but if she were a fat glutton like most students seemed to be, and Lucy was a perfect example, she would've gone there. Besides, she had just spent her time watching that hog of Longbottom eating snacks, her snacks, while she could only sample a few before having her basket confiscated. So, if the remote possibility of the cafeteria being empty is true, she could've at least had a nice dinner. Buttercombe's broshure said very clearly they provided a complete meal service with a wide and healthy variety of options and so far it has proven it has every kind of comfort. Heck, walking in the halls, she could see many vending machines, all of whom had "YENG" written in bold on the sides.

----

It wasn't that hard finding the cafeteria in such a large school thanks to the many sings in the halls, and she could guess the distance by the noises getting louder and louder.

She peeked through the glass windows of the wide double doors and saw many girls of different sizes, from among the fattest she had ever seen, to small and petite ones. All were wearing the school yellow uniform. Thankfully, there was no sight of Lucy's messy blonde head among the fat crowd, so she opened the door without fear. Although she felt unease among all these girls she didn't know. She was grateful her arrival was gone unnoticed

She could see a long line of booths, each serving a large (in both senses) variety of food.

"Well, the school didn't lie about this" thought Hunter as she licked her lips in anticipation.

In fact, there were more choices available she didn't know what to choose. They looked all inviting. Burgers, ice cream, noodles, soups, chicken wings, desserts she couldn't even name and many more.
The dark haired girl moved back and forth along the serving tables to decide what to pick. She thought to try things she could rarely eat at home, narrowing the choices, and there were still many dishes to choose! She was tempted to pick a bit of everything, but that would've been too much, so in the end she went with spaghetti with meatballs and a couple of tacos. On a second thought, she also took some fries and some fried eggplants as side dish.
Hunter thoght maybe she had still picked a tad too much at the sight of her tray's content, but then ignored that thoght with a shoulders scroll. She was hungry, and had an already shitty day, at least this will help her raise the mood.

She looked for a table, making sure to not spot a familiar messy blonde head, but still no trace of that fat bitch.
She saw some tables with some friendly faces, one was full of young girls, and she guessed they were freshman like her, and maybe even future classmates. It was the right chance, but as soon as she attempted to join them, her legs didn't move while her cheeks became red. Hunter was just too shy to go, and now she was standing in the middle of the cafeteria like an idiot. With that thought, she felt more unease and wondered if someone noticed her.

Then, a voice called:

"So, you're a freshman too, aren't you? Would you like to join me?" Said a gentle voice behind her.

Hunter turned and saw the one who called her..
12111111.title: Alone and hungry

choices: Welcome, Freshmen...
Skip ahead
And now for something completely different
121112.content:
Hunter cooed with delight as she bit into her chocolate cupcake. "Oh my god, those are even better then I remembered!"

Taking a moment to drop her suitcase on her bed, Hunter grabbed her basket and took it to the sitting area. She placed it on the side table, and took off her hoodie, throwing it over a nearby chair. A little comfier, the raven haired teen plopped down on the couch and grabbed the absolutely monstrous remote.

"This thing has more buttons then my laptop. I feel like I could hack the Pentagon with this thing."

It took her a moment, but pretty soon she had the TV humming along nicely. Hunter knew she should probably put her stuff away, but with her room mate currently MIA, she had the place all to herself, and she wasn't sure when she'd have such an opportunity again. Finding one of her favorite movies on the tube, Hunter leaned back and started digging into her epic stash of goodies.

The first thing she found was another of those triple-chocolate, fudge-stuffed cupcakes. A few large bites saw the delectable morsel disappear into her small belly. Seeing her well-endowed bust had caught a number of crumbs, Hunter took a moment to pick them off and eat them, trying to avoid staining her shirt.

Next was a trio of the cinnamon encrusted apple pies. The innards were sweet and creamy, the pastry beautifully flaky, and the sugar on the outside had been toasted to form a light, crispy shell. Honestly, they were simply divine. Hunter had originally planned only on eating one, but they'd simply been way too good.

A box of strawberry champagne mini-muffins was next to go, and even with her advanced vocabulary, Hunter felt she lacked sufficient words to describe them. Light, airy, delicious beyond words. Then again, she'd always had a weakness for strawberries.

Hunter had nearly finished a bag of honey buns when she heard the door opening. Looking towards the entrance, she saw the clock and realized she'd been snacking for a little over an hour. Feeling a mite sheepish at losing track of time like that, she quickly licked the sticky goodness off her fingers as her room mate for the year came in. Though generally not the most confident girl in the world, Hunter tried hard to be polite. "Hi, I'm Hunter Black! I'm guessing you're my roomie for the year?"

The new girl smiled, showing off her braces as she answered. "Yep, that's me! Amber Smythe."

Hunter looked over the new girl as they shook hands. She was a tall, leggy blonde, with piercing green eyes and more freckles then you could shake a stick at. If Hunter had to guess, Amber was about 5'7" or 5'8". Her long hair ran straight to the middle of her back, and was currently tied in a ponytail. Unlike the other members of Buttercombe that Hunter had seen, Amber was built like a twig, and since any curves she might develop hadn't come in yet, she wound up looking very lanky and awkward.

Amber, meanwhile, couldn't stop staring at Hunter's tits. The olive skinned girl had opened the top buttons of her shirt, and Amber found herself staring down into a massive valley of cleavage. Even the random crumbs on her bosom couldn't detract from the impressiveness of her well-endowed roomie's udders, and Amber felt a pang of inadequacy as she compared herself to the short, young woman.

Hunter, meanwhile, was unaware of the thoughts currently going through her new room mate's head. The two girls promptly got to talking- where they were from, what they were excited about, etc. Amber came from California. Her Dad was a lawyer and her Mom was a lab tech with Yeng's west coast branch, and between the two managed to get their daughter a spot at Buttercombe academy.

Amber seemed a very down to earth girl, much to Hunter's relief. She'd been worried she was going to wind up with a spoiled, preppy brat. "Or an angry, verbally abusive land-whale," she thought, thinking back to the tubs of lard riding the elevator upon her arrival.

Amber, having just dropped her suit case in her room, came back with her own welcome basket. "Jesus, this thing is huge! Was yours this big?"

"Oh yeah. They definitely don't skimp on the portions." Hunter looked over to her basket, a little taken aback by just how massive a dent she'd put into it.

"I'm starting to see why there's so many big girls on this campus," Amber said as she dug through her basket. "Hey, do you want any? There's no way I can eat all of this. Help yourself to whatever you want."

Hunter was initially going to say no, but as she looked over at Amber's stash, she noticed that her welcome gift had several treats that hers didn't. Nanaimo bars, powdered doughnuts, coconut squares covered in chocolate, and many, many more.

She really couldn't stop herself from reaching for a sample. "Well, maybe just one or two..."

******

"One or two" had quickly become three-quarters of Amber's basket.

Realizing too late what she'd done, Hunter apologized profusely. If Amber had been offended by her room mate's show of gluttony, she certainly hid it well, insisting that she didn't need to apologize. After all, she argued, she'd offered it freely.

One and three-quarters of a monster amount of treats like that was a lot for anyone, and Hunter found herself with a stomach ache afterwards.

"Well, no wonder," she thought. "That's way too much junk food."

"Hey, Amber, could you excuse me for a minute? I got to see if they have some pepto or something in this joint."

"Sure thing. They said there'll be a few items in each person's medicine cabinet in their bathroom. Just don't take too long; we got to get to the Freshmen welcoming ceremony."

Hunter mentally kicked herself for forgetting that. Seeing the clock, she saw they had 20 minutes to get there. "K, I'll be quick."

Hunter went into her bathroom and opened the cabinet. There wasn't much inside. A box of band-aids, a carton of Q-tips, and a couple small bottles, each with only one or two pills in them. The note on the back of the cabinet read, Please speak to our staff regarding any special requirements you may have.

Hunter picked up and looked at each of the bottles. "Acetaminophen. Ibuprofen. Hydrogen peroxide. Oh, wait, what's this?"

The latest bottle she picked up said Yeng Brand Stomach Aid: Extra Strength Formula.

"Oh, thank God," Hunter thought as she opened the jar. She was a little surprised that this one was full to the brim, whereas most of the others were nearly empty. This mystery would have to wait, as she swallowed one of the tabs with a mouthful of water from the sink. Within a couple minutes, the busty teen was already feeling a little better.

"Hunter, let's go! We're going to be late!"

Amber's shout spurred the youngest Black into motion. "Coming!" she said as she left the bathroom as quickly as she could.

Had she more time, Hunter might have read the full description on the bottle:

Yeng Brand Stomach Aid: Extra Strength Formula
For those REALLY BIG meals!
121112.title: Just sit back and relax, Miss Black

choices: After sitting through Polluck's speech, Hunter's hungry—it's chowtime!
Hunter manages to make some new friends. Imagine, her, friends!
Ms. Polluck's speech outlines some... strange... rules.
1211121.content:
Every year, Buttercombe Academy held its annual Orientation Ceremony in the cafeteria.

Freshmen scurried from their dorm rooms and into the main building, where they were greeted with the heady aromas and hearty ambiance that they would eventually learn could only come from a Buttercombe establishment. They had an entire culinary coalition working day and night to ensure that this graduating class was greeted with only the best that they had to offer, and not a morsel was going to waste.

But more on that later.

Hunter and Amber entered the great hall like two tiny fish leaving their stream and entering a pond for the first time, bug eyed in wonder at the vastness of something as simple as the eatery in what was to be their home for the next four years. Buttercombe had made it very clear in the short time that they had been enrolled that they spared no expense in the satisfaction of their students, but this defied expectations entirely.

Long tables lined the rear wall, far far back underneath the ornate windows that overlooked the courtyard (Hunter recognized from the brochure) and a quarter-way through the room before stopping at a fashionable island partition. On the other side, smaller more personable tables dotted the area before giving way to more long ones along the back wall. An army of girls, none much older or younger than herself Hunter guessed, lined up to enter one side of a much smaller room while others exited out the opposite side with their trays piled high.

Further along the other side of the cafeteria, there were more tables. That's where Hunter and Amber sat. Better to risk sitting there with some unfamiliar girls than being separated filling in empty spots on the long tables that gave a better view of the small stage that had been erected, along with a podium, along the partition.

"Ladies?" a voice, thick and exhausted, plead into the microphone, "Let's get everyone seated, now."

Hunter's mind boggled at the size of Ms. Polluck every time she saw her. This was the first time she'd seen her standing up, too. Her mountainous middle kept her a full foot and a half away from the comparatively dinky microphone that had been clipped onto the wood. Instead, a wireless model had been attached to her ear and wrapped around her tennis-ball cheeks. The podium was clearly for support, as the fat woman leaned into it and gripped it on either side with her feeble flabby grip.

"Who's that?" Amber whispered into her roommate's ear, amazement and amusement evident in her voice

"That's Ms. Polluck." Hunter answered, "She's the headmistress."

"I thought the Asian lady was the headmistress?"

With everyone still gathering their meals, finding their friends, and about half of them wondering the same thing as Amber, it was understandable that it took some time for the cafeteria to grow quiet. Even still, Ms. Polluck's puffy face grew red at the thought of standing for so long under her own power. The smell of food wafting in the air agitated her, beckoning her to come down and join her students for a little orientation snack. Never the less, somehow her great struggle went unabated.

"Welcome, Freshmen." Ms. Polluck said in her huffy voice after everything had quieted down (enough) "To Buttercombe Academy. Your home, and alma mater, for what will hopefully be the most memorable four years of your life."
1211121.title: Welcome, Freshmen...

choices: Buttercombe Staff
Dr. Schwartz
"Yes, and you are...?"
12111211.content:
"... and we're instituting a new Waste Reduction plan for the cafeteria this year, and I know you ladies will do your part to eliminate needless food waste..."

Hunter was only paying passing attention to Miss Polluck's unexpectedly lengthy speech. Despite how much she'd already eaten, for whatever reason, she was feeling totally famished. The food smells were starting to drive her mad, and the Headmistress couldn't wrap it up fast enough.

"... and your student cards will be credited appropriately. Room drop offs will occur between 8 and 10 o'clock during the week. Please see your student handbook for your dorms applicable weekend schedule..."

Hunter was starting to drool. "Hurry up, Miss Polluck..."

"... and extra credit will be given to students who notably excel in their efforts..."

"Oh my God, please just finish," Hunter thought as she wiggled in her seat.

"This is your first step in your time here at Buttercombe, and I have no doubt you will excel both here and in everything you do. Thank you for your time, and good luck in your studies." With that, Shannon Polluck leaned back from the ominously creaking podium. Shannon stepped backwards, her massive frame visibly jiggling in her tight, form-fitting uniform. Though the students didn't know it, Shannon had just been fitted for this outfit the previous week. Her consumption had hit a new high over the last couple years, and her already bloated body was growing by leaps and bounds. A few short, shuddering steps brought the heavy headmistress to an overbuilt loveseat. Collapsing into it with a massive sigh of relief, a loud groan echoed from the distressed piece of furniture. With the seat successfully holding up her considerable bulk (for now, at least), a couple of attendants brought out a table and cartload of food which Miss Polluck dug into with hoggish gusto.

Hunter didn't see any of this, having got up from her seat at the tail end of Polluck's speech. Amber had been left in the dust, and the blonde found herself having to motor to keep up with her olive-skinned roomie. Taking only the barest moment to scan her student card, Hunter grabbed a tray and began to ransack the shockingly vast spread arrayed before her.

Spaghetti and meatballs would be good.

Garlic bread, definitely want.

Ooh, they have lasagna. Maybe a small slice.

Tacos? Just a taste should be fine.

That chicken con pollo smells so good.

Maybe a piece of cherry pie for dessert. Or do I want lemon meringue? Oh, but those brownies smell so, so good.

The rumbling, hollow feeling coming from her stomach made up her mind for her, and Hunter absolutely heaped her tray with food, heavily favoring pasta dishes and desserts. Amber's eyes nearly bugged out of her head at the sheer quantity Miss Black had taken. Far more self-conscious after all she'd thus far witnessed, Amber's plate was considerably lighter, consisting predominantly of salad and vegetables.

The two girls sat down, Hunter with a noticeable bounce from her enhanced bust. She started devouring her food without preamble, swallowing it as fast as she could move it into her mouth. Other girls nearby stared at her display of gluttony, and there was a lot of pointing and whispering. The raven-haired teen failed to notice the spectacle she was making of herself, far too engrossed into her massive meal.

Holy hell, why am I so hungry!?"

******

"Easy does it, girl."

"Ugh," Hunter groaned. Hunter hadn't managed to finish her gigantic platter of food, her eyes far, far too big for her stomach in this instance. She'd eaten until she felt bloated, rested a few minutes, then tried stuffing even more down her throat. Hunter had made a huge dent in her pile, but now felt terribly ill and could barely move from the pain in her belly.

She had arm over Amber's shoulder, the blonde helping the overstuffed girl back to their dorm. She blushed slightly, both from the proximity of Hunter's oversized breasts and from the large amount of attention the girl had garnered her way. Looks of incredulity and disgust from the Freshmen contrasted with the looks of empathy and understanding from the Upperclassmen; the latter were slightly worrying, Amber felt.

Amber hadn't missed just how large the average girl at Buttercombe was. The frosh students were mostly normal weights with a few more overweight individuals then standard, but the bulk of the upperclassmen ran the gamut from chubby to fat to unbelievably huge. And even among that heavy weight crowd, Hunter had held her own consumption wise, limited only by her smaller gastric capacity.

Amber helped her lay down on her bed. Hunter's belly was rock hard and left her looking nine months pregnant with triplets. The zipper on her uniform's skirt had popped during the meal, and only a safety pin had kept her decent during the long walk back to their rooms.

Granted, it was actually a really short walk, but it certainly felt long with how slow they had to go.

As Hunter lay there groaning, Amber asked, "You going to be okay?"

"Yeah, I- URRRPPPP!" Hunter blushed as she let out a loud burp. "Er, excuse me. Yeah, I'll be fine. I swear I don't know what came over me. I never eat that much."

"Don't worry about it. Seriously, it's not like you stood out in that crowd. You sure you'll be fine?"

"It hurts, but I just need sleep, then I'll be good."

"Alright, sleep well, then. I'll grab you early tomorrow so we can get that skirt fixed before classes."

"Okay, sounds good. Good night," Hunter yawned as Amber turned off the light and left the room. As Miss Smythe closed the door, Hunter grabbed the last of her triple chocolate and fudge cupcakes from her night stand. Her belly hurt so much, but she couldn't just let it sit there uneaten. Hunter was many things, but she was certainly no fool, and the young woman had a fairly strong hunch what the culprit was.

"What the heck is IN those stomach pills!?"

******

Although she thought she'd waited a sufficient amount of time, Amber heard Hunter unwrapping the cupcake.

"How can she still be hungry!?" Amber thought, shaking her head incredulously. "If she keeps eating like that, she'll be the fattest hog on campus."

Amber's mind went to the 500+ pound Shannon Polluck, stuffing herself on stage until she burst the buttons on her jacket. She thought about those two blubbery land whales, slowly waddling down the path as she helped Hunter walk. Then there was that one girl on the scooter, who filled the oversized elevator by herself, forcing the two to wait for the next one.

"And in this place, that would be one HELL of an accomplishment."

Amber's blushing thoughts of Hunter's gluttony and just what she'd look like at the Headmistress' weight were interrupted by a knock at their door. She jumped a bit at the sound before wondering, "Who could that be?"
12111211.title: Chekhov's Meal Plan

choices: Go see Mrs Banks and get a note—even if it means skipping class AND breakfast..
Amber's right—it's their fault her uniform's messed up so why should she suffer?
121112111.content:
Amber opened the door to reveal another student—albeit one much older and significantly more round than she was.

As if all this supposition about size and appetites had summoned her, the girl at the door was astonishingly big. Built like a barrel and already testing the capacity of her new uniform, Amber could see that girl's belly hung so low that she'd tucked it underneath her long pleated skirt. She leaned her weight against a trolley, its three rows stacked efficiently with cardboard boxes and most of them opened.

"Hi! Room 123?" the belly-heavy girl blocking their doorway asked in a breathy sort of voice, "Black and Hadley?"

"Y...yeah?" Amber opened the door a little bit further, allowing more of her gigantic guest's frame to come into view, "I'm Amber Hadley."

"Great, I've got your uniforms for you right here." the older girl smiled, her thick face folding into deep dimples, "Here, lemme just..."

Bending over was a struggle for the older girl. Heavy grunts of exertion followed a slow descent downwards, her belly rolls folding in on each other obstructively. The poor girl's whole body seemed to quiver in disdain of such a minor activity, with her round face growing pig pink and her pillowy arms jiggling. Finally she came to a box at the bottom row, rummaged through with the distinct sound of crinkling plastic, before coming up for air.

"Phew!" she panted, her forehead coated in a thin film of sweat, "Y'all just had to be on the bottom, didn't ya?"

"Yeah, sorry to make you..." Amber smiled awkwardly as she searched for the right words to describe what she'd just witnessed, "...bend over so hard."

"It's alright. Lots of rooms to hit, might as well get used to it." the older girl said with an appreciative chuckle that rippled throughout her face, lifting one meaty arm to wipe at her forehead, "If they don't fit right, you can take them to Mrs. Banks in the Vandergriff building."

Amber was given two sets of uniforms wrapped tightly in plastic wrapping and went inside. Each set had the basic essentials that made up the Buttercombe Academy uniform. An ugly yellow blazer, a blouse with a small bee emblazoned on it, a dumb little tie, an ugly yellow plaid skirt, some knee socks, and clunky black mary janes. Amber had opted for a little more customization, so her package also included a gray sweater vest that she could wear in lieu of the jacket. And Hunter's...

"Oh boy..." Amber snorted, examining Hunter's uniform, "This is gonna be fun in the morning."

***


Hunter hadn't slept well. It was her first night at home, away from her mom, away from Daven's Port, and in a weird new school after eating what felt like her body weight in dinner last night. It was normal to be a little restless. So she was already off to a bad start.

You can imagine how that only got worse when she tumbled out of bed, her belly still squelching from last night's epic feat of gastronomy and her short black hair a mess, only to find Amber not only wide awake and first-day-ready but also clutching something behind her back and looking like the cat that ate the canary.

"Mornin'." Hunter grumbled, rubbing her eyes and smacking her lips, "You look happy."

"Yeah, that's becaaaaaause your uniform came!" Amber giggled past her roommate's question, her arms coming around the front, "Now it's gonna wear a little big..."

Hunter's eyes almost popped out of their head when she saw the sheer size of the blouse they expected her to wear! It was huge, closer to something you'd drape over your armchair than something you'd ever guess a girl like Hunter would wear. Even with her stupid chest, Hunter would practically be swimming in that thing! She could have used it as a beach towel!

"Oh my god." Hunter groaned, running an open palm over her face in embarrassment, "Tell me that's not my uniform and this is one of those weird prep school pranks?"

"Yeah, I didn't think you'd be as excited about it as I was." Amber giggled, turning it over to Hunter so that she could see and feel for herself just how enormous this thing was, "It's yours though, they brought them last night."

"This is just great..." Hunter groaned and made a face as she held the uniform out to its full spread, "I can't wear this!"

"Well, if you keep up like you did night..." Amber teased, thinking back to Hunter's debut at dinnertime, "You might just grow into it!"

"Ha ha." Hunter said flatly with a sensitive arm over her still-distended stomach, "Very funny."

The blazer, skirt, and even the shoes were no better. It was like they'd seen her pig out last night and planned for the future. Hunter couldn't wear this if she gained a hundred pounds! This was clearly a mix-up, and it couldn't have come at a worse time. It was the first day of her new life at this stupid school, and they'd already made it so that she couldn't go to class!

"The girl delivering these told me that you can get it tailored at the Vandergriff." Amber offered helpfully as she grabbed her backpack, "I'm gonna go grab breakfast in the cafeteria... you want to come with?"

"I can't." Hunter grunted, "Didn't you read the rulebook? If I go in without my uniform during school hours, I'll get a demerit..."

"So get a demerit." Amber snorted, "Once you explain, I'm sure it'll be okay."

"But... my uniform..." Hunter's stomach thundered in agony, still struggling to cope with her last visit to the cafeteria, "And my stomach..."

"You can always go to the tailor after classes." Amber suggested with a shrug—her small frame showing that even her uniform as a bit oversized, "I don't think it's smart to miss breakfast or your first day. Your call, though..."

Hunter looked to her roommate, then back to her uniform. What was she going to do?
121112111.title: You'll Grow Into It, Hunter

choices: A moderately large breakfast
A painfully large breakfast
Breakfast of the Apocalypse
1211121112.content:
"Yeah, you're right. I can't miss the first day over this." She held the massively oversized garment next to herself. "Seriously, what were they thinking?"

"Don't know," Amber replied. "Maybe they got yours mixed up with someone else..."

"Maybe..."

"... or maybe they just have BIG expectations for you."

Hunter winced as a shock of sympathy pain went through her tortured stomach. "You're just not going to let that go, are you?"

"Not a chance, roomie."

Hunter threw the garment over the couch in the common room. "Well, I can't wear that. Guess I'll grab my nicer clothes. I could probably wear the tie, at least..."

"Oh, wait a sec," Amber said as she ran to her room. She came back holding the sweater vest they'd sent her in her uniform package. "Here. It's far from perfect, but between this and the tie, and you should be a little closer to the uniform standard."

Hunter happily grabbed the vest from the lanky blonde's hands. "Oh, thank you Amber!"

"Hey, hey, there's no need to thank me that much. Now hurry up and get dressed. I want to grab something to eat before class."

"Ugh," Hunter groaned, her stomach aching at the mere mention of breakfast. "I can't even think about food right now..."

******

"Mmm, it smells so good in here!"

Hunter's belly ached the whole time she was getting dressed, and for the walk with Amber to the dining hall. However, once she got a whiff of the feast being prepared by the staff, those pained gurgles were replaced by almost shockingly hungry ones. She found it hard to believe, but she was practically drooling just standing here, for crying out loud.

"I wonder if that stomach pill hasn't worked its way through my system yet?" Hunter thought, unable to fathom why else she could feel so hungry despite what she'd consumed yesterday.

Amber had already grabbed a tray. She'd loaded up a bowl of fruit, and was currently adding a couple waffles to the plate. Unaware of the thoughts going through Hunter's head, she said, "C'mon, Hunter, you should eat at least a little something. You won't be able to concentrate in class if you're starving all day."

Miss Black's willpower was already extremely low, and she took very little prodding to convince to have breakfast. "But the question is, what should I have..."
1211121112.title: One demerit point won't kill you

choices: Attend class no matter what
I need a doctor
Just let me sleep
12111211123.content:
"Oh God... why..."

"I can't believe you," Amber said. Hunter had her arm over the lanky blonde's shoulder. Her belly, barely recovered from last night, was once more rock hard, and Hunter was in an abominable amount of pain. If it weren't for Amber's help, it's very likely she wouldn't currently be able to move.

"Sorry. I didn't mean t-URP! Oh God."

Amber crinkled her nose as the raven haired girl let a gut ripping belch loose right next to her head. She shook her head, trying to get rid of the ringing in her ear. "Seriously, twice in two days? No, who am I kidding, twice in two meals!?"

"I'm never taking one of those stomach aids again." Another, quieter belch left her mouth, though this time she aimed it away from her room mate. "Ever."

"Keep eating like this, and you'll outgrow the uniform they dropped off by Christmas. Assuming you don't die, at least."

Hunter could only groan in response, focused as she was on placing one shaking leg in front of the other. "Oh God, this hurts," Hunter thought as her mind replayed the events which led her to this state...

******

"Well, I'll just grab a muffin."

That thought seemed innocent enough. After she'd eaten the muffin, though, Hunter felt like she needed a little something else. And so she grabbed a tray, and grabbed a fried egg and a few strips of bacon.

Still hungry, she got up for a waffle.

Two more quickly followed, then she started into a tray of cupcakes. The questionable nature of cupcakes for breakfast never entered her addled mind. One, two, four, ten, it just wasn't enough. She needed more! More and more and more and more!

Wetting her throat periodically with cups of tea (heavy on the sugar and cream), she ate as fast as she could, only limited by her ability to chew and swallow. Hunter was vaguely aware of Amber's worried questions, but did little more then grunt in response. Even as her belly began to ache, she still forced herself from her chair to grab even more food.

"Oh my God, that cake looks so good! Ooo, cinnamon buns! Fresh doughnuts! Peach cobbler, mmm! Creme cheese danishes! Ooo, strudels!"

Hunter was spending as much time stuffing her face in line as she was filling her tray. The entire lunchroom was watching with varying degrees of interest as the busty freshman seemed intent on filling herself to the point of bursting. A couple had taken out their phones and begun filming the spectacle. Hunter, though, was unaware of any of this, totally focused on eating more and more as her appetite unnaturally surged.

******

Well, she was certainly paying for it now. Hunter had hit that final wall hard, and it was nothing short of a miracle that she hadn't thrown up yet. As she staggered along with the aid of her living crutch, she looked down and saw her impressive bust had done a fair bit of work as a primitive bib. Unfortunately, that meant the food stains were on the sweater vest she'd borrowed from Amber.

"Oh dear."

"What?"

"S-sorry about your vest." Hunter wasn't able to say much more, currently holding back a belch that had the potential to become something far worse.

Amber shook her head a bit. "Don't worry about it," she said. "I can always wash it later."

Amber couldn't help but look her suffering roomie over as the two kept moving forward. "Her boobs were already stretching it out enough. I guess her belly is now just helping keep it even."

The two came to a crossroads in the walking trail. Truthfully, Amber had wanted to grab one of the scooters to transport Hunter, but all the mobility aids had been claimed before she got to the lobby, forcing the two to march there on foot. The two turned towards...

Choice One: Despite Amber's advice, Hunter refuses to miss her first day, so they're heading to class.

Choice Two: Hunter is in no shape to attend class, and Amber is helping her to the infirmary. She has no doubt that they're far too used to dealing with cases of overeating.

Choice Three: Hunter is sure she just needs to sleep it off, so Amber is helping her back to their dorm. She'll inform the teacher of the what's happened on her arrival to class.
12111211123.title: Breakfast of the Apocalypse

choices: Option A: Friends Like Me
Option B: The Cool Kids
Option C: Growing Friendship
121112111232.content:
"No, I can't miss......hurrrk!" Hunter's cheeks puffed out, and Amber froze in terror at the thought of being blanketed with sick, but fortunately Hunter's cheeks deflated in a long huff, punctuated by a tiny cute burp.

"You CAN miss," Amber countered, heaving her triple-stuffed roommate through the hallways. "Unless you want to toss your cookies halfway through going over the syllabus, you're taking a sick day, Hunter."

Hunter groaned in agony, whether out of mortification that she was missing her first day or pain from her intense feasting, Amber didn't know. She wanted to take Hunter back to the room to maybe sleep it off, but without a handy mobility aid she probably wasn't going to make it. Frustratingly, the few people meandering down the hallway towards their first class took one look at the green freshman and gave the pair a wide berth.

"Everything alright, ladies?"

Amber poked her head up around Hunter's to spot a heavyset lady trotting towards them, young but clearly not a student judging by her white outfit, and olive skinned with wavy black hair. The nice blouse stretched itself tightly against a prominent pot-belly, and when the lady came to a stop, her jacket stopped swinging long enough to reveal the stethoscope tucked into her pocket.

"Are you a nurse?" Amber asked. "My roommate's really sick."

"Goodness me, she does look unwell," the woman said in surprise, stepping forward to give her a once-over, her eyes lingering on Hunter's engorged stomach. "Overdid it at breakfast?"

"Yeah, how did you-"

"Happens all the time, especially with the new students," the nurse said matter-of-factly before turning to Hunter. "Do you think you can make it that far? What's your name, dear?"

"Hurrr....Hunter Black," Hunter managed to huff out without dry heaving.

"Okay Hunter, let's get you to the infirmary and let you lie down," the nurse replied, taking her by the other arm Amber didn't already have. "Baby steps, okay?"

Thankfully, it was not much of a hike before Amber reached a room marked with a red cross. Holding open the door for the nurse escorting her bloated buddy, Amber suddenly became aware of a whole chorus of groans. Along the far wall were almost a dozen other students, mostly freshman, clutching at their stomachs in agony. One particularly enormous belch echoed from a freckled readheaded girl so massive she took up two chairs, making the poor freshers next to her turn acid green. The redhead peered over her chipmunk cheeks to spot Hunter being settled into her own chair.

"Alriiiight..." she slurred. "Newbies know how to EAT!"

This school is just too much, Amber thought to herself incredulously before the nurse shoved something into her hands.

"Doctor's note, for Hunter," the nurse explained. "Pass this to the dean of students and she won't get into trouble for being absent from her courses today."

"Thanks miss..."

"Hasek," Nurse Hasek replied. "Now hurry along and get to your class, I can't write a note for you." Hasek chuckled as Amber dutifully scurried off, leaving the Nurse to survey her domain, All in all, not as bad as last year, she thought. The infirmary stations tended to get swamped on the first day as the new students got a taste of the cuisine, and while this was a lot to deal with, it was far more manageable. Rolling up her sleeves, she prepared to get to work caring for these students, thankful that for once during this rush she didn't have to deal with-

*BANG*

-the head nurse.

"Alright, let's see what the damage is this year," Allison Spades grumbled, waddling up to the row of students. The younger students, Hunter included, looked up hopefully, only to be greeted with what could very generously be described as an unpleasant expression. Compared to her prim and proper and heavyset underling, this new nurse looked disheveled, like she had just woken up late and rushed into work that day, and Hunter recognized the tell-tale signs of a hangover, thanks to seeing Parker wake up with quite a few of them growing up. Not to mention her size; this lady was closer to the headmistress in terms of her weight, sporting a saggy double belly and chunky thighs, with a nice fat double chin hiding her neck. The headmistress was definitely larger, but standing this close and looking this nasty, Hunter thought the nurse seemed a lot bigger.

"These girls get worse and worse every year, stuffing themselves like a bunch of greedy pigs," Allison complained without a hint of irony. "Have you treated them?"

"Well, I was going to give them some water and let them rest, then-"

"I said to treat them, not mother them!" Allison snapped, prompting a lot of hurt looks from the students who were used to Hasek's kind words as the head nurse waddled into the back room, her hips brushing against the door frame. Nurse Hasek was rather tight-lipped as she waited, and Hunter couldn't help but be impressed, being used to living with girls who would have socked someone like this head nurse in the jaw in two seconds flat.

"Don't let her get to you," the massive redhead told the girl next to her. "Nurse Spades treats everyone like garbage. Ooof..." Hunter felt another wave of nausea rearing its ugly head, and curled up as the head nurse returned from the back room, carrying a bottle of pills that Hunter would have recognized if she wasn't too busy trying not to puke.

"I'm not sure the Yeng stomach aid pills are a good idea..." Hasek interjected.

"I'm not sure I asked your opinion," Spades retorted, pressing a pill into Hunter's hand before going around to the others. "Just take these and you'll be healthy enough to get to your next class." Hasek frowned as she went to get some water for the students to take with them, though most of them, desperate for relief, took them dry.

Hunter included.

---

"Alright, just take it easy girls, and don't overdo it on the meal plans, okay?"

"I'll be careful, thanks Miss Hasek!" Hunter said brightly as she and the other girls dispersed, some of them forcing their way around the massive redheaded girl. Checking her phone and noticing it was just getting to the end of the first period, Hunter made her way to what would have been her first class and patiently waited outside. The nurse may have been crabby, but the medicine did help a lot. No more stomach pain! In fact, Hunter felt a bit peckish after remembering it was approaching on lunchtime soon. She gave a sideways glance at a nearby vending machine before the door opened and the students came flooding out.

"Hunter!"

Hunter flinched in surprise as her roommate dashed over and pulled her into a hug, only to immediately jump off, her face flushed as a crowd began to form in the hallway around them.

"Oh, hehe, sorry about that. Got a bit excited," she said, awkwardly laughing it off. "So...how are you feeling?"

"Better, thanks," Hunter said. "Least I won't be missing any more classes today."

"Eh, you didn't miss much anyway, just going over the rules and an intro to the class," Amber said, handing over a sheaf of papers. "Got a syllabus for you."

"Thanks," Hunter said, leafing through it before a loud gargle echoed from her stomach.

"Oh my gosh, are you serious right now..."

"What? It's lunchtime!" Hunter insisted.

"Yeah, in two hours!" Amber countered. "And after that breakfast...?"

"It wasn't that bad!" Seemingly in response, Hunter whipped out her phone and opened up a video clip. To her embarrassment and shame, Hunter realized she was watching herself from earlier, gorging herself like a hog at a trough as the students cheered her on.

"And this is going viral, too," Amber pointed out. "In a school that's pretty used to people eating like this, you eating like this is notable enough to go freakin' viral."

"Okay, fine," Hunter said, throwing her hands up. "And thanks for reminding me I've made a pariah of myself on my first day here!"

"Heeeeey, Hunter!"

Hunter winced as a girl waddling by slapped her thrown-up hand, thinking it was a hi-five.

"I saw the video, girl you are the BOMB!" the hi-fiver said brightly.

"Yeah, I've never seen something so amazing!" another girl piped in.

"You could give the seniors a run for their money!" an excitable freshman squeaked.

"Very impressive," an older girl with a snooty look to her said to her friend as they passed by. "This one may be Buttercombe material after all."

Hunter's heart fluttered. Poor, despondent, hand-me-down wearing Hunter Black....Buttercombe material!

"This school is SO weird..." Amber muttered to herself as she watched Hunter practically glow.

---

Hunter Black's stunt tackling the Breakfast of the Apocalypse made her known throughout the school, and it was the icebreaker she needed to start making new friends.

Option A: Just other normal freshmen girls like her, eager to learn and perhaps less eager to deal with the side effects that the food at Buttercombe can have on a girl's figure.

Option B: Veteran students who think that she's cool enough to hang out with the older kids on campus. Whether they're popular queen bees or just the odd clique of familiar faces, Hunter is just happy to be included!

Option C: Students who take a special interest in her ability to eat, and perhaps would very much enjoy to see her 'grow' into the mold of a proper Buttercombe student.
121112111232.title: Doctor! Doctor!

choices: Hunter and Amber sit with the cool kids! And they eat and eat and eat...
Amber manages to talk the starstruck Hunter out of it. it doesn't seem right...
1211121112322.content:
Unbeknownst to her, the girls that Hunter had made such a glowing first impression with were upperclassmen—bound by Buttercombe law to appreciate the overzealousness of the zaftig newbie that was Hunter Black.

Hunter had never been much in the way of making friends—her strong career in academics had put a decided barrier between her and the realm of popularity. The closest thing she had to a friend besides her roommate was the guidance counsellor, Dr. Schwartz—and that was mostly because of prior connections to her sister Piper.

But for someone to approach her, and tell her that she as (without hyperbole) the bomb? Well, that was practically unheard of! Hunter Black was… the bomb!

Who would have ever thunk it?!

“Thanks!” she said with a smile about as wide as she felt tall, “I’m happy to be… um… Buttercombe Material!!”

The girls that had approached Hunter and Amber were older girls—no doubt about it. Sure, had they been more versed in the peculiar traditions that Buttercombe Academy had adopted—specifically the correlation between size and grade—it would have been that much more obvious. The arabian ball of chub that had approached her couldnt' have weighed less than three hundred pounds. Her chins were wrapped tightly into her hijab, but the rest of her billowing body illustrated just how far she'd let herself go. Either of hte other two would have been an excellent example in their own rights as well. Hunter had grown up around lots of fat women, but never anyone so round and so young. But the fact that they were taller, more confident, and all-around more mature than either of them helped sell the image that their weights didn’t—Hunter had been approached by a particular sect of cool kids that just so happened to lean hard into Buttercombe’s supposed lifestyle.

“It’s nice to know that not all of Buttercombe’s newbees are a bunch of fucking wimps.” Said the oldest—a middle-eastern girl with a billowing brown belly that poured out from underneath her uniform, “All these other babies would have been crying home to their mommies after a meal like that.”

“Yeah, well…” Hunter clicked her tongue stupidly—her intense desire to be liked outweighing her need for modesty—“You know, food stamps and all.”

“Oh my god she’s funny too!” said the WASP-y one as she leaned closer to touch Hunter’s shoulder, “It’s so nice to meet a freshman who isn’t all “like me, I’m rich I swear!””

“Right? Those kids can get bent.” The taller girl with pale skin said with a smile, “You seem pretty cool, girl—what’s your name?”

“Hunter.” The chesty freshman said without a moment’s hesitation, “This is my roommate Amber—she’s the one who took the video.”

“Oh neat.” The first girl said with a small amount of enthusiasm, though decidedly not enough to convince Hunter’s roommate that she was particularly welcome in this conversation, “We were about to hit up the self-service station… you want in?”
1211121112322.title: Fitting In

choices: Hunter gets more. Much, much more...
Hunter puts her foot down. This is going way too far!
12111211123221.content:
It didn't take long for that glowing feeling of popularity to be replaced with a hearty helping of anxiety. Years of being the unpopular book-loving dweeb through high school had taught her that a lot of friendships had catches, especially if the cool kids took interest in you. Those people had no problem schmoozing her up, treating her all nice, then dumping her with a hard group project 'because she's so smart and I'm just sooooo, busy', and more often then not Hunter was pressured into giving them exactly what they wanted, if only for that sliver of hope that the cool kids won't go back to treating her like dirt if she helped them ace a grade or two. They never did, of course, so even as she still basked in the glow of her famous feast, she put up a front in the face of these cool seniors at first, fearing the popping of the question, the asking of one teeny, tiny favor.

Over time, though, Hunter could tell there was something different about these three girls. For one, they weren't the popular cheerleader types who usually approached her, and two, it was very unlikely that seniors would need help from a first year student in their classwork so early in the semester. More to the point, Hunter never got the sense of that distance she had with the cool kids in high school, that yearning to be closer to them and actually get to know them. The girls genuinely did seem interested in her and where she came from, and while Hunter didn't have many cool and awesome stories to share, they always made an effort to look invested, at the very least. Mostly though, Hunter suspected that she felt they were different because they actually had something in common; they really enjoyed a good meal.

"Oh man..." Hunter groaned. "I am soooo stuffed right now..."

"Silence, ye blasphemer," the tall pale student announced in an old-testament sort of way. " I, Coraline, doth decree, thou shalt always have room for ice cream!"

Hunter giggled at the silly impression of a vengeful and powerful god as she pondered her empty plate, a couple grease stains and condiment smudges left over. She thought of how a nice cold dairy would pair well with that spicy Italian meatloaf. Yeah, she'd eaten meatloaf. Cafeteria meatloaf, no less. Goddamn, the food here was good.

"Maybe a bowl, then," Hunter concluded. "Or two." She reached down to try and loosen the tightness of the skirt around her midriff, but was distracted when a billowing belly brushed past her shoulder and a banana split was set in front of her.

"Somehow I thought you would say that," the three-hundred pound Middle Eastern girl said, setting the banana splits which she expertly managed to carry over down in front of the other girls, one for hunter and two each for the seniors.

"I swear, Sanya, you just like showing off," Coraline said accusingly as she dug into her ice cream.

"Hey, you spend eight years as a waitress and it never goes away," Sanya said proudly, her hands on her wide hips.

"Oh yeah, well you're outnumbered by the pizza girls here," Coraline retorted, reaching out to fist-bump Hunter, which she returned without looking up from her own dessert. "Do you even count as a working girl if your dad owned the restaurant?"

"You say that like he owned the Ritz or something."

"Nepotism totally makes you a spoiled rich girl, though!"

"Does not!"

"Girls, girls," Hunter said, channeling the energy of her big sister. "You're both pretty."

The two looked at one another, then burst out laughing. Hunter got a surge of pride at landing her joke just as the third senior girl waddled up with her roommate Amber not far behind, both of them with their own towering sundaes.

"Crisis averted!" the older, WASP-ier girl announced, patting Amber on the shoulder as they sat down. "Don't worry honey, you're not the first girl to pop a seam here."

"Th-thanks Tasha," Amber stuttered, turning pink at the airing of her dirty laundry, so to say.

"No problem! Clothing maintenance is a handy skill to have, especially at Buttercombe." Picking up her spoon, Tasha scooped a nice sized helping of whipped cream. "Now I don't know about you girls, but I'm hoping to pop a few seams myself tonight!"

Yeah that was something Hunter was still getting used to. Being a big eater was one thing, but growing up poor wasn't exactly a catalyst for wanting to deliberately damage your wardrobe. Here though, if only with these three, it was certainly not a bad thing to do. In fact, they seemed to encourage it. Amber for instance was little more then "Hunter's roomie" to her new senior friends up until the point where she split open the side of her jacket the first time, and then suddenly they became far more inclusive. Wolfing down her dessert in contemplative silence as Amber and Tasha chatted it up, Hunter wondered if she was just being paranoid when...

*PING*

Hunter gasped as she felt her skirt loosen with a sudden snap, the button flying off and hitting the metal supports of the table.

"What was that?" Sanya asked, sounding concerned as Hunter's face flushed red with embarrassment.

"I...uh...think I popped my skirt open," Hunter admitted with reluctance. Looking down, she didn't even have to lift her shirt to see the damage, the belly hanging out was enough.

"Ooh, that means more room for dessert!" Coraline said with glee as she, much to Hunter's abject terror, pushed her spare sundae over to the younger girl.

"What? N-no, I'm fine with-"

"Gotta fill up the tank now," Sanya said, pushing her own spare towards her as well. Hunter stared at the extra two in abject horror as Tasha pushed her own spare over to join them.

"It's our little challenge, you have a wardrobe malfunction mid-meal, you get extras," Tasha explained. "Amber did it too, we stocked up on the vending machine in between here and my dorm." Amber nodded, letting out a tiny belch and patting her stomach.

As Sonya got back up to fetch more ice cream, Hunter stared at the bounty in front of her. She wanted to say no, reject this outright out of fear of puking it up an hour later or worse, but at the same time...this was a really good sundae.

She...kind of wanted more...
12111211123221.title: And Filling Out

121112111233.content:
The only place that this girl needed to get to was to bed—that much was clear to Amber, even if Hunter had been too stubborn to admit it.

Lugging her roommate down the hallway was a struggle enough. She was so delicate in this state that every step was met with an audible wince, her ballooned belly bouncing painfully at every awkward shuffle that they managed. She was still so full from last night, and then she'd gone and piled even more on top of it, so quickly! There was no way she was going to be able to sit down and participate in even the most basic introductory material in her next class. Or even the class after that, or after that... Hunter was going to have to spend her whole first day in bed sleeping off enough calories to feed an army!

"Ow ow, owie ow..." Hunter whimpered as she was lowered into bed, her hand clutching the sides of her turgid gut as it domed out on top of her, "Begentleplease..."

"It's not like you're making it easy, you know." Amber made a face as she straightened back up to a standing position, "Finding a balance between the sausage and the waffles you ate is easier said than done when I'm the one carrying you down the hallway."

Hunter could only pant shallowly as she struggled against the fullness of her stomach. Her vision was hazy and her thoughts were clouded. She'd never experienced anything like this before. Her whole body was cold and clammy, except for the peak of her mountainous middle as it rose and fell, red and shiny like a volcano about to burst.

"Yeesh, you look bad." the lanky blonde grimaced

"Gee thanks." Hunter managed a snarky response, if somewhat breathy and wet, "I... don't think I'm gonna make it to classes today."

"No dip. You ate the whole cafeteria." Amber chuckled, finding levity in the situation, "Wait until I tell all your teachers you won't be going to your first day because of a bellyache."

"Amberrrr..." Hunter whined, "Duh-Don't tell them that... puh-please..."

"Relax, I wasn't gonna anyway." Amber put her hands on her hips playfully, "Would you rather have a stomach bug or explosive diarrhea?"

"AMBER." Hunter whimpered more pointedly, "I swear to God I'll... I'll throw up on you..."

The two of them exchanged a laugh. What could satisfy as a laugh, given Hunter's current predicament. Even the slight breaths she was taking were enough to make her skin feel like it was tearing off. She was stuffed to an absolute limit, her maximum capacity. A pinprick would be enough to make her pop like a balloon in one of those old cartoons. Her forehead was damp with dewy sweat, matting her black bangs to her skin.

"I'm gonna get to class." Amber said a little more softly, sounding more concerned than instigatory, "Do you... need anything before I go?"

"No, just..." Hunter burped, "Turn off the light, please? I'm gonna try to sleep this off."

Amber did as she was told, smiling gently as she inched towards the doorway made her exit as quietly as possible. With one of her long fingers, she flicked the light switch to its off position, and let the curtains take their turn at keeping out the daylight. The room was a soft creamy yellow as the sunlight filtered through the drapes, but it was just dark enough for Hunter to get some sleep...
121112111233.title: Sleep the Day Away

Late afternoon
After supper
1211121112331.content:
Hunter was walking through a long, dark hallway. She could barely see, and left to follow her nose.

Wherever she was going smelt delicious.

Every now and again, a lone candle would light the passage way, and there was always treats on the small tables they stood on. Brownies, and bites of cake, and tarts, and cookies, and more, and more besides. Hunter couldn't stop herself from trying everything, as it was just too good.

The first couple snack tables she handled without a problem. But the tables seemed endless, and she felt more bloated and uncomfortable the further along she got. A couple times, she thought she might not be able to stomach anymore, and it took her pushing herself to get the last few bites down.

"I can't leave anything to waste, it's just way too good!"

Just when she thought she was at last too full to eat anymore, Hunter came across an odd fountain. The liquid that flowed within it wasn't water. For starters, it was pink and had a really strong, sweet smell to it. It was flowing from a large amphora being held by an extremely fat woman.

As she looked at the statue, Hunter heard a voice in her head. "Are you hungry?"

She jumped, but answered the weird voice. "Yes, but I'm so full. I can't eat anymore."

The voice, angelic or daemonic, laughed. "Yes you can. Just drink of my water, and eat as you will"

Hunter probably should have questioned the voice's motives, but she didn't. She was just way too hungry. Dropping her hands into the fountain's basin, she drank deeply of the sweet, entrancing liquid.

Suddenly, she felt the pain in her belly disappear as the food she'd so far eaten vanished. Hunter, hungry before, now felt absolutely famished. Desperately, she looked around for something, ANYTHING to eat. Sniffing the air, she ran towards the promise of food, almost hysterical in her need to fill her belly.

Turning a corner, the black haired teen found a feast of divine proportions arrayed before her. A long line of tables stretching into the abyss ran before her, packed to the brim with food. Candied salmon, baked ham, piping hot lasagna, fresh baked doughnuts still steaming from the fryer, and more endlessly stretched before her.

Hunter's belly let out a growl so loud that it echoed off the walls. Her patience at its end, she began stuffing her face, swallowing mouthfuls of food as fast as she could funnel them to her insatiable maw. More, more, more, it was never enough! Her belly felt like an aching black hole, and she just couldn't get it full.

As Hunter ate more and more, she felt her clothes growing increasingly tight. As she stuffed herself, she realized what the fluid from the fountain did. Simply put, it emptied her belly, and kept it empty, by instantly converting whatever she ate into fat.

The olive-skinned teen was growing at a prodigious rate, her body layering itself with thick layers of heavy fat. Her already large bust was expanding rapidly, quickly snapping her bra and straining her shirt. Her gut began to grow, first as a little pot belly, but soon growing into a multi-rolled ball. Her love handles expanded, first hitting the size of baseballs, then softballs, then footballs. Her booty initially lagged behind, but all too soon was surging forth, stretching her poor skirt to its limits.

Hunter didn't care, so long as she could eat.

Her body kept growing by leaps and bounds. Her shirt popped first, freeing her giga-tits and letting the girls surge forward and down as gravity took its toll on her lardy extremities. Her belly stretched forward, downward, and widened, her rolls quickly growing too large to get her fingers around and still growing.

Her booty and thighs burst her skirt and leggings, growing thicker by the mouthful. Her limbs began to tremble, only slightly at first, but it soon became unbearable, and Hunter collapsed under her own weight. The food, however, magically floated over to her and so she kept stuffing her face. Soon she was as large as a full sized van, but then the food suddenly stopped out of her reach. Hunter whimpered and reached for the food with a groan, the fat from her arm dropping a solid 18 inches. She failed to even come close, made totally helpless by her enormous weight.

"My, my, my, aren't you a promising one." That voice, so divine and hellish in equal measure, spoke again. "Most people need a little more coaxing, but not you, do you? My, my, my, what a gluttonous little thing. My master will be pleased."

A figure walked agonizingly slowly into her view. Her skin was pink or purple, depending on how you looked at her, with random patterns of shifting scales and horns. She smiled, revealing a mouthful of needle-like teeth. Her nails were sharp, black talons, and her body was bedecked in countless piercings.

"You were born for the Prince, weren't you? You just love eating until it hurts. Eating and getting so much fatter. You're already so fat, but you just want to eat more, don't you?" Hunter held her silence, save a fearful whimper.

"Tell me."

She remained silent.

"TELL ME!" the Daemon Princess screamed as her face took on a more daemonic visage.

Hunter, in her terror, answered honestly. "Y-yes, I do! I love eating! I love being fat, and I want to get fatter!"

The Daemon Princess smiled. "Beg me for it."

"Please! Stuff me past insanity! Make me fatter, please! I beg you! I need to eat! Please!"

The horrible creature laughed. "Oh, you wonderful mortal thing! You'll do well amongst us!"

The food began to float again, spinning together until it became a massive calorie cream. It flowed into Hunter's belly like a torrent of water and she felt her body simply explode with fat. Her body grew so much that her fat blended into a single drooping mass of rolls and lard, constantly growing, with only her unbelievably fat face exposed, delirious with madness and ecstasy...

******

Hunter woke up in a cold sweat in her darkened room. Gasping, she struggled to catch her breath. "Holy crap, I need to lay off the 40k..."

She leaned forward. Her belly still somewhat hurt, though nowhere near as much as it had earlier. "What time is it?"
