As it turned out, Hunter’s mom had signed her up for the Freshman Orientation Tour.

And as it turned out, she was late for said tour.

So when she checked in at the front desk, the fat woman behind the counter was a little overdramatic about it. She took Hunter’s bags for her and said that they’d be delivered to her dorm, and hurried her out the door like she was going to miss some big important event. And honestly, Hunter had been a little worried about missing her group too…

But she had arrived fifteen minutes late and they hadn’t even made it out of the cafeteria yet.

“So hiiiii~” said a chunky blonde in a big yellow shirt and white short shorts, “I’m Melissa and I’m gonna be your tour guide today!”

Hunter had been lumped in with a group of girls… maybe about 20 of them. All of them were about her age, predominately white, really WASP-y most of them. She already felt like she didn’t really belong, but being the only one late to a guided tour of the campus and feeling like the poor girl out really didn’t do wonders for her self esteem.

On top of that, Big Bird was going to be their tour guide. Great.

They really shouldn’t let women with thighs that big wear shorts. Her butt looked like a giant marshmallow.

“Now that everyone’s here, we’re gonna start our tour—make sure y’all stay together and if you have any questions, just ask me!”

And so began the awkward shuffling of feet as Freshmen dragged themselves to stay at the sluggish pace of their incessant and inanely chipper tour guide. She did that fake thing that people do where they try to make it seem like you’re going to be friends afterwards… nobody really seemed to buy it.

Hunter had never been the most social girl—it came in the package of her being deeply sarcastic and thinking herself a bit smarter than most girls her age.

Why had her mom done this to her?

There was no way of knowing just how boring this would be…

Hunter did her best to blend in. Shrink into the crowd, avoid eye contact, and pay attention to where she was. But that was a long time to pretend like she actually wanted to be there.

Things didn’t get interesting until…
12112.title: Down the Hall, to the Left...

choices: a friendly, if rather heavyset RA who helps her find her way back to the group.
an older girl with dark makeup, who doesn't look exactly friendly...
an open classroom—Hunter's muttering interrupted Baking Club!
121122.content:
So, suffice it to say, things didn’t really get interesting until she had accidentally gotten herself lost.

Right? Smart girl like Hunter Black managed to get herself separated from a group led by one of the loudest, most annoying girls in history? Go figure.

It happened sometime after Big Bird started talking about the benefactors of whatever Wing they were in. The West Wing, yeah, but they were supposed to be in some big fancy computer lab or something. She had been talking and Hunter just kind of zoned out for a while… before she knew it, Hunter had taken a left when she should have taken a right. And then another left, and then a right, and then…

Where was she, now?

This was perfect. Total Hunter move, she cussed as she tried to find her way back to her tour group. First day here and she’s already lost as could be.

For it being almost the first day of school, the hallways weren’t exactly bustling. Not many other girls were out and about, and the ones that Hunter could see weren’t exactly in the mood to help. For one reason or another, Hunter found herself without a Sherpa on this mountain that was her prospective home for the next for years…

“Hey.” A voice sounded from behind her, “Hey you—skinny.”

Hunter turned around. Not that she really considered herself skinny but… okay. Whatever.

“You lost or something?”

The voice was coming from…
121122.title: Left, Left, Left Right Left...

choices: "Upstairs if you wanna be. Me and some friends are havin' a soiree. Interested?"
"Cafeteria's down the hall, two lefts and a right. Can't miss it." O...kay?
...nothing, but punched Hunter right in the gut! Why, Willa, Why?
1211222.content:
The voice had come from an older girl behind her, with frizzy blonde hair that hung down past her shoulders and dark makeup.

She was taller than Hunter—not that that said particularly much—and a bit bigger than her overall. From what Hunter could tell by the fit of her uniform, she had a bit of a tummy and wide hips. Her thighs were thick and made the skirt of her uniform flare out a bit. She had her hands on her hips; the purple of her nails matched her smoky eye shadow.

“Me? No, like…” Hunter puffed out her chest slightly, “I totally know where I’m going.”

One of the first things that Hunter had learned, being from a rough part of town and being very easy to pick on, was that you never let them see you sweat. Hunter didn’t like to judge people by their appearances, but this girl didn’t look exactly friendly.

Not that she would know what friendly looked like in a place so unlike any other place she’d been, but something told her that “friendly” didn’t come in edgy makeup and painted purple nails sharpened into pointed tips.

“S’at right?” the older girl cocked an eyebrow, “So… where are you then?”

Hunter gulped. Crap. Where was she?

“That’s what I thought.” The blonde rolled her eyes and started walking over. She spoke with a heavy accent from somewhere off the coast. Jersey, New York… something Yankee, Hunter could tell you that much. “I’ll tell ya this, you’re not where you’re supposed to be, skinny.”

Hunter gulped.

“Oh yeah?” she asked, trying her best to channel her over-confident older sisters, “Well… where am I supposed to be?”

The older girl’s purple lips parted. She smiled and said…
1211222.title: Willa's Warm Welcome

choices: Willa—movie night & snacking, dumb cult movies and high caloric content!
Bianca—smoke some pot, and Hunter's first experience with the Devil's Lettuce!
Nora—tons of pizza and talking shit about classmates, classic girl's night!
12112221.content:
“Upstairs, if you wanna be.” The older girl’s purple lips parted with a smile, “Me an’ my friends are having a soiree. Interested?”

Now, admittedly, Hunter was a very smart girl.

She’d never missed a day of school (besides that time she got Mono from drinking after her older sister) and her grades were phenomenal. Hunter was the smartest girl in her family, in her school, and perhaps on one whole side of her home town.

So when an older girl in dark makeup who she just met asks her if she wanted to hang out upstairs, in a place that she’d never been before, and knew nobody where her only lifeline was literally driving into another state by now, Hunter’s gut reaction was to call stranger danger and go find her tour group.

B-U-T Hunter had never been cool before.

Her sisters were cool. They had all kinds of stories about tramping around Daven’s Port. Hunter wanted to be cool. This girl looked cool.

“I… I guess so?” Hunter smiled sheepishly, “I mean yeah. Totally. No totally yeah.”

“Alright then.” The older girl’s face lit up, “Follow me then.”

***


Hunter would learn that Willa’s room wasn’t unlike her own—in due time. But as this was her first impression with a Buttercombe dorm room, and still riding high on the prospect of being accepted by someone who was so clearly cooler than her, she was a little more dazzled by this room than any particular other.

Full kitchen set, a big living room and two bedrooms. TV, nicer than the one at home, and cool band posters plastered all over the room.

Hunter squealed—which made Willa look at her funny, so she quietly ducked her head.

“This is the place.” Willa said over the mid-to-high background noise of generic alt-rock sounds, “Make yourself comfortable.”

Three other girls had already done as much, two of them crowded the furniture while the other stood ass-end out of the fridge.

“Just anywhere?” Hunter squeaked

“What?” Willa asked, cupping her ear

“JUST ANYWHERE?” Hunter asked a little louder

“Yeah, just wherever.”

The choices were… not great. Willa had good intentions, but there wasn’t actually a lot of room. And not for lack of trying. The frizzy-headed blonde plopped herself on one of the loveseats next to a full-figured Hispanic girl who was buried nose-deep into her phone. Between the two of them, Willa was the smaller. There wasn’t a lot of room, but Hunter may have been able to squeeze in if she tried…

Would that be weird? Probably weird…

And then, on the other love seat, was this… really, really fat girl. She looked like a marshmallow, just big and fluffy. She had blonde hair cut into this cute little bob, straight out of a fashion magazine. She was so big that she had to prop her pillowy arms on her massive chest just to see her phone. There was about as much room there too, but…

That would definitely be weird.

Plus, Hunter really didn’t want to be rude…

“Oh, sorry, where are my manners.” Willa turned the music down, “Ladies this is… uh…”

“Hunter.” The busty freshman piped, “I’m Hunter Black. New. I’m student. New student.”

“…this is Hunter.” Willa’s cringing was obvious, “She’s new. New student.”

the other girls laughed.

“This is Bianca—she lives next door.” Willa gestured to the Latina sitting next to her, “She’s cool.”

Bianca was pretty chubby too for that matter. She was a little more belly heavy than Willa was though. She was actually dressed in her uniform—maybe that helped? Hindered… whatever. Point is, she looked up from her phone to smile at Hunter, and then went promptly back to her social media feed.

“That’s Nora—she’s down the hall.” Willa held a hand out to gesture to all of the huge girl sitting opposite to her, “She’s pretty cool.”

Nora wiggled her fingers at Hunter. Even that small action seemed to reverberate in the girth of her arms. Hunter had seen some larger people in her life, but Nora was probably one of the biggest. She wouldn’t learn this until later, but Nora was actually a Junior, and qualified for the SSS program.

“And that’s Robin—our RA.” Willa pointed to the skinny girl in the fridge, “She’s lame.”

“Definitely lame.” Nora snorted

“So lame.” Bianca added

“Hey, I ordered you pizza.” The skinny Senior stepped forward from the kitchen, “AND found your ranch.”

“Less lame.” Bianca corrected, holding out her hand for the bottle.

Robin was taller than Willa or Bianca, but wasn’t nearly as big. She was somewhat plain looking, with glasses and a short academic haircut. But, that being said, she did find the ranch. And she actually looked at Hunter and introduced herself. So she was polite.

“Nice to meet you.” She said earnestly, “All jokes aside, I’m RA of the hall. You need anything while you’re here, you come to me.”

“Like ranch.” Nora joked.

“RAAAANCH.” The other girls mooed in unison.

This room was fucking weird, dude.

ANYWAY.

“ANYWAY.” Willa rolled her eyes, “Sit down, New Hunter—we’re just about to get the night started.”

“Uh…” Hunter blinked, watching Robin situate her skinny self next to Nora, finding herself suddenly without an option

“Okay…” she said, sitting criss-cross applesauce on the floor.

Tonight’s festivities were planned by…
12112221.title: Willa the Weird

choices: Hunger! Hunter finally learns what it means to have the munchies.
Panic! Oh God, Why did she think she could do this? Why did she ever leave home?
121122212.content:
"So, we good?" Bianca asked, locking her phone with a click and tossing it carelessly onto the coffee table. "Or are we gonna get a few more randos in here?"

"Nah," Willa waved her hand. "Nah, let's do this thing."

"Dope. Uh, Robbie. You wanna get the stuff?"

Robbie rolled her eyes. "Uh, no. I just sat down. You get the stuff."

Bianca's eyes glanced at the other girls for a moment before settling on Hunter. "Hey, newbee. Go get that bag from the table, wouldja?"

"Sure, yea." Hunter, eager to be useful, popped up right away. She walked around the couch and grabbed the plastic shopping bag from the table. The top was tied off, but the size and shape of the bag's contents left little doubt what was inside. She carried it over and set it gently on the coffee table, her heart thumping a little louder and her palms starting to sweat.

Bianca leaned over and untied the bag, pulling out a shiny glass bong to a chorus of whoops and cheers from the gathered girls. Hunter stayed silent, trying not to look too nervous. One of the reasons for her social seclusion back in Daven's Port was her outright refusal to smoke or drink. It was part of her persona, a point of pride - she was the smart sister, too smart to burn her brain cells down with weed. At school she'd earned a reputation as a bit of a prude. But here she was, her first day at her new school - her first hour, even - gathered around a bong with girls she didn't know. She hadn't even been to her own room yet. She could almost imagine Piper's snarky smirk. Wouldn't her older sister be so proud...

"You ever smoked before, Hunter?" Robin asked as Bianca popped the clasps on a small, round container. The smell of weed drifted over them - a more pleasant smell than Hunter expected. Even the weed was high-class at this place.

"Uh... no. Never." Hunter replied.

"Ooh!" Bianca grinned. She was packing the bowl, her belly squashed atop her thighs as she leaned over the coffee table. "Nothing like corrupting the innocent."

"Listen," Robin said kindly. "You don't have to if you don't want to."

"If you don't want to be cool, anyway." Willa said. Nora snorted. Robin shot the blond a sharp look.

"Really?"

"I'm just kiddin!"

"No, it's all right," Hunter said, sounding more confident than she was. "I mean... it's gotta happen sometime, right?"

"That's the spirit." Bianca slid the bowl back into the bong and lifted it onto her lap. She produced a lighter and looked at Hunter. "Now, pay attention, newbee. You're about to lean some serious life skills shit."

She explained briefly how to take a hit from the bong, following it up with a demonstration. Hunter watched as the water inside the vase bubbled and the chamber filled with a solid white smoke. Then Bianca pulled the plug and the fog shot into her lungs. She held it for a bit, cringing with the effort, before throwing her head back and letting it billow out like a steam engine. Willa cheered and shook her by the shoulder.

"And that," Bianca said, her voice a little strained, "is how you take a hit."

They passed it around, each girl taking their own hit, before it finally ended up on the floor in front of Hunter. The young girl considered the bong carefully, lifting it, turning it, sliding the bowl in and out a few times. This felt like a betrayal, somehow. Like all those stupid kids she'd made fun of would win if she went through with this. It meant that they were right, and she was wrong. Hunter hated being wrong.

"Go on, then. Hit it!" Willa encouraged her. "Hit it! Hit it! Hit it!"

Nora took up the chant, and Bianca too. Hunter took a deep breath. She was in too deep to bow out graciously, now. If she walked away, she would forever be the lame girl, the stuck-up, the smart-ass. This was her chance to shed her old persona and emerge as someone else. To have friends. To be cool.

She flicked the lighter and put her mouth to the opening, just as Bianca had showed her. She pulled. The water bubbled and the chamber filled. The chant of Hit it! grew in intensity until she pulled the bowl and felt the fog fill her lungs as her new companions cheered. She began coughing almost immediately. Robin got off her seat and plopped down next to her, patting her back.

"Whoa, there! That was a big girl hit." Willa said. "Nice one."

Despite her aching throat and watering eyes, Hunter felt acceptance flow over her as the girls all voiced their approval. Robin stood and got her a glass of water, which soothed the scratching in her throat and allowed her to catch her breath.

"Ooh. Oh man," Hunter muttered, coughing a little more. "Jeez. That was... something."

Suddenly, the doorbell rang.

"Oh shit, the pizza." Willa stood quickly and moved to open the window, waving her arms uselessly to try and hurry the stench that had permeated the whole apartment. Robin rose again.

"Don't worry about it," the RA said easily, waving it off. "They're probably high too."

As Robin paid for the pizza - three large pies, each with different toppings - Hunter began to feel the effects of the weed. It was a feeling that started in her stomach and moved its way up her spine, a creeping sensation that left her brain buzzing. It was...
121122212.title: Bad Influences

choices: A Fellow Freshman (albeit much skinnier)
A Jumbo sized Junior! Possibly already enrolled on the SSS plan…
A Slender Senior!
1212.content:
Alex Greese was filled with a lot of things as she got off the bus in front of Buttercombe academy. First, she was filled with pride over the fact she’d done this on her own. It was a big leap, but she could do this! Tucking her few strands of her long brunette hair behind her ear, she congratulated herself for not wrinkling, ripping, or out-and-out loosing the paper she’d been given that held all the important information about her new school year, including her room number and its location.

Alex was also filled with determination too. Yes, Alex was finally away from her overbearing parents. Away from them and the way they were always…always…well it wasn’t exactly nagging, more like over caring about her too much…was that a thing? Always checking to make sure she was okay at every other hour of the day, calling her whenever she was a single minute later than she’d said she was going to be, never in anger…but they were just…smothering her! So when Alex’s mother had suggested going to Buttercombe Academy, she’d immediately jumped at the chance to finally get out of the house without even glancing at the pamphlet. She’d be free and that was all that mattered to her!

She loved her parents really she did, but it was starting to just be too much! Alex’s father had owned a large ice cream company; Glacé de Greese. Although her parents weren’t French in the slightest the haughty name was key in marketing, as well as Alex herself; much to her chagrin her smiling chubby six year old face still adorned every tub the product sold. The company wasn’t exactly world famous or anything, but they did quite well even considering the competition.

Now Alex’s thoughts had led her to be filled with anxiety! Her dad’s company had done spectacularly, no thanks to Yeng corporation, they’d tried to buy her father’s company for years! Now the she was heading to an Academy where they’d had a major partnership it made her a bit apprehensive. She could remember after her father refused to sell-out to Yeng, they did everything they could do try and ruin him; negative advertising, scam reviews, signing exclusive deals with nearby restaurants so they no longer sold Greese brand ice-cream. Through it all her father’s company survived because their product was just that darn good. Her father had even kept the struggles to himself for the most part after coming home from work, but there were the one or two rare nights she could hear him retelling stories of outrage to the family over dessert at their dinner table.

Oh, right, that was another thing Alex was filled with…food; a lot…and often! Revisiting her past, one can only imagine how often she’d asked for bowl after bowl to be refilled with her family’s own fattening luscious ice cream, and this was after the large delicious dinners with her parents! Over the years whenever any qualms about her weight were brought up her to her Alex’s mother she was always ready with an answer;

“It’s just some baby fat, all girls have it. Tell me when to stop with the whip cream on top.”

To …

“You might be a little big boned like your mother is all. Here I microwaved the hot fudge so it’ll melt right into your ice cream tonight.”

To…

“Obese is really just a blanket term honey. BMI is more like a clothing size, not like a disease….Hey, I heard Dad’s got a new flavor he’s working on, and he wants you to be the first one to try it as soon as we get home!”

And Eventually…

“You’re just an early bloomer Alex honey, in fact if you ask me, those girls at school sound jealous! They’re probably still stuffing bras with tissue paper and here you are outgrowing another pair… Oh, sweetie, I know there heavy, but there’s plenty of other girls your age that need a double-d size for support, I mean I did too right around your age….I tell you what, when we’re done shopping, I’ll whip up some mac and cheese pie as soon as we get home. Sound good?”

Alex always appreciated her mother’s positivity growing up (and out), honestly it had really helped her stay in high spirits against the mean girls in middle school….but…now that Alex was a little bit older and a little bit wiser and still somehow even bigger, Alex now felt that with her mother being quite the big woman herself, she might have had a bit of a pro BBW bias. In fact Alex was fifty/fifty on that the whole “owning an ice-cream factory” thing being THE reason her mother had married her father so young, it certainly hadn’t hurt, as she could never remember hearing her father complain about her mother’s own massive weight even once.

Again though, all of that was literally behind the Alex now entering Buttercombe academy’s student dorms, as of right now she was a new Alex, one filled with hopes! Hopes that included at least thinking about possibly starting a plan to start losing some weight now that she was away from her oppressively providing parents. Tottering around two-hundred and fifty pounds of teenage tonnage had at least come naturally to the young woman, so she had hardly any trouble navigating the crowded hallways. With one final check of the paper in her pudgy paws she saw this was indeed her room, she’d finally made it! Even if Alex was breathing a little hard from exertion, her positive thinking had pushed her on to her goal!

Entering through the doorway Alex was filled with surprise seeing that her roommate for the year would be…
1212.title: Alex Greese—Fattest Freshman! Filled with Feelings

choices: Alex asks Nicole if she has any dieting or lifestyle tips.
The two roommates aren't left alone for long as their RA checks in on them.
She can't stay here for long, as Alex has orientation to finish.
Given her BMI, couldn't the school physician help Alex with a diet plan?
12121.content:
"Hello?" Alex greeted from the door, seeing that her roommate had already settled into their quarters.

The girl said nothing. She was maybe an inch or two taller than Alex, with blonde hair and tan, freckled skin that reminded Alex of a brown shelled egg. Much to her chagrin Alex noticed that the girl was a fraction of her weight. Most anyone her age would be but the tanned blonde was quite slender. Already changed to her uniform, Alex noted that there wasn't a curve on the girl to speak of, the uniform almost looked to be too big for her. Unlike Alex, who had a full chest and wide stomach and a girthy rear her new silent roommate had none of that. Even department store mannequins were more developed than her. The only hint of fat to grace her slender body was a pair of thick, wide thighs visible between the hem of her skirt and knee-high stockings.

The mysterious waif was standing there scrolling through her phone, chewing on something. She blew out a pink bubble of gum before popping it and chewing the gum back into her mouth.

Alex was a bit miffed on being ignored but her budding optimism towards life at Buttercombe had yet to be depleted. "Hello?" she tried again, "I'm Alex Greese, your new roommate?"

The girl looked up from her phone. "Oh. Hey, I'm Nicole Fraser." She went back to tapping away at her phone, changing the app as now Alex could hear the popping and bursting from one of those mobile match-puzzle games.

Goodness, Nicole was a quiet one. Alex hefted her luggage further into the room, starting to feel a trickle of sweat down her back as the exertion was more than she had anticipated. Thankfully her roommate was too absorbed in her phone to notice, as Alex didn't want her first impression at school to be how fat she was.

Moving in faced a new challenge as Alex adjusted her glasses, noting the closed doors at either end of the dorm room that went off to the separate beds. "Um, Nicole, which room did you take?"

There was another pop from Nicole's bubble gum. "Oh, that's right. I needed to pick a bedroom. Thanks." Roused from her phone, the skinnier freshman blinked with fresh eyes. She had a long stare at Alex, viewing her for the first time, leaving the two hundred and fifty heifer of a teen feeling self conscious.

Nicole crossed to a door. "Why don't you take that one since you're closer." She disappeared into the room on the left, leaving Alex to get settled into the room on the right. Alex was thankful to finally get her things put away. There were clothes to unpack, school supplies to organize, and further efforts to make her room feel like home to distract her from her aloof almost oblivious roommate.

At least Nicole hadn't made fun of her? Alex tried to look on the bright side as she set her spare glasses case and a bottle of travel mouthwash on the nightstand before programming her alarm clock.

Although what Alex really needed was a distraction from the biggest temptation that sat on her bed. It was a large, if gaudy looking welcome basket filled with all manner of sweets and candy. There were gourmet chocolate bars, honey buns, and a variety of other treats. No ice cream but the 'face' of Glacé de Greese hadn't gotten herself fat just from ice cream alone.

She really wanted to start dieting but her stomach betrayed her, growling and yearning for a bite from the yummy morsels. Eventually Alex could only sort her socks and underwear so many times before she caved in and unwrapped the gift basket. She promised herself she could cheat just this once. When classes started she would buckle down on her studies and try to shed some of this weight.

Albeit Alex had more than half of her goodie basket demolished before she came to her senses, lost in the taste sensations of each indulgent treat. Oh the chocolate was so rich! The brownie had a layer of caramel in the middle that would have gone perfectly with one of her father's homemade ice cream sundaes. Once she had one bite of the honey bun she couldn't stop with leaving it half eaten. Or leaving any of the four honey buns in the basket uneaten.

Alex was beginning to regret the splurge when she decided to get on the Buttercombe uniform. The yellow and orange clothing, although made to her measurements, was feeling a bit snug around Alex's doughy middle and her skit didn't leave her much give. That solidified her resolve to start loosing weight. Time to get out there and face the day, Alex Greese!

When she left her room Alex saw that her roommate, Nicole Fraser, was sitting on the couch with her legs brought up to her lack of a chest so her feet were rested on the cushion. It had been years since Alex had ever been able to bring her legs up to her middle comfortably. Surprisingly, Nicole wasn't on her phone this time. She had a small notebook resting on her knees and was sketching away with her free hand.

"Um, Nicole..." Alex wanted to warn her that Nicole's sitting position left the bottom of her tanned freckled thighs and her lavender, lacy undergarments visible. Nicole didn't make any sign of recognizing Alex's entrance, yet again.

On the one hand, Alex wanted to have a decent relationship with her roommate so maybe she should try to get to know Nicole. She sat on the other end of the couch. The action jostled Nicole but the tanned blonde didn't pause in her sketching. The quiet continued between the two roommates. Alex needed something to do so she turned to reading the informational pamphlets the academy had given her with her paperwork.

Alex began to read the SSS brochure. The tiers of benefits confused her at first until she read the Intermediate Tier. Students with a BMI of 35 or above are automatically eligible for this Tier. Please consult our physician for the proper forms.

Automatically eligible! Alex knew that she wasn't that tall at 5'5'' and her weight put her squarely in the 40s since she had finished middle school. When she last checked her BMI it was 42 for her height at 250 pounds. This made Alex eligible for waived cafeteria fees, single resident housing, custom furniture. It was a dizzying and horrifying prospect to the young freshman that was looking to diet. God, how could her parents have let her get this fat?!

"S-S-So Nicole," Alex needed a new topic of conversation, "tell me a little about yourself. What to you think of Buttercombe so far?"

More sketching from her quiet roommate. "S'Alright. The rooms here are pretty cushy."

Another extended pause. Alex turned her head. "Can I see what you're sketching?"

"It's not ready yet."

Shut down by her roommate yet again, Alex's mind was swimming with the possibilities of what life at Buttercombe would bring her. She didn't want to get any fatter but gaining weight had become so easy for her with her hefty appetite that it seemed inevitable. Unless she made some drastic changes.
12121.title: Nicole Fraser-Flattest Freshman! Acquired Apathy

choices: Alex needs to have a full physical, revealing some surprising results.
She's tasked to start with increased exercise but finds she can't keep up.
Alex has to be approved by Dr. Helen Schwartz.
Much to her chagrin, Alex finds herself enrolled in SSS anyways.
121214.content:
Even though Alex had made it this far into getting settled at Buttercombe Academy without flaking out, her insecurities were starting to get the better of her as she sat there on the couch. She might be, what, double Nicole's weight? A lifetime of smothering by a mother that encouraged her to eat and the dividends that came with being the child mascot of your father's ice cream company had did a number on Alex Greese.

She was plenty smart and thus wasn't worried about her classes. Yet now that she was beyond her mother's supervision, it was high time to take matters into her own hands.

If only Alex could work up the nerve.

"Art. What are you here for?"

"Huh??" Alex was snapped out of her reverie by her remarkably untalkative roommate. "What did you say, Nicole?"

"I'm enrolled in the art program." The skinny freshman was nose deep in her sketching again. "You had asked."

About what Nicole thought of the school? That had been minutes ago! Goodness, Alex couldn't let her nerves continue to bother her. She was going to make something of herself at school, finally be an independent girl. No, young woman.

"Oh. Well, I'm in...I'm not quite sure what I want to focus on." Alex had a head for numbers and business, having learned from her father's lap how he run the company. When she could fit in his lap, at any rate. She'd dabbled in chemistry and biology. And she was an avid reader so she knew her literature. She didn't know where she wanted to shift her education focus, however, and as much as that was important her scare at reading the SSS brochure made her worried about getting her health under control before she plotted her course in life.

"H-Hey Nicole..." Much as Alex Greese was emboldening herself to stand on her own two feet, she was hoping for a confidant. "Would you mind coming with me to the infirmary?"

Nicole looked up from her sketch, blinking twice. "The infirmary?"

"I'm not contagious," Alex tried to clarify, before realizing that sounded worse. "I just wanted to get some advice from the physician. And didn't want to end up lost."

"Oh," Nicole folded up her sketchbook. "I can join you. I'm supposed to turn in a doctor's note."

Phew! Nicole had her own reasons to go to the infirmary so Alex wouldn't feel like the center of attention. Even though her weight had become the center of her life, she now realized, for far too long. She had to stop thinking about what could have gone differently in life, about how she had already demolished half of her gift basket. This was no time to continue to flake out. Alex had to look to the future. Right?

Once Nicole found her note the two roommates were off to travel across campus to find the nurse's office. Alec had gotten a sense of the scale of Buttercombe from finding her room although the trek made her realize just how palatial the school was arranged. The journey was half in silence until Alex found another topic of conversation.

"If I may ask, what do you need to see the doctor about?"

"There are some medications I have to stay on," Nicole explained. "I have an adrenal deficiency."

"Oh." Nicole could be quite frank. It put Alex's concerns into perspective. She asked a few more questions, in case there was anything she needed to monitor for Nicole as a roommate, although the skinner freshman assured her there weren't many complications. They soon found themselves at the nurse's office.

The clinical ward of the school, much like the other decor, had soft yellows and amber tones for the wall paper and accents. There was a nurse seated at the desk, with a few wide chairs nearby for patient waiting before the doors sung into medical rooms.

"Hello," the nurse, Shiro Fukiyama, greeted the two roommates. If Alex thought Nicole was much skinner than her the nurse was practically bones. Not really, of course, she was somewhat tall with a limber build but very smelt, barely looked to weigh a hundred pounds. Alex was beginning to grow red faced by currently being the fattest woman in the room.

"How can I help you?" Shiro continued.

Alex mumbled. "You can talk to her first, Nicole."

Nicole Frasser shrugged, stepping to the desk. "I'm supposed to turn this in to update my medical records," she handed over the doctor's note.

Shiro glanced over the document. "I see. This won't take long to input. I will warn you that, given our relative isolation and medical budget we may need to find an effective generic or two for your medications. Do you have any side effects from previous replacement medicine."

Alex didn't mean to pry, so she drowned out the conversation by looking over the office thrice over, working up the courage to ask about her issue. She was so caught up in psyching herself up that she nearly missed the nurse addressing her.

"And what can I help you with in the meantime, miss?" Shiro asked.

"Oh," Alex looked back to the desk. Nicole was slouched against the wall, giving Alex the space to approach the desk. "W-Well it's about, my, my..."

Alex Greese swallowed, getting right to the point. "It's about my weight, you see, I would qualify for SSS assistance. I mean, the intermediate tier?"

Shiro bit her tongue. Compared to Nicole, who had a healthy weight, Alex was a poster child example of teenage obesity. Many at this school were, Shiro had come to find out, although few were ever this big when they entered as freshmen.

"And so I was curious," Alex continued, "would I be able to get help with some kind of diet plan? A regimen to help me lose weight?"

Shiro was rather surprised that Alex was both aware of her size and wanting to work at losing weight. "SSS matters are addressed by my supervisor, Miss Greese, but I can help get you started. We may have to update some paperwork."

She had a warm smile, which encouraged Alex. Today might be the first step in introducing a thinner Alex Greese. What could possibly go wrong with a Buttercombe and Yeng Corporation approved weight loss plan?

1212144.content:
Being open with her new roommate, Nicole Fraser, and the nurse, Shiro Fukiyama, about her goals for her weight made Alex feel better about coming to Buttercombe. With the budding support behind her she vowed to become a young woman who could stand on her own two (if broad) legs, away from her mother's smothering and father's spoiling.

And so Alex Greese took to the advice given to her by the school nurse about early pitfalls she could fall into when starting a weight loss regimen. At it's basics, managing weight was about calories expended versus calories ingested. Alex Greese would have to eat less and exercise more if she hoped to turn the Freshman Fifteen from a weight gain to a weight loss!

Eating less was going pretty well for the first few days Alex Greese was at the school. The first challenge was finding a way to 'dispose' of the rest of her welcome basket without eating it. Nicole didn't mind taking it from Alex, having a nightly chocolate whenever she was holed up in her room working on sketches or homework. For four days Nicole and Alex were able to share lunch and at the further encouragement from her roommate Alex avoided more of the rich, calorie related dishes she favored as comfort food. Mac and cheese, potatoes with thick gravy, pot roast, chicken tenders.

Alex and Nicole were keeping to simple meals of salad with plenty of vegetables and a protein. Well, Alex did have dressing on her said. And did reward herself with a small treat here of there but she still was eating far less than she ever did at home. And come Friday, when Alex was all to herself as Nicole's schedule differed, she kept to her resolve on her lunch and dinner plates. Well, she didn't cheat too horribly...

Exercising more was a different issue. Despite the reputation of the student body (it's size, in all connotations) Buttercombe Academy was a grand, vast campus to cross which left Alex walking plenty of distance between classes. As she learned to navigate the school she invariably found the longest routes but that was not enough, she should sign up for a gym class. She still had a week to make changes to her classes for this semester and was looking to drop an economics course, which was redundant for what she had learned about how economics from how her father managed Glacé de Greese.

As she settled into her first week at Buttercombe, it looked like Alex was going to stick to turning her life and weight around.

To bad that all changed at the start of the second week.

( ( ( ) ) )


Alex and Nicole had settled into a comfortable routine by the time their second Tuesday at Buttercombe came about. They had two shared subjects and were studying up on their Lit class, with some healthy alternatives to what Alex previously had for studying snacks. Not snacks, but sundaes!

"So *crunch* *crunch*" Alex brought the crunchy snack of choice to her lips. "When reviewing 'The Yellow Wallpaper' you should remember that it's not actually a ghost story." Nicole had introduced her to dried edamame when she found her fingers and her lips looking for something to eat between mealtimes. They weren't devoid of calories and were an acquired taste but they had just enough salt and umami to satisfy two flavor profiles without being unhealthy. Alex was also riding on the confidence of having another checkup tomorrow about the progress of starting her weight loss plan.

"But isn't it a horror story?" Nicole asked as they compared notes.

"Well, it's not a visceral horror, like vampires or serial killers and stuff," Alex explained, followed by more crunching. "There's a cerebral horror to how it was believed, at the time, to cure a woman of hysteria you could just lock her in a featureless room and--"

Their doorbell buzzed.

"Odd." Alex frowned at the door. She and Nicole had gotten to know a few other of their classmates yet she didn't think any of these acquaintances would make personal visits. "Were you expecting mail?"

Nicole shook her head before she got up to answer the door.

"Alex?" She called. "It's for you."

Perhaps Alex was being presented with more information pertinent to her weight loss plan. Instead, the complete opposite seemed to be staring her in the face and hitting her nostrils full force. An attendant stood in the hall holding an insulated meal delivery bag.

"Alex Greese?"

"Y-Y-Yes?" Alex stammered, confused as to the presence of what smelled like a fried chicken dinner with the fixings.

"As a thank you for entering our Dorm Delivery program," the attendant recited, "we wish to offer you this complimentary meal, with all of your future deliveries at considerable discount."

"Dorm Delivery?" Alex was very bewildered now. She'd heard of it, of course, it was advertised at the cafeteria and the second option on the phones before you dialed out. "I didn't sign up for dorm delivery!"

"You are automatically enrolled after reviewing your medical qualifications," the attendant explained patiently.

Alex couldn't believe what she was hearing. "Medical qualifications?" Was this about her diet? But why would she be given a fried chicken dinner when she was supposed to start a weight loss plan?

"Miss, I just deliver the meals. What you do with it is up to you. It is free."

With much reluctance Alex accepted the delivered meal and with Nicole's help they unpackaged the contents. The roommates discovered that it soon overtook the table where they were studying. An eight piece dinner of dark meat with potatoes, gravy, buttery corn, macaroni salad and coleslaw that was far too sweet.

"I didn't sign up for this." Alex was getting distraught, unsure about what appeared to be a clerical error and struggling with the temptation put in front of her on a disposable takeaway platter. Maybe just one chicken leg couldn't hurt, right, after all this week of trimming calories?

Alex had picked up the leg before she dropped it. "No. This can't be right, these are the kinds of foods I should be avoiding."

Nicole chewed thoughtfully on a spoonful of coleslaw, as she reported the taste. "It did come free. But you're right, we can just leave it here until we decide what to do with it and go grab dinner in the cafeteria as always."

"Right. Yeah." Alex worked to rebuild her budding confidence. She could choose what she wanted to eat. The event had disrupted any attempt at studying so the two roommates left for an early dinner.

Much as Alex hoped the cafeteria would distract her mind from the issue, the visit only compounded the matter as Alex was in line at the register.

"Alex Greese?" said the lunch lady.

"Is something wrong?" Alex grew worried.

"No, I just have to issue you a new meal card ID." Alex was handed the card. "Henceforth your cafeteria fees are waived, which also translates to unlimited credit at campus vending machines and school approved alternative food options."

"WHAT??" Several students turned to the sound of Alex's outburst, as did Nicole looking worried. Alex kept the upgraded card as if it was a black spot. How could she are trusted with an expanded meal plan when her goal was weight loss?

Although her body was hungry her mind was not in any state to eat so Alex dragged a reluctant Nicole back to their room, the two trying to make sense of the issue all the way. She really wanted to check in at the nurse's office to ask what was going on. Unfortunately, the medical office was closed at this hour except for emergencies. Alex had fallen back on her meek habits. She debated back and forth on whether this qualified as an emergency.

"It doesn't make sense." Alex tried to wrap her mind around it. "The delivery, the meal plan, the...oh no..."

"What?" Nicole asked.

Alex recalled where she had seen this information before. "The Special Services for Stipendiaries program. SSS!" Nicole had been placed on Tier II (Basic) after updating her medical records. "My BMI made me automatically eligible for Tier III! Intermediate!"

"I think I missed an exclamation point there," Nicole said much to her roommate's confusion, the artist almost perpetually mellow in personality in tone. "But wasn't that supposed to help with your weight loss goal?"

"It talked about easing accommodations but," Alex couldn't finish her statement when she noticed that their room had been unlocked since they had left, with a few different attendants moving in what looked like a bed. "Hey! Excuse me! What's going on?!"

The supervising attendant looked up. "Oh, you must be Alex Greese. We're setting you up with your new furniture. Unless you wanted to enroll in the single dorm option."

"Single?" Without Nicole? Without any friend to guide her through all this strangeness?? "I don't want to room without her!"

"Yeah, we're friends." Nicole stood by Nicole but didn't have much vigor in her unchanging monotone.

"Suit yourself," the supervisor said. "Looks like a mighty fine meal you got delivered there, shame if it went to waste. By the way, do you happen to have a current copy of your class schedule? We're supposed to swap out your assigned seat as well."

It was enough to make the already 250-pound 15-year-old brunette go run to her room to cry on her bed. Which she couldn't actually do since the bed was currently being swapped for a reinforced model!

12123.content:
Opening the door Alex found the dorm inside to be large and lavish. Her eyes tracing about the room she saw that in one corner sat an older looking student, laying on the couch and currently reading a book. She had raven black colored hair she kept in one long stylish braid down her back, and, as the girl gazed up from her book, Alex saw she also had a pair of dazzlingly bright blue eyes. Said eyes fell upon Alex in the doorway, and the girls jaw dropped just for a second. Alex knew what was most likely going through the older girls mind…Alex’s weight…

Quickly though the couch bound student stood up, a good half foot taller than Alex, and greeted Alex with a smile. “Hi, I’m Dora Winifred Dayzin, but you can call me Dee dee or D.W, or just D! Whatever’s fine.”

“Oh, okay…” said Alex caught off guard by such jovial greeting, and was still expecting the fat insults to fly any second now… “I’m Alex…Alex Gre-“

“Hmmm no uniform yet…wait…oh my gosh…that means…Are you a freshman?” Dora asked, all while walking a small circle around Alex.

“...Yeah…Why?” asked Alex.

“Ahhh!” The teenager gave a girlish squeal and giggle. “I get my very own new-bee roomie!”

To Alex, Dora seemed to be hopped up like a hummingbird on sugar as she tittered about the room, now talking a mile a minute. “Sorry! I mean you’re going to love it here! I get to be like a big sister…I can show you around campus, and we can get lunch together and…”

“Sounds great…but can I sit for a bit?”Alex really did need to take a load of her feet, and she was sure that if she hadn’t said anything Dora would be walking and talking through the rest of the night.

“Oh sure! Um, I already have that room over here, so why don’t you go set your stuff over there…and Oh! And there’s a gift basket in there for you too!” said Dora as she motioned to the unlit bedroom.

Lugging her luggage into the room Alex sat down and found the bed to be quite spongy and comfy. Beside the bed she saw a bountiful looking gift basket and a golden color letter addressed to Alex G. on the front. Even wrapped in thin plastic, the sweet smell wafting from the gift basket was too much to resist, Alex unwrapped it and found a small feast of treats awaiting her including a chocolate chip muffin which she started to munch on while she moved on to the letter.

Dora appeared in the doorway, leaning against the frame. “So Alex, you want to chat for a bit?”

“Whaf?…*smack…smack…gulp*..Sure!” said Alex wanting to talk, but definitely to engrossed in this delicious muffin to actually stop eating it.

“Well, I’m a senior here…” began DD placing a hand to her chest as she mentioned herself. “My family actually owns a chain of hotels nearby, but I’m studying to be a nurse. Everyone’s always asks why aren’t I studying to be a doctor, and I always say I like working WITH people more than operating on them. Have you thought about what you want to do yet?”

“*HmmpH?... chomp*” Dora did seem very welcoming to Alex, so she could certainly see her as an attentive nurse. As for her own career Alex really hadn’t thought about it too much, she was just starting high school after all! “Not really…”

“Well you’ll have plenty of time, I…didn’t mean to pressure you or anything...”

“No *gulp* it’s fine…” Alex feeling a bit emboldened by how the conversation was going so far decided to speak up a bit. “In fact my family happens to own the Glacé de Greese ice cream company…but I’m pretty sure that’s not what I want to do.” Alex had once done everything she could to keep her schoolmates from knowing she was from the Greese family, with hardly any success of course. Now here she was almost bragging about it! How quickly things could change…

“Really, I’ve never heard of the brand. But that’s super cool though! You’ll have to tell me all about it! Or see if you can get some sent here…”

“Sure…*gulp* Hey D” said Alex finishing the last bite of the large muffin, “What’s this note?” Alex held up the letter, she’d yet to open.

“Oh! I completely forgot the welcoming dinner!” said DD her eyes bulging for a bit at the realization. “They do that for Freshman here the first night! How could I forget? Ten minutes in and I…”

“Umm…and what about this?” asked Alex, who now had opened the envelope, and found a blue pamphlet alongside the dinner invitation.

“Hmmm” said DD taking two long strides and began peering over Alex’s meaty shoulders. “Looks like that’s for…the SSS introductory meeting later this week…”

“….oh…” said Alex quietly, and turning red. Things had been going so well, and Alex’s own big fat belly had to go and ruin things!

An awkward pause filled the room, with DD sensing Alex’s discomfort. DD waited another second before continuing on “Well..I don’t know too much about it…other than my roommate last year was on it. She said it helped her out a lot, so I say go for it! I mean It’s literally why they have it in the first place right? For support!”

“I guess going to the meeting couldn’t hurt…you're right!” Alex shifted her weight, and got up from the bed, finding Dora’s enthusiasm for just about everything was rubbing off on her.

“Hey, that’s exactly why they pair us wise seniors with you poor clueless freshman.” Teased DD.

“You’re like what? Three years older than me?”

“Three years is a lot of time to learn from your senior sensei…Now before you go to the feast, come here and hug it out new-bee roomie!”
Alex matched DD’s wide brimming smile, so glad to have hit things off so well with her roommate for the year!

“Mmmph!” Said Dora giving a cute grunt as she finished the hug. “We’re going to have the best year ever girl! Oh, uh better try your new uniform by the way, they kind of expect you to look formal for this thing.” Added Dora pointing towards Alex’s closet, and with that she scooted herself out of the room.

Alex, taking Dora’s advice, found that the uniform waiting for her in the closet was…snug…but fit as well as most of her own older clothes did. Not perfect, but not unbearably tight either. “It’ll fit even better this time next month.” Alex reminded herself, imagining how many new fashion options would be open to her if she lost even just ten pounds from around her middle. Back home the idea of her trying to lose weight seemed doubtful, but here, It was possible! In fact with this positivity buzz surrounding her at the moment, it felt like almost anything was possible!

Alex left her room in her new uniform, feeling rather good about almost everything this school had to offer now, now most notably the idea of this Freshman feast. Alex was on such a roll of positivity she could hardly let her belly’s own rolls get in the way of her making another new friend! Maybe she’d actually try this SSS thing out, even if it was Yeng sponsored…

With a thumbs up of approval from DD and a quick wave goodbye, Alex left the dorm room feeling better than ever!

*Greetings fellow readers and writers!*

I’m going to try and write this branch of the plotline a little bit differently as in….*gasp* second person perspective! Don’t worry I’ll keep it quarantined to this branch only, but that means from here on out you the reader are DD. You can write DD’s thoughts, but no one else’s, so please write accordingly, and adjust your mind’s eye camera to focus solely on her and how /you/ make your choices, (though I understand if you need to make an exception or two I’m not going to be super strict.) If it helps you can consider this path less canonical that others, so feel free to get wild. Hopefully this will be a different change of pace for a storyline. Thanks for reading, and as always, please enjoy~.*


You closed the door shut, but not before savoring the sight of your new roommate Alex’s immense ass and substantial thighs waddling down the hallway to the freshman feast. Watching all that bulk pressed up against the new uniform you could still take in every booty bounce and slight hip wobble, before Alex finally fully slunk out of sight. After locking the door tight, you had to bite your upper lit to stifle the moan building up inside you.

“Holy! Fucking! Shit!” you screamed internally your heart thumping so firmly it literally sent small shivers through your body. Your mind was racing with a million thoughts; but it was best you start in the past with your previous year here at Buttercombe…

***


Junior year you had been assigned to a fellow junior student Lüka Gretel. Lüka G! Lüka …Lüka…Lüka…Your eyes rolled further into the back of your head at just the memory of her. Her red hair, her chocolate brown eyes, her fair skin and that accent that was so cute…Oh and Lüka was stout, exceptionally stout! You sigh deeply, remembering how things had started off so well that year. She was a foreign exchange student, and so she quickly became quite dependent on you to fill her in on how things worked here. All that semester as you were teaching her, you were learning new things about yourself too! Surprising things like; ‘maybe you liked girls’, and, ‘maybe you really liked this girl’, and then eventually, ‘maybe you really enjoyed watching this girl eating and growing fatter.’ It was quite the educational experience that semester to say the least.

Lüka was always friendly she seemed to be happy all the time, and she was smart too even if she could only speak in broken English. So you ended up doing most of the talking when you two would eat together, and Lüka well…she did most of the eating, pausing only now and then to clarify something she didn’t quite understand. Day by day, breakfast, lunch, and dinner you watched how much the foreign girl could put away as she sat on the opposite side of the table, you eventually started offering to get her seconds and thirds so she wouldn’t have to get up herself. You didn’t mind, in fact, you soon realized something about the act was quite pleasurable to you. Even more pleasurable was watching the results of such overeating, it seemed the undergraduate grew wider and thicker by the day! Even in the scant hours when the two of you weren’t in the dining hall, she seemed to mention her weight at least once per day in some fashion; Complaining how tight her uniform was getting, talking about how hungry she was, asking if you could help her fit into her uniform before her new larger one finally arrived! She couldn’t have been doing it on accident right? She had to have know how much it was turning you on! Right?

It was near the end of the first semester when you finally worked up the nerve to ask her; Did Lüka like you? She was gaining weight on purpose because she saw that you liked it right?

WRONG!…Heartrendingly wrong in fact. The fire of passion you thought that had been building between the two of you, was snuffed out as quick as a candle when Lüka revealed she in fact did not feel the same way as you did. What was worse, now that Lüka’s BMI had shot up way past the regular levels needed to qualify for SSS assistance, she ended up transferring out of your dorm room at the start of the following semester, leaving you on your lonesome for the rest of the school year.

It had hurt horrifically being rejected like that. It hurt so badly in fact that all summer long you had done your best to stave off any of your newfound lustful big beautiful woman desires; No videos of gainers stuffing their stomach full of two liters of soda, no checking in on any pictures from weight gaining models you had just started following…you weren’t even going to read any of those fantastically well written Writing.com stories! (Well not like the that site was working most of the time anyways…) A full three months of chastity and starving yourself from any girls who even close to semi-qualified as ‘thicc’…and then the universe drops the plumpest freshman you’d ever seen right into your life as further punishment…

***


Or maybe…as a reward? Maybe…this was a sign? Yeah!

You’d certainly been shocked by the sight of her wide hips nearly eclipsing the doorway as soon as she entered, your jaw dropping reflexively a bit, but you had quickly regained composure. Unconsciously your scheming mind had pointed her straight to the gift basket as well, hoping that sure enough she’d start tearing into it the moment she’d saw it. Sure Alex had seen the note about the freshman banquet, but it wasn’t like you’d be able to keep her in your room all night…as much as you wanted too… Plus you’d even talked her into a quick friendly hug. MMPH! That hug! Four quick seconds of letting your fingers press into those sides that were like malleable dough! Getting to feel up the mousey marshmallow of a girl was just…just…

You slammed into the bathroom, grabbed a fluffy towel from off the rack, and went to town pleasuring yourself. Rubbing away on yourself with shameless abandon you began to invasion what Alex would look like with a few more pounds, then ten more, then twenty, easily outpacing Lüka’s scale tipping three hundred pounds. Then rather suddenly your mind then turned to a vision of a gigantic version of Alex stomping along at building size, a smile on her chubby cheeked face as she reached down into the Buttercombe campus and plucked none other than Lüka from a selection of tiny students. Wordlessly the gigantic Alex plopped your ex-roomie onto her large pink tongue like a piece of candy and then swallowed adding Lüka’s bulk to her own prestigious poundage. You came hard at that thought, bucking your hips in rhythm, breath escaping you in large puffs as you pumped away over and over again till the buzzing in you subsided a bit.

Freud would have had a field day; delusions of grandeur, utilitarian thinking, or hedonistic lust; you didn’t bother to justify or classify how you felt now. All you knew was that this Alex girl was the new hotness that had waddled right into your life, and in mere instants your gothic mourning for your lost love Lüka girl was gone. Alex’s family owned and ice-cream company, and Alex was already eligible for SSS day 1! Take that Lüka!

Expertly cleaning yourself up, and then ensuring the towel and bathroom were properly taking care of, your mind began to reset back into reality. So you knew you like Alex right away, but how were you going to proceed going forward?

Maybe you could cut the tension and just let her know how you feel right off the bat? The best case scenario was that she’s totally into you too and you both can “get to know” each other immediately. Who knew maybe she’s even into the whole “stuffing her like a thanksgiving turkey” thing! Well, okay…maybe don’t tell her THAT much yet, that was a whole other hurdle to deal with. At least tell her you think she’s hot! Plus, even if things didn’t…if she didn’t exactly feel the same way….you’d at least know right away. Sure she was your new roomie, but she wasn’t the ONLY girl in the academy…Maybe if she saw you with someone else she’d even might get a bit jealous…

Of course you could maybe just wait things out for a bit. At least give the poor new-bee a week or two at the school to get settled in before you unload your feelings on her. 12131.content:
Move in week for any school with a dedicated dorm was always a hectic process. Hundreds of students and parents with only a vague idea of what to do would descend upon the school in droves, and the result would always been that at least someone would have an issue. That issue would then cause issues for more people, and issues would cascade like a row of dominoes. A school's ability to run this sort of thing was less about if this would happen, and more about how it was handled when it did.

Buttercomb had always been a school with solid organization, so they had a perfectly sound battle-plan going into this years move-in week. When Monday came around, they were ready to accept new and old students with open arms. They were even ready to handle all the complications that the new partnership with the Yeng Corporation may cause.

And yet, when Monday arrived, there wasn't a single backup of issues. Every issue a student or parent had was handled promptly and efficiently. Problems started and ended at the same point, and the day of arrivals ended without a single complaint. It was unprecedented in the history of the school, and was considered a major accomplishment.

Principal Polluck would have been ecstatic, if any of Buttercomb's staff had been responsible for it, but it wasn't. If fact, the sole reason for the days success was due to a student and her parents.

The Marsh family was not a particularly well-known or wealthy family by any means, but those who did know them knew them by the work they'd done for the Yeng corporation. Ever since the corporation's inception, the Marsh family had worked as Yeng's most trusted allies. When Yeng first negotiated with retailers to put their products on shelves, the Marshes sent the invitations and planned the meeting to perfection. When questions were raised about Yeng's activities in Daven's Port, the Marshes planned and executed a fantastic campaign to clear up the rumors. Simply put, when Yeng needed something done, the Marshes handled it. Though, most of the work the Marshes did wasn't so grandiose. Usually they worked as simple butlers and maids, ready to serve the higher-ups at Yeng at any time. Most would call them servants, but the Marshes thought of themselves as something more. They took pride in their work dispute working in what some would call a lowly profession, and they strive to be the best in it.

Since Buttercomb had entered into a partnership with Yeng, the Marshes only saw fit to send one of their own to Buttercomb as a gesture of good will. Their daughter, Carami, had just entered into her high school years and hadn't chosen anywhere to work yet, so was the ideal choice to send. After speaking with Buttercomb's staff, it was decided that Carami would attend as a normal student so that she could spend the next 4 years away from her maid training and experience life as a normal girl. To broaden her horizons, of course.

* * * * *


Mother and father said that they weren't there to get involved with Buttercomb's move-in process, but when they arrived, they couldn't help but spring into action.

"Dear, could you watch everything for me? I want to see what's happening over there." The first to leap into action was my mother, Aya. She was dressed in a casual summer dress at the time, but she still gave off the air of being a maid regardless. Her posture was perfect, yet she wasn't stiff at all. And her sizeable assets made her seem warm and motherly. She was, in many ways, the perfect maid.

"I think I'll go as well. Darling, go find your room, we'll say goodbye when this is all done." Her father wasn't far behind. He was a fairly young looking man in his mid 30s, but he often spoke well outside his years. Were his wife, Aya, was warm and kind, Gunther was wise and always seemed like he planned his next action minutes beforehand. He was slim, but imposing, and always seemed to know the right thing to say.

I just smiled and watched they took over the work for Buttercomb's staff. I wanted to help out too, but I had my own job to do at that moment, which was to arrive at my and make sure my things were safe and secure.

Of course, it didn't take very long. I'd already researched and familiarized myself with the campus, so while all the other students looked in awe at the campus and fumbled through the process, I glided through the process effortlessly. By the time most people would be gaping at the cafeteria, I was already in her room, securing my things. I didn't take any time to look at my room. Instead, I hurried out of it as soon as I was finished. After all, I knew that there were still people that needed help moving in. I rejoined mother and father quickly and set to work helping out the various other students.

It wasn't an easy task. There were many people with a wide variety of issues, but I did the best she could. I wasn't nearly as experienced as they were, so I had to send people over to my mother or father a lot, but part of the job is knowing your limits and sending people to someone they can actually get help from. That, in of itself, is helpful.

The hardest problems to solve were ones related to student disabilities. I'd been warned about this by my parents, but I was still somewhat surprised by how many overweight girls arrived at the school. Most of the kids at my middle school weren't a kilogram over 100, but there were a few students I saw that had to be at least 150. I could only imagine how well those girls must have been eating. It brought a smile to my face thinking that so many parents cared about their kids that much.

We ended up staying and working until everyone was moved into their rooms, it was around 5pm we we finished. A whole 7 hours after we arrived. That sounds rough, and it was, but it was worth it. Seeing everyone happily move into their rooms was reward enough.

Afterwards, my parents and I said our goodbyes. It didn't take very long though. My mother was nice as always, and my father had plenty of advise to give me. When we were done, they walked back to their car, and I started back towards my dorm.

As I walked, I realized that my roommate would be there by now. Naturally, in my research, I'd already found out her name, age, weight, all that stuff, but I'd yet to see a picture of her, or find out what she was like. It was kinda exciting, actually. Usually I find a lot of stuff like this out before had, but this time I didn't really know what to expect. I wanted to find out who I'd be saying with. Hopefully, we could be great friends, and I could keep practicing being a maid with them! I know, I'm not suppose to be working, but I can't help it. It's in my blood, you know?

Eventually, I got to my -- our -- room, and knocked on it out of habit. I heard a voice yell, "come in!" before opening the door.

On the other side was...

121312.content:
On the other side of the door was a girl that stood a bit shorter than Carami. She guessed that the girl was probably 10 cm shorter her, so that'd be around 165. It wasn't exact, but Carami was pretty confidant in her estimate.

On the other side of the door was a girl who stood about 10 cm shorter than me. That'd make her about 165 cm tall. It's not a perfect estimate, but I'm pretty confidant in it. I need to be able to tell clothing sizes after all. On that note, I'd say her vital stats are probably around... 118, 128, and 120 at probably somewhere around a E cup. That's the best I can do though. Mother and father could probably even figure out her inseam and shoulder width, but I can't do that yet.

I know she's not a client, but friends should know each other's sizes right? I'm 92.4, 68.7, and 99.3 at a FF cup. I know, kinda big for a maid. My mother keeps telling me I'll need to eventually slim down when I start working for real, and I agree. Lugging all this around while working gets tiring after a while.

Oh, I'm using the all the UK standards aren't I? I should probably get use to the US ones, That'd make her... 46, 50, and 47 at an F cup, and me 36, 27 and 39 at an H cup. She'd be 5'5" and I'd be 5'9".

Regardless, the girl in front of me was pretty big. I already knew she was the biggest girl in the freshmen class weighing at about 114kg, but seeing it in person was something else. Her entire figure was covered with a layer of soft, plush fat, and it didn't really seem to have a preference for where it went. Since she was wearing a white one-piece at the time, it kinda made her look like a marshmallow. I kinda wanted to hug her just to feel it, but I didn't. Best to make a good first impression. Besides that, she wore a pair of glasses and wore her long-ish brunette hair down. Her bangs were medium length, but that didn't stop them from resting slightly against her cheeks.

She looks pretty nervous, so I could guess she wasn't the most out going person, but I don't want to be assumptive, so I'll refrain from looking into her any further for now.

Anyway, I believe her name was...

"Alex Greese, right?" I smiled at her, making sure she's who I think she is. I'm pretty confidant about it though.

"Ah!" Me saying her name first surprised her. She tried regaining her composure the best she could before responding, "Yes, and you are...?"

"I'm Carami Marsh, your new roommate. It's a pleasure to meet you." I gave her a little bow afterwards out of habit. that probably wasn't a good idea though, because it flustered her a bit.

"Oh... oh! Okay, you too... uh... would you like to come in?"

"Hmm? do I need permission to enter my own room?" I tried messing with her a bit.

"Ah--" She seemed taken aback at first, but then broke into a chuckle. "Hehehe, I guess you're right."

It was my joke, but I started laughing a bit too. Good, she's not completely wound up.

I walked into the dorm and started taking a look around. It had changed a bit since I was last in here. The once bland, yellow walls were now covered in small little decorations. A plush toy here, a character pillow there. Seems like her interests are as fluffy as she is.

"Ah, I kinda went a bit overboard with decorating. Is all this okay? I can take some of it down if you don't like it or you have something you want to put up."

"No, it's fine," I reassured her, "I don't really have anything to put up." Besides, I actually really liked it. It was pretty cute all things considered.

She seemed relieved by my comment. Though, after a moment a worried expression flashed across her face, and she turned to me.

"Actually, now that I think about it, I wanted to ask you something."

"Hm, what is it?"

"Well... Do you know what's going on with our room?"

Ah, that. I had a feeling I knew what she was talking about. The rooms at Buttercomb weren't really rooms, they were actually more like a full apartments. Each student got their own room, and each pair of students had a near full-sized kitchen and bathroom. It was certainly bigger than any other high school dorm. We had all that, but the difference here was that a lot of it was bigger than it should have been. Our kitchen wasn't 'almost' full sized, it was full sized. Not only that, but the doors and halls were wider. Even the furniture was a bit bigger than it should have been, and on further inspection, they even seemed to be reinforced with steel frames. Anyone would think it was at least a bit odd.

I didn't though, because I'd already looked into it. Apparently, these rooms were meant for students with disabilities. The school's disability program, SSS, allowed students at higher disability tiers to have access to special rooms to accommodate their conditions. These rooms are typically provided for those at tier 3 or higher. The final piece of this puzzle was that the system counted excess body weight as a disability. Tier III was granted to any student over 35 on the BMI. Alex is 113 kilos at-- sorry, 250 lb at 5'5" which put her at... 41 on the BMI.

Alex was Tier III on SSS, that meant she got an upgraded room. apparently, no one told her this. Well, I should probably tell her. She's going to need to know sooner or later.

So, I took the next few minutes explaining all that. Afterwards, she looked even more worried than before for some reason.

"W-what!? I'm... I'm so fat that they think I have a- a disability..." She looked distraught, like I'd told her that her puppy died.

"What's wrong? Wouldn't having something like this help you?" Honestly, I think she should be happy about it. The school's accommodations mean that she could be comfortable even at her size.

"I guess, but I don't want to be this big! I... I guess it's just a bit of a shock. I know I'm big, but..." her words trailed off; though, she eventually spoke up again, "Just so I know, what else does it give me?"

"Well, you can use powered scooters, you don't have any cafeteria fees, and you get discounts on dorm delivery services."

When I told her what I'd read on the school's site, her face went pale. "Th-that's... I don't want any of that! I'm... I'm trying to..." She looked like she was about to cry.

I still couldn't understand what she was so worried about. I'm sure she gets hungry a lot, free food means she can satisfy herself. Why would anyone not want that?

But it was obvious that something here mattered to her a lot. She looked so pitiful, like a kitten in the rain. I wanted to help her, badly. I know I'm suppose to be here to broaden my horizons and not work as a maid, but the maid in me is shouting at me to help her.

So, I placed my hand on her head and started stroking it to calm her down. I don't know why, it's probably because she reminded me of a small animal, but it did seem to calm her down. Once she looked up at me, I said "Hey, if you tell me what's wrong I might be able to help."

Her eyes widened as she stammered, "Wh-why would you--"

"Because, what kind of mai-- uh, roommate would I be if I left you like this," I smiled at her.

"R-really? You'll help?"

"As much as I can."

"O-okay... well," She started, and from there she told me about her issue. Apparently, she didn't really feel comfortable with her current weight. It embarrassed her and made her feel insecure. The fact that the school apparently thought of it as a disability didn't help. She'd actually came to the school with the intention of loosing weight, but free meals, delivery, and a power scooter is going to have the opposite effect. "I just don't trust myself, you know? I already tried some of the food, and it was so good... I... I need some one to help me keep on my diet!" She declared at the end.

At that point, the two of us had taken a seat on the reinforced couch. I sat there, thinking the entire situation over. Honestly, I'm usually opposed to the kind of diets she's talking about. They require starving one's self of all their favorite foods as well as constant, demanding exercise. All this gets harder and harder the heavier you are, and she was already 250 lb. It'd be hell on her. But she's also clearly suffering from this already. If I just leave her alone, her self-loathing might get worse.

Hmm... what's the best option here...
