Free Choice
1233112222321.content:
Meanwhile, at another part of Buttercombe Academy's expansive campus, Harmony was attending her first class as well, 'Culinary Arts', a more stylish way of saying 'Cooking'. The room was laid out to have rows of shared desks in the middle and several miniature kitchen stations hugging the walls, each of them equipped with the bare minimum a student needed to make a three-course meal at the very least. "Alright, class, good morning to you all!" An athletic-looking woman with dark red hair was standing at the front of the class, the words 'Ms. Amber Crowley' written in marker on the whiteboard behind her and standing in great contrast to the students, many of them chubby, some of them properly fat, and one or two around the same size as Vera. Harmony looked around her and found Darcy from the sushi restaurant last night behind her, the wide-hipped girl meeting her gaze and smiling in recognition. The Hammond returned her smile before diverting her attention back to Ms. Crowley's speech. "Tomorrow we'll be going over proper...er, nutritional etiquette, but today, I want to see where everyone is regarding their experience in cooking. I'm going to assign you all into pairs of two, and then please go over to an available kitchen and get a feel for everything by cooking your favorite dish."

As if the stars had aligned at just the right sequence in the heavens, Harmony found to her surprise that Darcy and she would become partners, for today and the rest of the semester. After the rest of the class was paired with someone else, Amber Crowley released them all from their desks and instructed them towards the kitchens, while she would walk around and observe to make sure things were going smoothly. The kitchens, the Hammond found, were well-equipped, but quite small, something that was very apparent to her as her new partner accidentally hip-checked her for the fourth time in the first five minutes. "S-sorry about that, Harmony..." Darcy apologized with an ever-increasing blush on her face. "If you want, I can ask Ms. Crowley to switch if this is too much of a problem." Harmony, despite the blush she was mirroring, shook her head with a smile.

"Th-that's alright, Darcy. I'm happy to have you as my partner!" She smiled, putting the wide-hipped girl at ease, at least somewhat. "So, what were you thinking to cook? She said to make our favorite meal, right?"

"Pomegranate-Honey Glazed Chicken," Darcy said with a smile...but Harmony could tell that her heart was not into it, it looked strained and forced. "I mean, it's not my favorite, and I know that's what the teacher asked us to make, but..."

"How about we make my favorite, instead? I'd hate to see you eat something you don't like?" Harmony offered.

But Darcy shook her head. "No, it's not that I don't like glazed chicken, I love it! It's just...I don't love it as much as cheeseburgers..." Her blush came back, looking dejectedly at her fat-swathed rear end and thighs, swamping over the kitchen's counter and pushing some utensils out of the way. "I've been trying to eat healthy as of late, trying to get rid of this fat ass. It gets in the way and has a mind of its own. I can't turn around without accidentally hitting someone with it, which I'm sure you know now."

"H-hey, we all deserve cheat days, right? Your, uh...posterior is bigger than average, yes, but you're not so bloated anywhere else, from what I can see." Harmony tentatively moved forward to place her hand on Darcy's shoulder, not liking her new partner putting herself down. "And, if you don't mind me saying...I'd k-kill to h-h-have an ass like yours..." Harmony instantly regretted what she said the moment it left her mouth. Why did she say that!? It was so forward and personal, and she had only known the girl for less than half of a day!

But Darcy's reaction to the comment was not negative at all. "O-oh! Well...thank you, Harmony. I still think it's too big, but your right, I have all semester to get rid of it. Today's cheat day~." She turned around to put the ingredients for her glazed chicken meal away, accidentally bumping her prodigious rear end into Harmony once again. The Hammond blushed heavily from the action but said nothing, figuring she was going to have to get used to those globes of butt blubber crashing into her if Darcy was going to be her partner. And, secretly, she was planning to convince the girl to have more 'cheat days' in the future, meaning it might be more of a 'problem' at the time went on. "So, any suggestions for what we should use for our hamburgers?"

"Mayonnaise, maybe? And bacon, grilled onions, and maybe I can make some fries to go with it?" Harmony was quick to offer the most calorie-laden foods to put into their creation, which Darcy did not object to. "And...look! This freezer has Ice Cream! Do you know what goes great with burgers and fries? Milkshaks~" Darcy nodded, getting a mixer machine for Harmony to use, while the Hammond began dicing up pieces of pineapple and pie crust to make a pineapple upside-down cake flavored shake. Dumping pretty much the whole carton into the blender along with a liberal smothering of salted caramel syrup, she set the machine on low so that she could focus her attention on the other projects in the kitchen that needed attending to.

Meanwhile, Ms. Crowley, walking around the class to see if there was anyone who needed help getting settled with their new kitchens, noticed what Harmony and Darcy were making from afar and frowned. So many calories, she thought, and theirs probably were one of the more healthy meals being made out of everyone else. When she told her students to cook their favorite meals, she didn't think that most of them would make pancakes and pizza and meat pies and pasta. She was going to have a serious time of reigning in their diets this semester.

Near the end of class, Harmony and Darcy were finally done with their meal. There were two hamburgers, one for each of them to enjoy, each of them stacked high with three beef patties dripping with grease and slices of cheese, next to an impressive pile of fries and a tall glass of milkshake topped with whipped cream. Darcy knew that all the calories in what she was about to eat were going to go straight to her ass...but it looked soooooo good.

1241.content:
Camela Menica awoke smiling from her quite pleasurable slumber. How could the teenager not sleep like a queen knowing she “earned” the prime position she’d worked her way towards?

Having come from a rougher neighborhood than most Buttercombe girls, Camela knew to get anywhere in Buttercombe you had to live más! Even before her Buttercombe years, she learned from experiencing life the hard way that if you wanted to get things done you had to be a bit demanding and willing to break some rules! And also, unlike what she imagined about most of the girls here, she hadn’t come from a wealthy or powerful family, no her own family was far from privileged, and that meant Camela had to promptly learn how to take advantage of all the school offered, and them some! Lunch passes, snack machine discounts, special perks for offering to be an R.A, the school was giving opportunities away, and Camela being woman of action was all too willing to take and take and take anything that was being given out! In her hunger for perks and opportunities to rise up the ranks, she’d gotten power hungry! It was sometime during her Sophomore year though all those opportunities and responsibilities, and perks, well they started to just go a bit to her head…and her stomach…oh and especially her ass!

As Camela dressed in front of her room’s mirror she still had to marvel every time her reflection showed how chunky her tanned chocolate colored chulo had gotten! Now a senior at the school the latina’s body was now inescapable of being described as anything other than large, or grande or gorda by her family, and yet her ass was still proportionally just plain bigger than the rest of her. Not that she minded at all, hell it made sitting all the more plush and pleasurable. In fact she really didn’t dislike anything about her swollen size, if anything it only meant the on rush of more and more perks for her. No cafeteria fees AND dorm deliver thanks to the SSS, with the promise of more to come now that she’d reached tier IV!

Her new size also seemed to gift her with an unanticipated bonus… intimidation. Any skinny freshman who was going to give Camela (or Ms. Menica if she was feeling particularly bossy that day) would think twice before getting into an argument with a woman who weighed three times what she did. Camela’s supreme size, unconsciously or not, frightened quite a few annoying students back into following rules Camela’s rules. Yes, all in all Camela had “earned” the good life; a senior, SSS privileges, the special R.A’s room to herself, and a butt load of New-bee’s she could boss around! She knew though she couldn’t relax just yet, not before letting this year’s floor know that their R.A was large and in charge here! Take for instance what she was doing now…

Each semester a complimentary welcome basket was left in all rooms for each girl attending Buttercombe, complete with complimentary chocolate muffin. Now fully dressed, Camela quickly snatched each and every muffin from each and every gift basket. You wanted to be large and in charge you have to earn it, just like she did, no matter how many other students and co-eds she had to step on to get there, when Camela wanted something she did anything it took to get what she wanted. Anything. Plus, rewarding any newbie that wanted to get on Camela’s good side with a chocolate muffin would be icing on the cake. Wolfing down three of the chocolate chipped calorie laden delights as a prelude to breakfast, Camela went and washed up in her bathroom. On her way she noticed there was some mail she hadn’t read yet, probably more about that SSS perks and changes they were making this year, she’d definitely look into those later. Más prima!

Camela could hear high pitched voices, and footsteps now, knowing these same voices would be begging to do favors for her days from now, and the matching footsteps would be hurriedly carrying out anything she asked them to do or face her wrath. One last time she checked the mirror making sure she looked flawless, that her entire appearance was spot on and exuded power, so every Freshman, Sophomore, Junior or even other Seniors that were living on her floor, would all quickly come to know that she was Camela Menica and she had the power here.

Leaving her room Camela took her first look at the students of her floor as they came flooding in, Camela could see…

12411.content:
SATURDAY, 9:35 AM: THE 4TH FLOOR LOUNGE OF THE WEST WING OF THE RESIDENCE HALL

"Now that all of you signed in, let's go over the floor rules." Carmela presided at a podium from the front of the room, leaning her elbows into the wood, gazing at her subjects. Seems like mostly freshmen this year, not a weight over 250. Nice. Freshmen are fun. What a blessing for her senior year. "As you may already know, my name is Carmela Márquez Mencia. I am your RA. This means I run things around here. THAT is the first rule." Carmela turned to the white board behind her and grabbed a blue dry-erase marker from its tray. She wrote "#1: I AM IN CHARGE" in big letters on it. As she wrote, her rump and armflab jiggled slightly. She liked that. She turned back to the congregation. "This is the most important rule. You do what I tell you, and I do what I want. For example, you may have noticed that I've taken all of your muffins from your welcome baskets. I did this because I could, and because I like muffins. I'll be eating all of them. You can't have them back. Now, while I am the person in power and my power is absolute, this will be the only time I abuse that power unprovoked. But understand that if you break the rules, ESPECIALLY rule 1, I will not hesitate to requisition your property, put you under indentured servitude, or mete out your punishment in any other way I see fit. Is that understood?" The room grumbled with "yes"es and "yeah"s as Carmela put her hands on her hips. "Good." She picked up a clipboard from her podium. "Now here are the other rules straight from the Buttercombe student handbook..."

As Carmela paced across the front of the room like a navy general, reading out every minute syllable of the residence hall rules (boring shit like "the trash cans must never be more than 85% filled" and "showers must only last 20 minutes maximum") Catie Ranganathan and Dee Saurel whispered to each other in the back of the room. "I hate this fuckin' bitch." "I know right? We just got here and she's already getting on my nerves." Both were the only seniors in the room other than Carmela, transfers from out of state. Catie and Dee were best friends and essentially sisters from a young age, attached at the hip since elementary school. After, let's say, an "incident" involving her parents' in-ground swimming pool, underage drinking, and lots and lots of green Jello mix, Dee was sent off to Buttercombe as a means of straightening her out and getting her away from the "bad influences" she'd been hanging out with. Of course, Catie was heartbroken to find this out and begged her very permissive folks to send her away too, a request they happily obliged. And so here they were, both far away from home, getting lectured about how much dust they can let accumulate on the tops of their wardrobes.

"So now," Carmela started, pulling a padded rolling chair from beside her and sitting and straddling it, back to her chest, "we're gonna get to know each other. Your floormates are going to be great friends of yours, I'm sure of it. We're gonna go around the room and you're gonna tell us your name, your year, where you're from, and three facts about yourself. Three facts, you ask? Why three? Because I said so. I'm not letting you off the hook. Who wants to start?"

...And silence. A thin freshman with dyed blue hair coughs, but says nothing.

Carmela clears her throat and rolls a little on her chair, which creaks under her bulk. "I guess I'll start and we'll go clockwise. Ahem, I am Carmela Márquez Mencia, which you should know if you were paying attention, God help you if you don't. I am a senior, but I want to try and go for a fifth year because I love it here so much." Dee looked to her friend and made a mock gag motion with her finger and her mouth. They giggled silently. "I'm from Philadelphia, but I was born in Puerto Plata in the Dominican Republic. Three facts about myself: my favorite food is empanadas, but the idiots in the cafeteria can't make Latin American food for shit here so I haven't had one in a looooong time, when I graduate I want to pursue either criminal justice or law in my higher education, and if you want to get on my good side I DO accept bribes. Okay, that's me. You next."

Eventually the finger turned to Catie. She put on a faux-"happy to be here" voice, but everyone could tell she wasn't too jazzed. "Hi, I'm Catherine Ranganathan, but you can all call me Catie. I'm a senior, transferred from Ohio, which is coincidentally also where I'm from. I, uh, I guess I wanna go into culinary school or business or something so I can own a restaurant like my oldest brother. I used to play softball at my old school. And… Oh! My family on my dad's side is Bengali." Carmela's ears perked up at the word "culinary". She looked the girl over: she was about her height with dark hair that complimented her tan skin, styled into a long ponytail that rested on her left shoulder. She had big brown eyes and angular, groomed eyebrows, very much on fleek. She was a little pudgy, mostly on her broader than average hips, but very small for a senior. Carmela made a mental note to keep an eye on her. Those cooking skills could come in handy…

Then was Dee's turn. "Do I have to?", she muttered to her friend, who elbowed her without looking, smiling a big fake smile. "Fine." She made no effort to conceal how much she didn't want to be here. "I'm Dee Saurel. My transcript says my name is Mary Saurel, but it's wrong. My name is Dee. I'm also a senior and I also transferred from Ohio. Do I have to say three facts? Can't I just say one?"

Carmela looked unamused. "Three facts." This chick looked like a troublemaker. She had a late-2010s alt-girl look to her: dyed blonde hair messily done up into two pigtails, a black choker, wireframe circular glasses that probably weren't prescription, a septum piercing rotated out of symmetry, strong eyeliner, black lipstick, pale white skin. She wore a black leather jacket over her uniform and was stick thin, a few inches shorter than her friend.

She ran through quickly, to get it over with. "Ugh. I'm here because I turned the pool into jello. I didn't come to this school on my own free will. When I graduate I don't want to do anything."

Carmela made another mental note: this girl's gonna break a lot of rules. She'll have her worshipping her 24/7 by the end of all the punishment she'll have to mete out. She couldn't wait.

124111.content:
SATURDAY, 11:17 AM: ROOM 407 - CARMELA'S ROOM

Carmela was in her typical position: laying in bed, watching Netflix on her 60 inch TV. Directly after the floor meeting that morning she had changed from her prim and proper Buttercombe uniform back into her more comfortable clothes: a big white undershirt and a tight pair of felt shorts which did very little to cover her behind and clung to her like panties. She munched on a bag of Cheetos, which she had almost completely devoured. After she finished the bag, which made up her breakfast along with all 30 of muffins she had requisitioned this morning, she licked off her cheese-stained fingers and mentally prepared for lunch. Ahh, this was the good life.

Carmela was, like all the faculty and staff of Buttercombe, enrolled in the Special Services for Stipendiaries program. She was in the fourth tier, which was typically intended for students and teachers with mobility issues who wouldn't normally be able to make it to class, but because of her weight and a childhood asthma diagnosis of which she hadn't had an attack in almost a decade, she very easily qualified. This had a number of perks: voluntary class attendance, free lunches, extra amenities for her room upon request, and more, but her absolute favorite of these perks had to be cafeteria delivery. Discounts came with every subsequent SSS tier, but even at tier 3 it was still something of a luxury. But tier 4? It was free. Free food and free delivery. At the push of a button.

Carmela stood up, stretched, scratched an itch on her ass, and plodded barefoot over to the desk where her Y-Pad was. She started it up, opened the BUTTERCOMBE CAFETERIA app, and scrolled through today's menu. The move-in day offerings were always more opulent than normal, so Carm clicked a lot of boxes. Like, a LOT of boxes. Two, no, THREE large pizzas, four XL orders of the INCREDIBLE mac and cheese, fifty chicken nuggets, four two-liter bottles of root beer (her favorite), and a slice of chocolate cake. No, actually make that a whole chocolate cake. If she can't finish it in one sitting, well, there's more for later. And this was LUNCH.

After placing her order, Carmela plodded back to her spot on the bed and flopped down, springs squeaking under her bulk, turned Netflix back on, and waited.
124111.title: Lunch Order

choices: Carm eats her way through the inspection, making Catie do all the work
Carm plants incriminating evidence in Catie's room, opening her up for punishmen
1241112.content:
SATURDAY, 11:49 AM: ROOM 407 - CARMELA'S ROOM

Carmela was halfway through her second pizza when there was a knock at her door. Ugh. The goddamn nerve of these kids. Since we saw her last, Carmela had received her opulent to say the least lunch. The tantalizing spread had been unloaded atop the coffee table as she watched, unmoving and lounging on her bed. She also demanded the delivery girls push the table across the room to her bedside so she could have easier access. Her intent to move from her position was non-existent; the less exertion the better. This was move-in day, for crying out loud! What more productive thing to do but sample the best the Buttercombe cafeteria had to offer… and sample she did.

Before her rude interruption, Carm had wolfed down in record time three of four orders of mac and cheese, barely breathing between bites, about half of her chicken nuggets, one and a half of her root beer bottles, and finally experienced one of the greatest culinary ideas she had ever conceptualized. Since she mentioned it at the floor meeting, Carmela had been thinking about Mexican food. How she hadn't had a really good burrito in a long time. Or a great taco. Then, mouth full of cheesy pasta, eyeing the pizzas yet to grace her taste buds, inspiration struck. She opened one of the boxes and dumped one of her mac and cheese containers onto the circular pie, then sprinkled chicken nuggets into the mix. She rolled the pizza up, bread sagging with grease, cheese coming out of its tubular opening, and held it like an award. My God. It's fucking beautiful. She chomped down on her giant pizza burrito and continued and continued, the cheese staining the margins of her mouth and chin like a poorly applied yellow lipstick. Occasionally stray macaronis dropped down onto her lap and shirt and cleavage, an unfortunate casualty of her display of gluttony.

After devouring the whole thing, Carm leaned back to catch her breath. She rubbed her belly, which was taut but still hidden beneath her baggy shirt. Memories of seconds ago danced in her head. She belched, something she only really tried to do at the end of meals as some sort of cosmic compliment to the chef, but she couldn't help herself. There was so much, she needed to make room. Fuuuuck. Then, in her moment of respite, a knock at her door, and from Carmela, a different kind of "fuuuuuck." She tried to stay silent in the hopes that whoever was knocking would think she's out and go away, but that thought process was interrupted with another beefy burp. They knocked again. Well, shit. Guess she had to answer now.

Meanwhile, on the other side of the door was Catie, the aspiring restaurant owner from before. She was still in her Buttercombe uniform since she and Dee, her roommate, didn't have a chance to change yet. She held in her hand the roommate agreement form and room inspection checklist, very basic paperwork for dorm living, but she was bracing herself for the worst from her RA, especially because of the signage on her door saying "IF THIS DOOR IS SHUT, I'M BUSY". But she wasn't prepared to take any shit.

From inside, there was a persistent thudding of footsteps until the door swung open, hitting Catie with an overwhelming pizza smell as Carmela stared her down. Even though Carmela was the same height as Catie, she seemed to loom above her like a grand mountain. Her mouth was covered in cheese and sauce, bent to a slight frown. She had very clearly been interrupted. "What do you want. Can't you read the sign? It says when the door's closed I'm busy."

Catie was, of course, prepared. "Well Carmela, I'm just here for my room inspection. I'd like to get it over with."

Carmela rudely licked some of the cheese from her lower lip. "Didn't I tell you at the meeting to wait for tomorrow for that? I've got- URRRRRRP. Work to do today." She didn't excuse herself after her burp, instead lifting up her shirt slightly to expose her fat gut, giving it a little jiggle so as to convey "the work I just spoke of is stuffing my face".

"Like I said, I'd like to get it over with. I have things to do tomorrow, and so does my roommate."

It seemed to Catie that Carm admired her persistence, but really she realized that she could use this interruption to her advantage. "Alright. Fine. I'll get my clipboard and we'll do your inspection." She shut the door in Catie's face. This was annoying, but it was a chance for HER to be annoying.

124122.content:
Camela continued to squint her eyes a bit, adding to her already hoggish like appearance. It looked like someone was moving a vending machine down the hallway or something? ¡Excelente! More vending machines for her to raid at the end of each month with her R.A. master key.

Wait a minute…*Boom* *Boom*

That wasn’t a machine that was moving…*Thump* *Smack* *Bang*

This was…THE absolutely largest girl Camela had ever seen! And she’d spent three years at this school! Now her eyes were nearly bulging out of their sockets trying to comprehend this…this…enormous mound of booming blubber as it slowly made its way towards where she stood. Tall as well as wide, each step of her waddle seemed to echo down the hall sending Camela’s own frame slightly trembling.

“N-no way.” Camela weakly gawked, as the gigantic student now continued thundering her way closer with every step. As the heavyset heap of flab loomed nearer, Camela could see more and more outrageous details of the girthy girl come into view. A great whopper of a stomach surged out and upright, making the white top she wore look like a tightly drawn cream colored beanbag. The gut her top failed to contained bounced from below the outfit, with each movement sending it visible flopping atop the girls tree trunk like thighs. Her breasts bobbed along with the rest of her body, they were ample and perky enough they almost seemed to force her arms a bit to her sides. Below the top-half of tonnage, her heavy thighs bustled forward in a slow steady motion, but her hips had enough of a wobble and bounce that Camela could tell there was a prodigious posterior being trucked behind the woman.

That was another thing, Camela quickly came to realize. Camela could personally confirm, some days her own tremendo culo had meant she’d fight to get out of chairs, i.e. adjusting to her own weight over the years had often been a bit of a struggle. Yet, she simply couldn’t get over how the gargantuan girl seemed to move so easily, like she was comfortable crating around such heft. Even getting red faced this fatty never seemed to awkwardly stumble or stagger to the side.

“¡Hostia puta!” Camela cursed under her breath, slipping back into her native tongue as the large and wide woman locomotive finally came to a rest, right outside the R.A’s door.

“Whew!…Are you…the R.A?” the gargantuan girl exhaled noisily, wiping a few beads of sweat from her forehead before resting her expansive backside against the wall opposite of Camela. Caught like a deer in headlights Camela only nodded. In response, the girl reached into her voluminous cleavage with her sausage like fingers and retrieved an envelope, she then extended the moist crinkled honeysuckle yellow letter towards Camela. Camela gingerly plucked it from the girls pudgy paw, the letter having been bathed in both sweat and the outrageously obese female’s perfume of choice. As Camela began to open the letter, the sizable schoolgirl then immediately began fishing about in the purse she carried till she found a king size candy bar and quickly worked her way through it, her delivery duty now done.

Truthfully, Camela actually had been sent the exact same note just the night before, and if she had browsed her mail that morning she might have been a tiny bit better prepared for this surprise wrecking ball that had crashed her plans. Since arriving here days earlier than most other students, (another R.A perk) her mind had been absorbed with making sure everyone knew she was going to be the big shot around here…only now…

While reading the message, the Latina lass couldn’t keep her jaw from dropping even further at this sudden shocking turn of events;

***


Rush Immediate Attention to; Camela Mencia R.A

It is with great pleasure that I now inform you that the relative of one of our most influential alumni will be residing on your floor. Given the roving nature of her family’s work she’s bounced around a bit before finally settling here at Buttercombe, and while other floors were perhaps a bit more suited to a girl of her specific needs, her mother quite insisted on the idea of her staying in the same hall as she herself resided in during her own Junior year. This sudden shift in room arrangements has been attended to on our database, and going forward we hope the you can account for the minor adjustment to your attendance sheets as well. We do apologize for not notifying you sooner. Should you require anything further, or any further inquiries please don't hesitate to notify my office.

With highest gratitude

Headmistress Polluck

(This next part looked to have been handwritten below the typed text.)

P.S. It should go without saying that given the generous nature of the students family, making sure they are appeased with their stay on your floor would shine brightly on Buttercombe as school as well as your own record. Good performance on your part would not go unnoticed or unrewarded. On the other hand failure on your part to keep our new attendant happy, might put a damper on the high prestige Buttercombe holds itself to, and it would follow with the termination of many of the current benefits you now enjoy.
Just something to keep in mind. - S.P.

***


Camela couldn’t believe it! A note right from the Headmistress herself. Camela was supposed to rule her floor with a flabby iron fist this year! Now it looked like she was going to have spend it practically babysitting this…this…
124122.title: Senior Senorita Sees A Supersized Student

choices: "I...I'm sorry. P-p-please...don't be mad!"
"Or else what BITCH!?"
"Come on, I'm sure a cutie like you loves having people over..."
*Rumble* "Got any more to eat here? I'm still hungry."
1241221.content:
“Kanda Boonliang-Spencer…?” Camela repeated aloud as she re-read the last scrawlings on the note. The Latina lass was pretty sure she had butchered the name somewhere; it was clearly foreign, just like the girl overwhelming her doorway.

The whale of a woman (still resting her monumental as on the wall); had a dusty brown skin that certainly seemed natural, thin brown eyes and shoulder-length black hair.

“Mmmph?” The girl mumbled, her fat cheeks flooded with the last remnants of her chocolate bar, as she dully responded to her name.

“I wasn’t talking to you.” Camela replied with a hint of iciness in her voice. All-in-all she was rather annoyed; she had planned to head down to the cafeteria at some point for the welcome feast, but now she had no idea what she was supposed to do!

“Oh.” The girl replied, licking her fingertips of any chocolate residue; before opening her mouth again. “Can I come in? My feet are tired.” Without waiting for any kind of answer, the behemoth of a girl huffed and puffed in an effort to push her colossal ass off of the wall and began to waddle towards Camela!

With the kind of effort one saved for wafting away a fly, the titanic teen pushed Camela aside! It was like the R.A was a freshmen again; getting pushed around by all the obese seniors! Stomach pressed against stomach as Kanda waddled into the dorm room and approached the couch.

Then, with a grace that did not fit her elephantine proportions, the girl lowered herself onto the couch. The metal bent, but held as the land whale made herself comfortable. Now happily seated, the girl began to fan herself with one fat hand, her tongue lolling as she panted.

“Sorry; I can’t…*puff*…stand for very long…*wheeze*…at my…*gasp*…size.” She forced out, her voluminous chest rising and falling like a set of bellows.

Camela was dumbfounded and speechless. First this queen of the sea cows shows up, then she gets a weird letter about babysitting her or something, then the girl just waltzes into her dorm room like she owns the place!? This would not stand! She strode towards the intruder, her buoyant buttocks bouncing with her rage, and stood ready to give this girl a verbal bitch-slap she was never going to forget…

But Camela held her tongue; remembering the letter that still resided, scrunched up, in her balled fist. As she tried to remain calm; the lardass seemed to have regained her breath, and was now pulling out various candy bars and other unhealthy snacks from her purse in some fast-food version of Mary Poppins.

“Can you explain why you are here?” Camela asked, poorly hiding her snarl behind gritted teeth.

“*Ommmph* *urp*” The response wasn’t very promising.

“Sorry…didn’t catch that…” Camela replied, barely hiding her venom.

“*Gulp* Mom’s rich.” Came the audible reply, before the Thai teen stuffed her face full of junk again.

Ok that line of questioning was going nowhere. “And you are in what year…?” Camela asked, changing the subject and hoping to herself she wouldn’t be dealing with this butterball for too long.

“*URP* Sophomore.”

“Mierda…” Camela cursed, that meant she would need to be shown all the ropes. Wait…sophomore…this girl was HUGE!? How was she only a sophomore! On learning this fact, Camela studied her (literal) huge problem more closely.

Kanda wasn’t overly big in any specific area; she just seemed equally huge no matter what part of her you looked at, she was fat from top to toe. Hell, Camela was even wondering if this girl could even wiggle her toes. Staring closer, Camela tried to eyeball the girl’s weight. She wasn’t a great judge at just how fat someone was, but she gave it a shot.

For starters she was clearly bigger than Camela, so that put high three-hundred pounds out of the running. Five-hundred? Nah, that was a bit too big. Four fifty? Hmmm, little low-ball there. High four hundred pounds? That was probably right; and insane when Camela thought about it.

For a near-quarter ton teen, Kanda was surprisingly well-dressed. Her top fit her well, with only a sliver of cinnamon skin peeking out from under the lip. And her Khaki pants didn’t seem to be busting at the seams; in fact she had managed to tuck her big belly into them quite comfortably. She seemed pretty prim in general. She had neatly applied makeup, and her hair (while clearly naturally straight) had been curled and dyed a chocolate brown at the tips.

Pretty-little-rich-girl or not, Camela still wanted this blubbery ball out of her dorm room, NOW!

Stomping closer, Camela loomed over the seated leviathan. Still she went unnoticed in the face of the girl’s gorging; so with one swipe Camela snatched the soda can the girthy girl had been guzzling from.

“Listen. I don’t care what that letter says.” She snapped. “But you can’t come into my dorm and treat it like your hotel. Go. To. Your. Own. Room.”

Camela was quite happy with herself as she straightened up. She hadn’t been outright rude, so the Headmistress or the Vice Principal couldn’t do squat. But she had laid down the law, like an R.A should (for once in her life).

Looking up at the Latina Senior, the bigger of the two women opened her mouth…

As the daughter of an employee, Shino has been exposed to Yeng products for as long as she can remember. What started as an innocent curiosity in the free samples her parents brought home, has evolved into full on addiction.

Her family moved to America from their native Japan not long after Shino was born, following a deal for a better life abroad (funded by their employers). Shino has been surrounded by Yeng products all her life; their media devices, mobility aids, and especially their snack food range. Shino is the perfect prototype of what Yeng wants in the perfect consumer, and they will be keeping an eye on her closely.

Shino is a very curious and happy-go-lucky girl who will try anything once; this joyful attitude combined with her once-plump appearance and chubby cheeks has always made her seem like quite the sweetheart. But now her access to limitless Yeng products to gorge on has blown her up into a real whale of a woman, and people would be more concerned with her ability to get around than how cute she is.
She's still really cute mind...underneath a whole lot of blubber.

She gains weight evenly, with a slight emphasis around her middle.



Peggy Wilson

Fat from a young age, Peggy quickly jumped on the idea that what she was best at doing was gaining weight. Peggy has twenty different plans on what she wants to do when she graduates, and all of them involve her weight.

12431.content:
*Omph*

*Gulp*

*Slurp*

“So gooood!”

Shino was in a good mood; she had spent the entity of the drive back to Buttercombe academy chowing down on Yeng snack food, the sugary and salty snacks giving her peppy attitude an extra bit of buzz. But by the last few minutes as they rolled up the mountain path, she had begun to run out! Shino had had to (*gasp!*) ration them!

That was why she was in such a great mood, because now that she had planted her fat little feet back on Buttercombe soil…she could restock her supply seemingly endlessly! So with a barrel-like soda drink tucked under one arm, and a sack-sized empty bag of chips flowing in the wind behind her, Shino re-entered Buttercombe academy for her senior year.

Everything was as she remembered it, including the indoor golf karts. Without wasting a second, Shino waddled her rotund form over and dropped her luggage in the back of the kart, meanwhile placing her drink in the front. It took a lot of effort to get one of her stubby cone-like legs over the seat, but once her fat rump was settled in Shino was set.

Reaching the steering wheel proved to be problematic however. It seemed the pounds that Shino had put on over the holidays had found their way to her big bloated ball-like waist, meaning her stocky arms had trouble reaching around it as her belly pressed into the bottom of the steering wheel.

Eventually by leaning forward (meaning she could also slurp her drink whilst driving) she got her tubby fingers around her target and she was off.

Shino hadn’t always been fat; in fact she was the only member of her immediate family who even breached the “soft” description. It all started when her parents both started working for Yeng corp. One day they brought home some free samples for their daughter, and Shino was eager to try them. After trying them, all she could think of was more (Her parents didn’t curb her eating either. They couldn’t say no to their only child.); the additives had really made a serious impact on her. Whether it was because the snacks were untested ones that had somehow got out of the lab, or that Shino had been too young at the time to have such strong additives, or if she was just more vulnerable to additives in general…nobody knew.

But what was obvious was that the once skinny girl became bigger and bigger as the years passed. Her weight really took off once she and her family moved to the states, and Shino was enrolled in Buttercombe Academy. With no barriers to her relentless eating, she swelled like she was hooked up to the stuff. Shino was always the first girl in her class to hit the next level of SSS. Level 3’s automatic enrolment on having a BMI of 35 was paltry to a girl who had hit a BMI of 60 in her junior year. There was talk of putting her on tier 4, but Shino was oddly active for a girl of her roundness, so it had been postponed…for now.

Shino had also never been one to complain much, so any joint pain thanks to her incredible weight she kept quiet about. It also helped taking the school golf karts and scooters as often as possible. She was practically wheeled about from dawn till dusk. Like right now.

“Beep beep! Kawaii girl comin’ through!” Shino chuckled as she passed by some of her fellow seniors as they waddled towards the front desk to get their keycards. Shino’s chipper attitude made her pretty likeable among her classmates, with only the brattiest of bitches truly disliking her. That said, she only had a select small circle of tried and true friends; although their bad habits together was murder on each other’s waistlines.

Shino rolled up to the front desk and leaned further over the steering wheel. “Hiiii!” She greeted the overweight woman behind the counter.

“Hello Shino! Looking forward to another year?”

“Yup! It’ll be the bestest!” Shnio replied back with a big beaming grin across her chubby cheeks.

“Haha! Wonderful; your chipper spirit keeps me feeling young.” The woman chuckled heartily. “Here’s your keycard.”

The card was passed from one set of chubby sausage-fingers to the other, but before Shino could race off to her new dorm room, the older woman spoke again.

“Just letting you know, I was told that you need to see someone before you get too settled in.” She said quickly, catching Shino before she could put her foot on the peddle.

“Oh?” She replied; this was a bit unusual. "Who is it?

12432.content:
Shocked gasps and hushed whispers passed through the entrance to Buttercombe Academy; the freshmen had never seen anyone so clearly, obviously and blatantly…fat before.

Dull thuds echoed across the high-roofed ceiling as Peggy Wilson lumbered forwards to get her room keycard for the year. Her gigantic flabby form rippled and jiggled with every step, her poorly fitting clothes creaked and groaned with the burden of containing her, combined with the excess pressure each rocking step put on them.

Each step was punctuated with a deep wheezing breath that flew through her upturned pig-like nose, resulting in a constant stream of little hoggish snorts. As Peggy had grown bigger and fatter over the years, walking had become less and less desirable to her…but today she was driven by one desire, to get to the welcome feast and make as much use out of it as possible. She wanted to gorge, to glut herself, to eat until she couldn’t fit another morsel past her plump pink lips. That was worth any amount of walking to her.

After exchanging pleasantries with the tubby woman handing out the keycards, Peggy waddled over to the elevator (walking she could do, but stairs she had signed herself off of ever taking again). Despite the fact it was already filled with plenty of other students, Peggy squished her way in. She hadn’t eaten for fifteen minutes, and her mouth was watering at the thought of more food.

“Hey Peggy! Had a nice vacation?” The redhead on her right greeted, completely ignoring how Peggy’s belly was squeezed against her, or how her own looming tits were overlapping Peggy’s torso.

“It was already *rnnk*” Peggy grunted. “Food was totally meh though.”

The redhead covered her mouth to stifle her laugh. “Haha! I swear Peg, all you think about is food. We’re gonna have to roll you out at graduation.”

At that point, the elevator dinged to signal it had stopped at Peggy’s floor and ending their conversation.

As Peggy sloshed her fat form out into the corridor she thought about what the girl in the elevator had said; rolled out at graduation…that needed to be added to her goal list.

Thankfully for Peggy, her room was close to the elevator. So it wasn’t long before she was beeping her keycard across the sensor, and entering the threshold of her home away from home.

Peggy was used to the grandeur of Buttercombe décor now; so the high ceilings, luxurious kitchen facilities and reinforced to hell furniture were all part and parcel for her.

Choosing the bedroom closest to the kitchen, the blonde teen dropped off her wheeled suitcase and returned to the living room, now with welcome basket firmly in-hand.

But instead of instantly emptying the wicker basket, Peggy headed for the refrigerator. Opening it wide, she peered at the icy contents. Yeng corp was more than happy to advertise their wares throughout the school, including their new brand of ice-cream.

Grinning from ear-to-ear, Peggy snatched up two cartoons of the frozen treat and waddled over to the microwave. Stuffing both inside, she set the timer and waited. It was an old trick, warm up the ice-cream enough to make them drinkable, and then gulp them down in seconds rather than minutes.

While she waited, Peggy withdrew her phone from her purse and took a picture of what she was doing. Opening up one of her various social-media apps she hit up her most frequently visited group.

Aspiring Fat Chicks, or AFC as they called it, was a group Peggy had started with a former roommate in her freshman year. In it Buttercombe students shared, tips, tricks and inspiration…in getting fat. Everyone in there wanted to gain weight for one reason or another, but to prevent ostracism people were kept anonymous other than to the girl who told them about the group and added them.

Posting her recent photo, Peggy typed up a little comment about her activities. As she did, a little icon of a pig face popped up along with her tag “Sow Queen”.

Sow Queen: Guess who’s back and already microing some Ice Cream!

Another icon bearing a cow popped up as typing almost instantly.

Udder Bitch: Two cartons!? Dam girl! Show us the damage on the scales when you’re done!

A few more posts happened in moments, commenting praise and urging Peggy on. She was always surprised at how popular her group was; until coming to Buttercombe, Peggy had no idea how many girls wanted to live on the large side.

*Ding*

The noise of the microwave pulled Peggy out of her social-media haze. Putting her phone down, the gluttonous girl took one of the cartons in hand, opened the lid to see the contents swirling around in a sloshy goop.

Chucking her head back, Peggy wasted no time in pouring the contents down her throat. The ice-cream was tepid, and not at all cold to the touch. This allowed it to slide with ease; and within moments she was licking the tub to get at the last dollops of residue.

The second carton followed suit; this time Peggy was so eager, she didn’t notice little rivets of ice cream dribbling down the sides of her mouth.

She finished the creamy treat with a deep fatty belch, lapping as much of the spillage as possible with her tongue.

The obese blonde wasn’t done yet though; the welcome basket was still full. Without hesitation, Peggy crammed her hands into the basket, coming up with a honeybun in one hand and a cupcake in the other. She took alternate bites from both treats, cooing and moaning with the waves of tastes hitting her. Without even licking her fingers clean, Peggy dived back in again, and again, gorging herself until not even a crumb was left as evidence of her gluttony.

But even after finishing a whole welcome basket and two cartons of ice-cream, Peggy’s belly gurgled. She was a big girl who had grown used to big meals; she needed more to be truly sated.

While there was another welcome basket sitting all alone in the other bedroom, Peggy was not a total bitch. So that left Peggy with her favorite option, the welcome feast.

Exiting her room, Peggy got quite the stares from her younger peers. I mean, she was quite the sight. Her boulder-like stomach lurched out from under the hem of her shirt, pressing the top of her jeans and threatening the integrity of the top-most button. Her thunder-thighs and swaddling upper arms rolled over her lower legs and arms respectively, jiggling and shaking like pudding; but her face was really the runaway fattest part of her. Peggy’s second chin was a massive slab that rested on her chest, rolling whenever she chewed. Her blue eyes were piggishly squished behind fat bulbous cheeks; and when combined with her nose gave her a real porcine appearance.

Her “look” was something else as well. Peggy’s jeans were on their last legs, the seams frayed and small pockets of fat flesh oozing through the gaps; while her pink top seemed to ride higher and higher with each lumbering step. Her hairstyle was quite impressive however. With long blonde hair down to her wide (but oddly flat) ass, tied up in a pair of long pigtails; she still left her fringe free though. Pulling all her long hair back gave her a headache.

By the time Peggy had reached the grand hall, and the throng of obese teenagers had built up into quite the traffic jam, the bloated blonde was quite tired and sweaty. She mopped her brow, but continued diligently onwards.

Once again she ignored the sights she was so used to, and instead made a beeline for the smells. Peggy piled her tray high with anything she could get her hands on; she didn’t even have to worry about grabbing anything that was not fattening as hell. It was all so rich and delicious, especially today of all days. Peggy could guarantee herself that she would be waddling away with some extra inches on her figure after tonight.

Dropping her tray to a lonesome table, Peggy began her feast. Knife and fork were turned up at the speed offered from simply using her fat sausage-like fingers; or hell even her face (One Mississippi mud pie was treated like a face-pack as Peggy dived her face in to take a deep gulp).

“*Rnnk!* That’s the stuff…” Peggy snorted as she took a breather. As she took in a moment to lick her lips and gather any stray residue, Peggy noticed out of the corner of her eye someone approaching her…
12432.title: Peggy enters her sty

124323.content:
“Having a pig-out without me?” A familiar voice asked, pulling Peggy out of her feeding frenzy mindset.

The hefty teen turned to look at the figure that had approached her; holding a cafeteria tray in her hands was Bessie Bridges, Peggy’s fellow freshmen roommate three years ago and the other mind behind the AFC chat group.

“This seat taken? Or are you waiting for your ass to grow fat enough to fill it?” Bessie teased, nodding to the other side of the table.

“’S all yours *rnnk*” Peggy snorted, offering with a flabby arm; and with wide swaggering steps, Bessie waddled her own bodacious butt over and dropped it onto the chair.

As you would expect from someone who helped start a group called “Aspiring Fat Chicks”, Bessie was also a big girl and just as big an eater. Her body stored fat in a totally different way to her friends, swelling her caboose into colossal proportions and turning her tatas into titans. She wasn’t exactly thin everywhere else though; her stomach was plump enough to take the weight of her huge breasts off of her back, and her face was very well-padded. She had dressed up today as well; tying her long black hair into a plait and pulling out her best singlet top with the frills on it.

What was most striking about Bessie was her skin; the African-American teen had a strong case of vitiligo, meaning most of her skin was a milky-white color. With the exception of some dark-brown blotches, with the most prominent being a single large one over her left eye. This had caused the girl to be bullied when it first manifested itself; her skin’s unfortunate resemblance to a Holstein cow gave bullies no end of insults to throw.

But over the years she learned to own it, including her moniker “Udder Bitch” on the chat group being a nod to her odd skin pattern (as well as her literal udders that jutted from her chest). This attitude eventually evolved into a bit of a rebellious streak; Bessie wanted to do what she wanted when she wanted and nobody could say anything to put her down. And one thing young Bessie loved to do was eat.

And boy did she, Bessie and Peggy ended up rooming together in their freshmen year, not because of some special treatment for rich girls, but because the Buttercombe Vice Principal thought it best to put the only overweight freshmen together, hoping they would help each other out. This seemed to work a little too well; Bessie learned that Peggy was a driven young women aiming to get to the top of whatever she was doing. And Peggy learned that Bessie (who at the time was still a little insecure) was trying to make herself fat so nobody picked on her for her skin.

They made a pact; to help each other and anyone else in their shoes to put on as many pounds as they wanted. And Bessie was more than pleased with the results; no longer was she teased for her strange skin, but admired for her almost exaggeratedly womanly figure. She had the thinner girls envious and girls of a certain persuasion drooling over her, and she drank in the attention like rich nectar.

Back at the table, it was a good few minutes before either obese young woman spoke again. Both bloated bitches cramming every morsel of food they could into their mouths as they made good on the once-a-year feast.

“Uuurrrrfff…”

“*URRRRP*”

“Gawd I feel so full…”

“I think I’m gonna *rnnkk* pop…"

Several trips to the buffet and back later, and both Bessie and Peggy were feeling the pinch. They had let their belts out long ago, but their stomachs (despite the years of stretching) could only hold so much.

“I feel’s funny…*hic*” Bessie slurred, leaning back in the seat to give herself as much room as she could. As she winced in pain, her belly began to feel funny, and with a jolting sensation Bessie’s belly button shifted into an outtie.

Peggy burst into piggish grunts as she tried to laugh through the pain of her own tightly packed stomach.

“Hey! It’s not funny!” Bessie huffed.

“*RNK* Totally *RNK* is! *RNK*” Peggy answered, her words coming in ragged gasps. No sooner had she answered however, when a jolting sensation hit her to. Her belly was too large and round for her to see or even feel the furthest edge; but Bessie’s laughter told her everything.

“Hahaha! Oh my gawd you total pig!” She guffawed, pointing at Peggy’s now out-turned belly button that peeked out of her ill-fitting clothes.

The pair eventually had to stifle their laughter as they heard the screeching of the microphone located on the stage. Looked like the headmistress was about to give a speech.

But when the bloated besties looked, they saw it was not the hefty hippo headmistress that was standing behind the podium, but the Vice Principal.

“Where’s *rnk* Polluck?” Peggy whispered as Dr Hinamizawa tuned the machine.

“I heard she almost got too fat to walk over the Summer, no way she is getting up those stairs now.” Bessie muttered back in a hushed tone.

“*Rnk* Fat chance, nobody here’s getting that big before me here.” Peggy replied.

“Wanna make that a bet skinny?” Bessie teased.

“Skinny? I have forty *rnk* pounds on you!” Peggy hissed back.

“Hem hem!” Came a loud, very fake, cough from the stage. The teasing tubbos silenced themselves and waited as the doctor gave her speech.

“Welcome all to Buttercombe Academy for Growing girls!” The Asian woman announced. “I am Dr Fukuda Hinamizawa, Vice Principal. But you can call me Fukuda if you wish.” The thin woman tried to sound as friendly as possible, but there was no way she could match the matronly warmth of the Headmistress. “Unfortunately Headmistress Polluck is unable to make it today…”

“Told ya!” Bessie interjected as quietly as she could.

“But hopefully I can fill her shoes for the time being…” Dr Hinamizawa then proceeded to introduce all the new teachers, announce the departure of some others, and finally introduced the SSS system to all the newcomers in the audience.

That reminded Peggy, she needed to get herself onto the fourth tier of SSS as soon as possible. The less walking she did, the fewer calories she would burn and the fatter she would get.

Finally the wiry woman completed her speech, to lukewarm applause, and headed down from the stage. And once again, an entire room of teenage girls was left to their own devices.

“Sooooo what are we doing next?” Bessie asked, rolling her bulk to face Peggy.

The piggish girl had already decided…

Tabitha Shaw

Differing personalities aside though, Tabitha and Sapphire were the definition of ‘best friends’ and are rarely apart since the day they met at their welcome feast back in freshman year.
Needless to say their friendship largely revolves around food, an aspect that had seen the girls fly through uniform sizes at a vast rate of knots, not that the pair minded in the slightest.

Along with their self validating eating habits, the girls find their mothers a frequent topic of discussion, the respective matriarchs being little more than older reflections of their daughters personalities.

Tabitha very much takes after her mother, Samantha, with an exceptionally bottom heavy figure and shoulder length black hair framing her rather slender facial features.

Sapphire, on the other hand, whilst typically Buttercombe in her over-inflated hourglass figure with a sizable potbelly to match, contrasted her own mother considerably who, although curvy, is much, MUCH thinner. Despite their size differences though, Carla could not be more supportive of her daughter’s engorged life choices.

Bobbi Fawcett

124331.content:
Another day at Buttercombe Academy.

For four years, Tabitha and Sapphire had been living it up at one of the most prestigious preparatory schools that the world could offer. Afforded a life of luxury by their good grades and their parents connections, these two had drawn the lucky lot in life for sure. Add into the fact that, starting from Sophomore year, they'd gotten to room with their best friends every step of the way—each other!

They'd been made for each other; two peas in a chubby pod from day one. Ever since Sapphire walked up and asked Tabitha if anyone had been sitting at the lunch table, they'd been inseparable. From one another and, coincidentally, the lunch table. They sat at the same one, every day! Loading it with all kinds of fine cuisine that only a place like Buttercombe could offer.

Now that they were seniors, this was going to be the best year of their lives! This was going to be their last chance to go out with a real big bang!

There was just one problem that threatened to tear this teemingly tubby teenaged twosome apart—

Summer School.

Not for Tabitha, naturally. Her grades were at the top of her class, and she was a shoe-in for valedictorian (God willing!) by the time graduation rolled around. But Junior year must not have been kind to Sapphire, because she'd been enrolled in a special program at the insistence of the guidance counselor so that she could make up for a few bad marks on an already sort-of shoddy record.

That had put such a damper on how much time they could talk to each other over the Summer, and poor Tabitha was already so lonely! She barely had any friends outside of Buttercombe and her best friend was barely texting her! It was the hardest summer break of her life, but somehow the weighty wallflower pulled through.

After all, it wasn't like she had much of a choice. Sapphire was her best friend, and she was just happy to get to see her!

Or so she thought.

As cliched as it sounds, people change! And sometimes, people change very quickly. Like, over the Summer. Being forced to stay on campus for the holiday to make up her bad grades was embarrassing, sure, but that wasn't the problem.

The real issue was...
124331.title: Tabitha and Sapphire

Clara really is supportive of her daughter...REALLY supportive
1243311.content:
Well, the real issue was a little more complicated than simple academic embarrassment...

*****

Tabitha awkwardly lumbered through the familiar wood clad corridors of Buttercombe Academy, breathily dragging her suitcase behind her.
The raven haired girl had never been to this side of the school but one of Sapphire’s very few texts of the summer had been VERY specific that their new apartment was somewhere down here.

Truthfully, Tabitha just wanted to sit down, and she would have been able to had the girls been in the same rooms as before, but change seemed to be the tone of her life nowadays.
Almost as persistent as the quacking ripples coursing through her genetically enhanced rear shelf.

Her mother had spent most of the summer complaining at Tabitha for continuing to expand at a vast rate of knots but the senior teen was in no state to shift any of her excess poundage even if her current exertion felt like a marathon.
Seeing Sapphire could not come soon enough...

As the slow trudge brought the pear shaped senior closer to her destination, Tabitha began to notice a couple of things.
For one, the number of students passing her in the corridors was fewer and, by Tabitha’s inconsistent eye, getting seemingly larger.

‘Must be a no freshman wing’ thought the black haired girl.

Secondly, Tabitha couldn’t help but notice that the dorm doorways she was passing seemed to be larger than she remembered in her previous dorm.
Although odd it did cross the girl’s mind that a little extra width would not go unnoticed around her girthy hips.

With her mind wandering slightly, it dawned on Tabitha that the room she was looking for was on her left with the number 86 painted thickly on the dark dense wood.
“Oh thank god...” huffed Tabitha as she clumsily dug out her new keys and unlocked the door.

*****

Panting heavily as she awkwardly manoeuvred herself AND her suitcase into the dorm allowing the door to slowly swing past her hip and quietly close behind her.

“Saph?” called out Tabitha as she tentatively waddled into the open plan room, the familiar sound of chewing and food wrappers floating to the black haired girl from what she assumed was the living room.

“...oh mum, this stuff is so good!” cooed the familiar sound of Sapphire around a full mouth of god knows what.

“Oh good” purred the similarly recognisable sound of Clara, Sapphire’s mum, with a hint of digital distortion indicating the mother daughter duo were video calling “your gran was so disappointed she couldn’t see you this summer so she’s been baking like crazy for your care packages this semester”

“Yes!” cheered Sapphire, mouth still clearly full “let her know I love her very much”

“Will do darl” replied Carla “but I’m gonna head off sweetie because I believe Tabitha has just arrived and you two need to catch up”

“Tabs is here?” said Sapphire sounding confused.

Carla only snorted, likely nodding out of Tabitha’s view as Sapphire twigged to her arrival.
“Awesome! Well I’ll talk to you soon yeah?”

“Absolutely, love you sweetie”

“Love you mum!”

As the video call wound down, Tabitha felt a warmth swell inside her as she finally felt back with her room mate for the first time in months.

“Just a sec babe, I’m coming” groaned Sapphire, sounding as winded as Tabitha did from having walked to their new dorm.

“No rush, we’ve waited long enough” joked Tabitha “I can wait a little longer”

“Well don’t get too comfy there” grunted Sapphire “coz this bitch is coming in for a hug”

Tabitha definitely felt at home now and she couldn’t help but crack a smile as she waited, one which didn’t draw out too long as Sapphire appeared before her with quite a display.

*****

‘Holy smokes’ thought Tabitha as Sapphire appeared before her looking quite...exposed.
That said, the ombré dyed brunette looked...big too.

Sapphire had pretty much always been a big girl prone to skinny girl fashion choices, in no surprise greatly influenced by her ever supportive mother, but this was a whole new level as the brunette closed the gap between the two friends before wrapping her meaty arms around the smaller of the pair.

Always built like an hourglass Sapphire still maintained her outrageously ballooned curves but the billowy belly that preceded her and hung heavily over the band of tightly stretched leggings was a new addition.
Forming two distinctly flabby rolls, Sapphire’s faintly tanned skin was shaped in an orbital waistline that creased at her belly button and ran over her hips which bulged aggressively out of her leg wear with ripe stretch marks tracing each roll.
The jiggling low hanging roll also bounced against her own thick thighs and against Tabitha as the friends embraced.

“Oh it’s so good to see you Tabs!” shrieked Sapphire as she peeled away, adjusting an overtaxed sports bra strap causing a great quake to roll through her bulbous bosom.

“You too, I’ve missed you so much” relented Tabitha with a sigh as she looked over her friend bursting out of her already skimpy outfit.

“You...erm...you’ve...” stuttered Tabitha, completely lost for what to say despite her happiness to being reunited with Sapphire.

“Oh Tabs, you’re so sweet” cooed Sapphire as she almost teasingly grabbed a handful of her belly “I KNOW I’ve got fricking fat”

“Oh, you do?...”
Tabitha was shocked.
Sure the Monroe’s were practically horizontal in their life outlook but this seemed a step beyond even for Sapphire.

“Well duh” teased Sapphire with a beaming smile “it’s awesome!”

That really did floor Tabitha, she couldn’t be serious surely?

*****

“Anyway” continued Sapphire as she swallowed a thick greasy mouthful of pizza “my tutor basically told me that I was WAY past eligible for the top tier of that SSS program and I’ve not looked back since”

The conversation was surreal for Tabitha.
Her own experiences was that food and fat were not an intentional outcome for life and yet Sapphire was sat there, crushing the couch dare she add, whilst stuffing her face on MORE pizza.

“400lbs down and I NEVER have to go to classes” declared Sapphire proudly “get to sleep all day if I like, school work comes to me and the SSS menu is SOOO much better than the regular meal plan”

Tabitha did have to admit this was the nicest food she had ever had at Buttercombe which was impressive in itself but she could almost see how Sapphire could have gorged herself so much since they had last seen each other.

“And your mum?” probed Tabitha, picking at her own slice of pizza.

“Oh she loves it” answered Sapphire with a mouthful of cheese and bread “so body positive AND my grans have had something to do by baking so much for me”
The brunette was practically drooling as she spoke with her belly rolls pooled on her equally fattened thighs.

“You’re really into this aren’t you?” asked Tabitha, reaching a moment of realisation about her friend.

Sapphire simply nodded as she continued to eat, concentration solely on food for the time being as animalistic tendencies powered her ongoing binge.

1243312.content:
Tabitha grunted rather undignified as she dragged her wheeled suitcase through one of the many residential corridors of her beloved academy.
The most boring summer of her life had dragged on for months but finally it would be all worth it again just to see her bestest friend in the world.
Tabitha had a lot to share with Sapphire as well!
Samantha, Her mother, had been as crazy as ever; complaining about Tabitha’s increasing weight and girth, wanting to know what Tabitha’s plans were after graduating, asking Tabitha to walk the dog...
Madness at every turn!

All the same, Sapphire was near now and Tabitha couldn’t be happier.
As she maneuvered the last few bustling students, something more of a chore for such a hippy girl, Tabitha finally arrived at her new home for the year.
With an excited inhale, Tabitha pushed her shiny new key into the lock and turned it, pushing the solid wood panel with all her bulk to reveal the central living area of her shared apartment.

The first thing to greet Tabitha as she waddled through the door, a silent acknowledgment flashing through her mind that the door was wide enough to avoid scrapping her hips, was the smell of cookies dancing through the apartment.
Since when did Sapphire bake?
Never mind, the smell was amazing and brought saliva to Tabitha’s mouth. sapphire had OBVIOUSLY missed her too if she was baking cookies.
Depositing her case just inside the door, Tabitha became aware of laughing drifting through the apartment and the faint undertone of tv noise. The dark haired girl was going to be positively furious if Sapphire was watching Brooklyn 99 without her.

“Sapphire! I’ve missed you so...” started Tabitha before catching herself short, met with a rather unexpected scene.
Unsurprisingly, Sapphire was there on the sofa, wearing a wildly overstretched Guns’n’Roses T-shirt that barely covered her belly button along with a pair of equally taxed grey shorts.
Combined with the fact that she was systematically delivering handfuls of Doritos and pizza to her mouth, this had been a common sight, albeit usually featuring Tabitha close by.
The oddity came in the form of the other girl on the couch, also eating, with her legs intertwined with Sapphire’s.

“Ohmygod! Tabs!” shrieked Sapphire, clumsily dragging herself from the sofa and lumbering towards her friend, throwing her arms around her in a weighty hug “I’ve missed you so much!”

“I’ve missed you too Saph” cooed Tabitha as she returned the hug tightly, not wanting to let go of her best friend.

“Oh, you’ve got to tell me what’s been going on! We haven’t talked properly in forever!” replied Sapphire, leaning out of the hug slightly to take Tabitha in “I see your butt got bigger?”

Flattered that she’d noticed, Tabitha flushed slightly with a warm smile.

“Yeah, how that happened with my mum on my back all summer I don’t...”

“Sorry, do you want me to step out for a bit Saph?” called a voice from the sofa as the cushions groaned slightly, the tell tale sign of someone getting themselves up from the furniture.

“No no sweetie, you aren’t going anywhere” replied Sapphire, turning slightly to allow Tabitha to look at the third girl in the room.
This made Tabitha nervous, had she been replaced?
As often as the pair sat on the couch and pigged out, they never did it with their legs wrapped together...

“Over summer school I got talking to someone pretty special Tabs, this is Amber” explained Sapphire, indicating the stranger now just a few steps from the pair still half embraced.

Amber was the smallest girl of the three, not that that said much.
At 268lbs, Amber was a dominant belly girl with thighs for days, most of which was on display with a suffering vest top and, in contrast to Sapphire, only her panties to maintain her dignity.
Her panties were borderline unnecessary though as the hang of her belly did most of the work.
Aside from her middle heaviness, Amber’s delicate tan and bright blonde hair mixed with multi-coloured highlights were also rather distinct on the individual before them.

“I’m sooo glad to meet you” cooed Amber whilst offering her hand out, a saggy bingo wings becoming evident as she extended her arm “Sapphire has told me sooo much about you”

Tabitha tentatively took the hand and shook it, eyeing ‘Amber’ up as she did.
What was going on here?!

Glossing over any awkwardness, Sapphire explained herself.
“Yeah...me and Amber are kind of dating and we have been since near the start of summer”
Amber smiled warmly with an almost cute curtsy wobbling her body.
Tabitha on the other hand froze.
Since when did Sapphire like girls?
No wonder she’d not been texting her when she’d been with Amber all the time...
This apartment has three bedrooms...

“I hope this isn’t going to be awkward for you Tabitha, I’m actually really looking forward to getting to know you personally” interjected Amber, still smiling “plus we’re going to be room mates so it’ll be fun!”

There was the confirmation.
After months of sticking it out on her own, Tabitha had hoped to get things back on track by spending some quality time with Sapphire...
Now though, she felt even more separated from Sapphire than she had over the whole of summer.

“Come on Tabs, get comfy!” offered Sapphire with a tug of her arm “Amber’s baking cookies, they are amazing!”

Of course it was Amber who was baking cookies...

With an outward disliking to exercise and an equally voracious appetite, Naomi had been adamant to eat herself out of Coach Alberway's cross hairs which had been something of a pull factor for Bobbi.

Naomi could barely manage a smile as she contended with all that was in her mouth, only thinking of the numbers slowly rising on the gymnasium scale and the inevitable exemption from any strenuous activities for the year.

124332.title: Two fat makers make a lot of fat fatties

choices: Sheridan snaps out of it. Back to the story!
It's funny, because Bobbi has a similar fantasy with the shoe on the other foot!
1243323.content:
It may be a little early in their story to consider all the possibilities at play here. We’ve only just met Bobbi Fawcett and Sheridan Winters, after all. But perhaps, given the notion of what amounts to not much more than an idle fantasy, we can at least begin to appreciate this illuminating—if not alternative—look at what might have been.

Sheridan and Bobbi both shared a mutual fetish for fat. More specifically, they shared a specific fetish for making another person fat. They had both known about their preferences at this point, and it was only over years of working together that they were able to leave such a sizeable mark on Buttercombe Academy’s poor unsuspecting student body.

But Sherry had often fantasized about what would have happened if that fateful date had gone differently. Perhaps if Bobbi wasn’t yet aware of or, hadn’t developed her fetish for fattening other people up. If Bobbi was entirely at her disposal, Sheridan would have molded her roommate into the perfect fatty. Four years of nothing but pampering, coaxing, psychological and caloric warfare stuffed into such a short body—the possibilities were enough to make the nerdy feeder drool.

And sometimes, do a little bit more than drool.

It was a common recurring fantasy over the years for her to think about Big Bobbi (as she’d taken to calling her inside her head) and, maybe it was a way for her to keep the home fires lit. After all, their relationship was built on trust. She couldn’t very well trust Bobbi if Bobbi couldn’t trust her.

But What If…

***


“Oog… Sherry…” Bobbi burped sickly, “Think’mfull.”

The smaller girl, not skinny but certainly much smaller, ran a hand across the vast tank that was Bobbi Fawcett’s legendary gut. Having come fully unsheathed from underneath the tent-like skirt that barely contained it while in uniform, Bobbi had parked herself down on the couch and filled it full of everything her SSS perks could buy. Pizzas, subs, Chinese food, entire courses of meals. Anything and everything that Sherry had taught her how to eat.

“Aw, Bob, noooo…” Sherry said, a crazed twinkle in her eye as she watched her prized piggy struggle to keep consciousness, “You ordered all that food though. It’s gonna go to waste!”

“Can’t…” Bobbi panted, her breathing shallow, “I can’t do it…”

Four hundred pounds. Four hundred pounds of Bobbie Fawcett. Three years of rooming with a girl like Sherry would do that to you though. Her first year in and tiny ginger bombshell Bobbi Fawcett was porking out into extra large sizes. Sherry wasn’t sure if it was her, if it was the school, or if Bobbi was just bound to be big. Ever since that first date with her, Sherry knew that Bobbi had potential. And her first day in her senior year, she’d already far exceeded their going away feast from before the Summer…

“Come on, you’re being a baby.” Sherry cupped her girlfriend’s cheek lovingly, running a hand under her chins, “You don’t have to hold back to impress me—I like your body.”

Sherry loved Bobbi’s blobby body.

“Yeah.” Bobbi burped, struggling to get comfortable as she wrestled with the hundreds of pounds that made up her sandbag of a stomach, “Lucky me… you’ve got a thing… for fat girls…”

Sherry had never been shy about her preferences. They’d been dating for three years—it’d be a little hard to hide something like that. But what she had hidden was her hand in making Bobbi so big. It had taken some doing, but she’d managed to pork her pint-sized pixie into a complete and perpetual pig. With inches between freckles on her meaty arms and what looked to be a third chin coming in, Sherry thought Bobbi was beautiful. And lucky for her, she was far too weak willed to turn the tables on her.

“Maybe… you could…?”

Bobbi’s flickering fantasy of fattening up others—rather than herself being fattened—shimmered again. It wasn’t the first time that she’d weakly tried to suggested Sherry pick up her slack. Sherry was loathe to think she’d ever slip that far. But Bobbi was cute and, hey, she couldn’t blame her for trying.

“No way, Bob, you know I can’t handle all this heavy food.” Sherry’s own chubby shape was an indicator that this was a lie, but Bobbi hardly had the energy or the know-how to argue with her feeder, “Here, maybe if we get your shirt off…”

Bobbi was already too big for her uniform. She’d already sized up in anticipation of getting even fatter over the Summer (more out of resignation than any excitedness, that rested squarely with Sheridan) but she’d far undersized the damage that Sherry’s influence had done to her willpower and appetite. She was up a whole thirty pounds since the Summer was over—far over Sherry’s calculations on the Excel spreadsheet she kept specifically for her girlfriend. Among the others, of course. Sherry had lots of projects, but only one Big Bobbi.

Wrestling with the buttons, Sherry’s nimble fingers struggled to undo the white blouse portion of the uniform. Bobbi’s flesh diamonded through the open gaps, threatening to pop the buttons off any minute. But that would be too embarrassing (and too hot) to allow this feeding session to go where it needed to.

Unsheathing Bobbi’s belly fully, leaving her in just an unbuttoned skirt, socks, and a custom-ordered bra, Sherry took in the size and scope of her special project.

Biting her lip, she did her best to keep composure.

“Th-There now, doesn’t that feel…” Sherry shook Bobbi’s stuffed sack of a stomach slightly, wobbling her side-roll and sending a ripple throughout her entire body, “Soooo good?”

“Urp…” Bobbi’s trained brain interpreted the slight amount of extra room as well as Sherry could have hoped, “A little…”

“Good.” Sheridan smiled, “Good.”

As the ginger binger went back to stuffing herself, Sheridan clenched her thighs together tight. Wriggling in her seat on the couch, this was literally the best thing she could have ever hoped for. One more year with her girlfriend, full of fattening fun, where she could watch Bobbi get bigger and bigger, keeping stats of her and all her other special projects along the way.

Sure, it was a lot of work for one person. Her grades weren’t as good as she’d like them to be.

But this was so, so worth it.
