1322113.content:
“Wouldn’t taking out a part time job just be...more stress?” Hunter asked, her voice sounding whinier than she intended.

         “Oh, not at all.” Helen said in a quiet, reassuring voice.She stood up, and waddled behind Hunter, putting a warm, comforting and very *soft* arm on Hunter’s shoulder.

         “Hunter, how long have I known you?”

         “You’ve always known me.” Hunter answered. It wasn’t strictly true, but Hunter couldn’t remember those early months. And Helen didn’t care to correct her. She liked the power that came with being an eternal object in the mind of a child.

         “You are very smart, Hunter. You have always been smart. I remember when you were small enough that you could sit on my knee, and I’d read you your favorite picture book, and you could correct me when I got the dinosaurs names wrong.”

         Hunter groaned at that particular trip down memory lane.

         “My point is, there is no conflict between my letter of recommendation, and you deserving to be here.” She began to switch from cozy, maternal figure to a more strict, disciplined, professional tone of voice. Playing up that she was the kind of intellectual Hunter could see herself as, and emulate. “I didn’t give you a letter of recommendation simply because you were Piper’s sister. I wouldn’t give my word that Parker would be a good student. Or Piper. Only you, Hunter Black, meet my exacting standards of a ‘promising student’.”

         “You really think I’m that bright?” Hunter asked, shifting from being frustrated that her uniqueness wasn’t given it’s due, to balking at the unfamiliar feeling of being singled out for praise like this.

         “Of course you are!” Dr. Schwartz said enthusiastically. “You’re already smarter than the help they’ve given me with this job. Apparently they’ll let anyone practice medicine without a license these days.” Helen enjoyed an easy chuckle at that one. Hunter just looked uncomfortable. Right, it was kind of an inside joke. Hunter wasn’t there for that Summer in Nicaragua. McCarthy would have laughed. Helen held back a sigh in front of Hunter. She missed Evie.

         “I promise, helping me out after hours will help calm your nerves. You are like your sisters in one important way. If you’re left with nothing to do, you make trouble. You just have the good sense to make anxious trouble, rather then the criminal kind.” She quipped.

         “Maybe. I’ll have to think about it.” Hunter said, retreating back to the turmoil of her own thoughts.

         “I think that’s for the best.” Dr. Schwartz said, holding the office door open for her. “And I’ll support you in whatever decision you come to.” She added with a smile. It was easy to, when she was certain that Hunter would come to the decision she wanted, once she made up her mind up for her.

         “T-Thank you, Dr. Schwartz.” Hunter said, as she gathered up her bookbag.

         “Hunter, we’re practically Family~. Call me Helen.”

         “...Yes, Helen.”

***

         Dr. Schwartz closed the door behind her, and checked her records. What kind of young woman was Hunter Black going to grow into?

Despite the familiarity that Helen held for the younger girl, it wouldn't have been all that difficult for the good doctor to twist her into something that far better filled the holes she'd come to know since taking her assignment at the Academy.

Hunter's mind was young and sharp, she reminded her so much of Evie—her old partner in Daven's Port. The poor girl would no longer be afraid; she could take command. She would even excel in a place like Buttercombe, where the girls were softer in willpower than they were in the bellies. If Helen could teach her how to manipulate and poke and prod, instruct her on how to push all the right buttons, Hunter would go so very, very far during her academic career. Ach, but Hunter was such a sweet girl. So quiet. It would be a shame to see that side of her give way to the cruelty that Dr. McCarthy wore on her sleeve back then...

Of course, there was always the more predictable route—she was Piper's sister after all. There was a simple, yet not unsatisfactory pleasure to be found in helping Hunter find another way to fit in. With Helen's "help", she'd have Hunter molded into a real Buttercombe girl in no time. Fat and soft, the fattest and softest if Helen had her say, with not a care in the world except for her next meal. Hunter would be placed on SSS in no time, filling doorways and rolling around on a motorized scooter... She'd certainly have more friends that way, but to see her beautiful mind go to waste, Helen wasn't quite willing to abide.

The unpleasant truth was, despite her eagerness, Helen was of two minds. For now, Hunter would have to continue on her own.

Hopefully, the solidification of her character led the chesty freshman back through her doors...

***


Dr. Schwartz's busy schedule of listening to whining students and teacher temper tantrums had three periods of relief.

One was in the morning, around eleven 'o' clock. The other at one, for lunch. And the last was right before classes concluded at four. Helen argued that all of the teachers had a similar schedule, why shouldn't she? And while any other woman in this academy—this monument to decadence and overindulgence—would no doubt spent that time in service of her appetite, Helen used it as a way to reconnect and center herself. Sometimes through quiet tea times, sometimes through meditation, and others (though infrequently) she used it to connect with old friends.

Dr. Evie McCarthy was her old colleague back at the Yeng Research & Development center back in Daven's Port. Whereas Helen had been promoted and reassigned to the Testing Area, Evie had been promoted to Head of the Department. In a few words, she was one of the great minds behind the wonderful gadgets and gizmos that helped keep their pool of test subjects in varying stages of comfort depending on their needs. In theory.

And one of the main reasons that Dr. McCarthy had become so enamored with the idea of meshing her love for biochemistry and modern household appliances was... well...

"Increase vibration seventeen percent, rotary motions go counterclockwise." a thick, slow voice commanded, "Concentrate power in the lower abdominal region. I have a stomach ache."

Helen had always known of Dr. McCarthy's buried desires to indulge. For years she had kept them so restrained, made it so impossible for herself to let herself enjoy her lust for decadence, that those desires manifested themselves as an outward hostility towards the obese. And it had become clear that, since her promotion, Dr. McCarthy had finally learned to forgive herself for the immortal sin of wanting to be fat.

She was a large woman, as evidenced by the image on Helen's desktop. Evie had the webcam in her lab mounted on the wall so that her desk would be free for various robotics, hydraulic parts... snacks. Helen was sure that it was so Evie could ensure everyone got to see just how obscenely fat she was getting. Her mobility was a non-issue with Yeng's breakthrough in limited hovering technology. McCarthy had pioneered it for the sole purpose of never needing to walk again, and as evidenced by how low her seat hung to the ground, she intended on getting the most out of it.

Evie's stomach took the brunt of her obesity. Hanging low, dimpled with cellulite and split into three distinct tiers of tonnage, its only support was the massage heads that had been installed at her behest. Her arms sat uselessly on the upper puffs of her belly blubber which mushroomed over the armrests built into the chair. How she'd gotten a lab coat on, much less that tarp of a sweater, was anyone's guess. Perhaps Yeng had made headway in the spray-on clothing department sooner than expected? Helen would have to inquire further.

"Evie?" Helen clicked her tongue, "Are you paying attention to me?"

"Mmm..." Dr. McCarthy's beady brown eyes closed as her head leaned back into her neck rolls, moaning as the massage heads did their work

"Don't make me." Helen laughed

"I'm sorry, Dr. Schwartz, I'm just..." Evie sighed heavily, "Not in the mood."

The pudgy blue-haired woman rolled her eyes. Of course. She'd never get something for nothing, not with this greedy hog.

"Of course you're not in the mood." Helen said in a low sort of voice, playing at Dr. McCarthy's fetish, "All you want to do is eat—isn't that right?"

"Mmm..."

"All that blubber must be going between your ears. You're absolutely running out of room everywhere else. Look at you! You're so..."

"Saaaay iiit..."

"You're so fat."

Dr. Schwartz giggled as she recognized the tell-tale signs of a micro-orgasm. Evie had become very well acquainted with her inner glutton, that was for sure. Such a great mind, buried beneath hundreds and hundreds of pounds of pampered, piggish pudge. Just like the women that she used to take such pleasure in torturing not all that long ago...

"Mm... it sounds so different, coming from you." McCarthy said in a half-facetious flirtation with her old friend

"Only because you miss me." Helen returned the favor, "Now, Evie... how are you?"

The two of them almost never got to talk anymore. Every time they spoke, it was usually work related. Dr. Hinamizawa kept them both busy with their respective projects, so any personal time was usually spent with Helen in her cabin or with Evie in her lab. With how different their lives had become, and in not such a long stretch of time, it was important that they managed to keep each other updated as much as possible.

"I'm well." McCarthy answered simply, "I'll be a lot better once I finish this project."

"I'm working on something of a project myself." Dr. Schwartz thought back to young Hunter Black...

"I'll bet my project is more fun." Dr. McCarthy's fat cheeks bunched up in a smile

"For you, I'm sure it is." Helen laughed, "Incidentally..."
13221133.title: Phone a Freakishly Fat Friend

choices: Follow Evie's advice, let nature and Yeng additives take their course
Introduce Hunter to the joy of science!
No, first instincts are best; wait and observe her for now
132211331.content:
"Incidentally, I'd like your advice with my… assistant. Do you remember Piper Black?”

“Oh, how could I forget?” The behemoth on screen sighed happily at the memory. “We did some fine work on her. She was close to immobility when she escaped your clutches, wasn't she?”

“No, you are mistaken. I fully endorsed her promotion. And we still keep in touch to this day, just so you know.”

“Meh, whatever. Cook, prepare Cocktail No. 5. And, uh, what else would it be for now? Let me think.” Dr. McCarthy's hands drummed on her immense gut, still packed tight with previous feast.

Helen saw she had to hurry. As soon as Evie started feeding, she wouldn't care to talk anymore. And these days, periods of her not eating were getting shorter and shorter. “And it was Piper who told me her little sister was looking for a good school. So I pulled some strings and little Hunter ended at Buttercombe. But now I am not sure which route to take with her.”

“What?” The landwhale was so puzzled she even paused in ordering food. “How do you mean it?”

“Well, I'd love to see her go down the same path as Piper, to see her curves blow up, to grow a belly to support that chest of hers and a behind to balance it out…”

“Mmm.”

“I mean, Hunter could almost be Piper's twin, they're so alike… Except she's also got a brilliant mind and I don't want to lose that. She'd make a perfect assistant, she seems so… ready to follow in our footsteps. Except I'd so much want to see her waddle around the school, struggle with every step. Except…”

“Except I think you're making it needlessly complicated,” Evie chortled, causing a minor fatquake. “Why not have your cake and eat it too? Just look at me, big and bright. Who says your Hunter can't be both? Just introduce her to all the joys that Yeng can provide and let nature take its course.”

“Huh, maybe…”

“And stop bothering me now, I have a third lunch to take care of. Or is it first supper? Anyway, see you later.”

“Bye.” Dr. Schwartz folded up her hands on her belly in contemplation. Evie didn't help her much. Hunter Black was a gem that comes along once a generation. What should she do not to spoil it?
132211331.title: Fat Friend and Fer Feeding Frenzy

choices: Jocelyn—Bad Nurse
Dana—Calories Delivery Head
More Faculty Staff...
1323.content:
Jocelyn Rose
34, Black, 5'7, 382lbs
Nurse

With a round jovial figure, Jocelyn is a well-beloved member of the Buttercombe faculty. To the thinner students she provides a motherly figure, and to the larger ones she is a confidant for their weighty woes. With her characteristic "mom bob" this African-American woman is the surrogate mother some girls need.

But Jocelyn is not as sweet as she seems. She takes orders directly from her Yeng higher-ups, and was hired precisely because she seemed trustworthy-looking to the students (she was fat long before working at the Academy). Every tidbit of information about how the students Yeng-filled lifestyles were going is fed back through Jocelyn to her superiors. She serves the Yeng company to a fault, and will do anything necessary to aid them.

Jocelyn is mostly big in the belly, with a round figure that only swells from the center as she grows larger.



Dana Young
35, Brunette, 5'4, 321lbs
Head of the Academy Delivery Service

Once the lone delivery girl, running back and forth across the grounds with parcel after parcel, Dana is now head of the many girls following in her footsteps. She tried to keep up the job as long as possible, but on-site lunching took a toll on her figure, and eventually Dana had to throw in the towel when her deliveries stopped being so punctual. But her knowledge of the school grounds was still invaluable, so instead she got promoted.

However, going from running the length of a football pitch several times over a day, to sitting on her chubby backside all day caused Dana to balloon faster than ever. Her backside swelling over multiple office chairs as she oversaw her "little bees" movements. The be-freckled woman tried to diet several times, but never found the time to make them stick. So instead more and more calories stuck to her, as she continues to snack away.

Dana leans towards bottom-heavy, but still has plenty of fat stored elsewhere. From the tips of her toes to the tops of her cheeks, she is certifiably fat.
1323.title: Further Faculty Members

choices: Shiro Fukiyama, fellow nurse
Dr. Helen Schwartz, school counselor
Dr Fukuda Hinamizawa, vice principal
13231.content:
Relaxing in her reinforced chair, her plush rump providing extra comfort, Jocelyn reveled in the pre-term quiet. It was the first day of a new year, and unless someone seriously injured themselves, she basically had the morning off. But rather than join her fellow staff in the main dining hall for the welcome feast, the hefty nurse sequestered herself in her office, preferring the peace and quiet.

Jocelyn wiggled in her chair, finding a slightly more comfortable position as her plump sausage fingers retrieved a candy bar from her desk-top and brought it up to her lips. She had her sister send them via post; Jocelyn tried to avoid eating local, she knew that the Yeng stuff was terrifyingly addictive; after all she not only worked for Yeng but got to see its effects first hand.

She had seen lithe freshmen slink through her door at the beginning of the year, only to struggle with the frame before even reaching their senior one. Not that she really cared all that much; if Yeng wanted to create a school full of obese students that was its call; so long as Jocelyn got paid she didn’t mind. She wasn’t a cruel person mind; just ambivalent to their weight-based problems.

Being an especially large woman herself, Jocelyn had struggled with her excess girth as a child, but the marvels of modern medicine and technology that these kids had access to made being fat much less of a chore. They could take being a bit plump.

That was why Jocelyn was not all that keen on getting too much bigger. She knew Yeng well enough that if she got large enough, it wouldn’t just put her job at risk, but it might also make her a perfect Yeng test-subject. The absolutely colossal behemoths she had to deal with, once they got big enough they were pretty much sequestered in their rooms all day, their limited mobility and extreme size putting Yeng tech to the test. Jocelyn was not a fan of ending up like that herself.

Nevertheless, Jocelyn was a big girl, and big girls gotta eat.

But as the second bar of chocolate passed her dark brown lips, her pager began to buzz, sending ripples across her supple swollen middle. Grunting like a sow in heat, the porcine woman pressed her chubby arm between the limited space between her flabby flank and the arm of her chair, retrieving the long-suffering pager.

Flipping it to the screen, she saw a message from…
13231.title: Joining Jocelyn

choices: Three freshmen, skinny as rails
Three Sophomores, who had so far evaded the fattening Buttercombe cuisine
A trio of Juniors, just transferred in and not used to Buttercombe's ways
132312.content:
Dr Schwartz? What did she want with her? The message was very blunt, just a summons, no indication of why. Jocelyn rolled her eyes before cleaning the last residue of chocolate from her fingers, and began the arduous task of rising to her feet. Being so big around the belly, it was very easy for Jocelyn to get herself weighed down into her seat, with her big sloshing belly anchoring her.

After several minutes of shuffling her near four-hundred pound body on her seat, the hippo-shaped woman reached the lip of her chair and managed to roll her body upwards. Instantly she felt her girth taxing her limbs, years of obesity had taken its toll on her fattened limbs and they almost audibly groaned under the pressure.

“Pheeeew.” Jocelyn wheezed, “Man I gotta drop some weight…”

While she may have audibly wished to lose some pounds, Jocelyn’s habits were not helping her. As she waddled out of her office, the bowling ball woman rested her round rump on one of the school mobility scooters and was off.

She should have walked, but that required effort that Jocelyn didn’t posses right now. So instead she rolled in style, past the new and returning students herding their way towards the welcome meal.

“God they get fatter every year…” Jocelyn mentally took note, as she watched a pair of four hundred pound-plus seniors amble past. Good thing one was top-heavy and the other was bottom-heavy, or their collective girth would have blocked the hallway.

Once she reached the outer reaches of the school grounds, the way became clearer for Jocelyn’s kart. As she approached the school counsellors office (now conveniently relocated onto the ground floor), she slowed her approach and parked her ride.

Sweat coated her brow as the big bowl of human pudding lifted one leg over the seat and waddled towards the door.

*knock knock*

“Come!” A voice inside replied. Pushing the door open, with both hand and belly, Jocelyn entered the office.

Dr Schwartz’s office was an odd room; filled with all sorts of nick-nacks and souvenirs she had collected over the years; mostly from South and Central America. But there were some from her home country of Germany as well. It certainly made for an odd blend.

And to aid the odd décor was the good doctor herself. Helen Schwartz had cropped bright blue hair, a vibrancy that didn’t match the duller colors of the office at all, like the dull yellow wallpaper.

“Hello herr Rose.” The doctor greeted as Jocelyn made herself known.

“Good morning Helen, you wanted to see me?”

“Yes yes. I have a little problem that I think you would be perfect to help me with.” Dr Schwartz began to rummage around in a drawer as Jocelyn watched, before producing a vial. “Zis is a compound that Yeng went to great lengths to obtain. It is an incredibly strong appetite enhancer and metabolism suppressant that was tested some years ago, and eventually perfected.”

“Is this the perfected version?” Jocelyn asked.

“No!” Helen replied with a broad grin. “The version put on the market was much weaker; so as you can imagine it took some time to acquire the beta sample.”

Jocelyn frowned, why would Yeng try to obtain something that had been outlawed before? “There is a but coming isn’t there…?” She replied.

“How astute!” Helen cooed. “Ze original had a… copious list of side-effects. Side-effects we have tried to mitigate; we think we have it down to these…” Once again Helen went into her drawer, this time producing three smaller vials, each with differing labels. “Here we have three different versions of the enhancer, we could not remove all the side effects at once; and we want to test them in a less clinical, more natural environment.”

“You want me to give them to some girls here.” Jocelyn bluntly stated.

“What a fantastic idea!” Helen answered with a grin and a wink. “Since you offered, yes I will take you up on that.” Placing the vials on the desk in front of her, Helen then began to give Jocelyn her instructions. “We only have enough here for one subject each; so you will need to find three students to test them on. And I mean three, don’t go giving them all to one, we need to know exactly what side effects happen with each vial. I chose you for zis, as the students seem to open up more to you; and would be less likely to hide the side-effects from you than say… me.”

Jocelyn then leaned forward to take her three tasks.

“Other than that, you can do as you wish. I trust you find the perfect test subjects, and to monitor them as you see fit. Just use your judgement and request physicals as often as you think they are required. Periodically I will ask you to present your findings to me, which will be passed on to the Yeng R&D, good luck herr Rose.”

---

Back in her office, Jocelyn set herself to work. She had learned not to ask too many questions when it comes to Yeng, so as to exactly what side-effects she was supposed to be looking for, she didn’t know.

In front of her, Jocelyn had her issue Y-pad out and was scrolling through the list of students. Owing to the nature of the task, she had filtered the search to only include the thinner girls; those weighing one hundred and fifty pounds or less. If she was supposed to be putting these girls on a crash-course with appetite stimulants, going from thin to fat would look better on the results. Plus the little shrimps could do with some meat on their bones anyway.

Scanning through the list, Jocelyn’s eyes rested on…
132312.title: Paging Dr Schwartz

choices: Next morning, all three girls wake up feeling rather odd.
The girls have strange dreams...
Next morning. The girls take note of just how big their classmates are.
1323123.content:
As her brown eyes scanned across the list, something jumped up into Jocelyn’s vision.

Junior
Junior
Junior

The list was almost completely comprised of freshmen and sophomores, how did a trio of juniors stay so slim? Her curiosity whetted, the heavyweight nurse clicked on each name in turn and the mystery revealed itself.

All three were transfer students, unfamiliar with Buttercombe’s infamous ways and as a result, un-fattened.

The list was purely word-based, so no pictures of these three, just information.

First on the list was Futaba Nakamura, a transfer all the way from Japan. She was the tallest of the three, and as such had a slightly higher weight.

Next up was Hazel Reed, hailing from the other side of the states she was a lot closer to home.

And lastly was Tsuru Tanaka, also from Japan. Jocelyn rolled her eyes; it seemed with Yeng’s presence at this school, every other parent from East Asia wanted to send their kids here now. They must be doing some serious advertising at home…

“You will do…” Jocelyn smiled as she looked at the girls profiles. As transfer students, she could easily convince them that the stuff she had to inject them with was resistance to a local strain of flu or something. She also convinced herself it would help the skinny things acclimate themselves; don’t wanna stand out from the crowd now do we?

With her targets settled, Jocelyn just had to make a quick call.

---


Futaba was making her way to the grand hall; she had heard that there was some kind of announcement made at the beginning of the year, plus free food. She wasn’t a scrounger, but free was free.

As she turned a corner, flicking her mane of black “rocker chick” hair out of her eye, an announcement suddenly boomed across the intercom.

“Will Hazel Reed, Tsuru Tanaka and Futaba Nakamura please make your way to the nurse’s office on the ground floor east of the main hall please!”

"うんこ!" Futaba cursed under her breath. She had just got here! How was she already in trouble!? Was there something about no pictures? Had taking those selfies at the front of the building broken some hidden rule? Whatever it was, it seemed several other girls were in for it as well.

The office was just a little beyond where Futaba was walking anyway, so she continued on her set path. As she passed the hall, the rocker-girl peeked inside. Everyone seemed to be having a great time, and here she was missing out.

On approaching the nurses office, Futaba spied a pair of figures. One was another Japanese girl, like her, who was already dressed in her Buttercombe uniform. Her hair was straight and immaculate, and her makeup was minimal.

The other girl was Caucasian and kinda short, wearing a generic slightly baggy t-shirt and a long skirt. She had glasses, slightly curled chestnut-brown hair and was looking around nervously.

“You got called out as well?” Futaba asked as she approached. “Not sure what I did this time… don’t really wanna get sent back home after coming all this way.”

The talk of being punished seemed to set the smaller girl off and her eyes widened. “Are… are we in trouble!?” She stammered.

“Of course not.” Snapped the scholarly girl. “They don’t send you to the nurse if you are in trouble.”

“Then what do you think it is?” Futaba asked. But before there was an answer, the door clicked and unlocked.

“Come in come in!” Jocelyn beamed, her wide figure engulfing the doorframe, “Don’t be shy!” The wide woman waddled back to her desk, beckoning the three to follow.

A loud oof passed Jocelyn’s lips as she sat back in her chair. As she gazed across at her three subjects, she saw the fear in Hazel’s eyes.

“Don’t worry dear, you’re not in any trouble.” This seemed to calm her down a little. “You just need a quick jab.” And now she was panicking again.

“Jab?” Futaba queried.

“Yes” Jocelyn replied, “There is a local… tick problem going around. And I wanted to give you girls an immune-system booster, as you are all transfers from out-of-state you would be most vulnerable to their bites.”

This seemed to produce nods of understanding, apart from the haughty-looking one, she seemed to just glare.

“Right, well if you would all give me your left arm, I can start with the jabs.” Jocelyn continued, still under the skeptical gaze of the haughty girl.

Futaba was first up; and since Jocelyn didn’t know of any difference between the vials contents, just the label, she grabbed the first one to hand (labelled B) and decanted it into a syringe. A quick swab and one very sharp needle later, and Futaba was done.

Next up was Tsuru who still looked doubtful. She got vial A.

And lastly (with a bit of prodding from the other two girls) Hazel was up, and got C injected into her arm.

“Now before you go…” Jocelyn interrupted as some of the girls turned to leave. “To make sure that you have suffered no adverse reactions to the injections, I will ask you to return to me for health checks within the next two weeks.”

“Ugh, really?” Futaba huffed, snorting so hard her long fringe flew upwards again.

“But as an apology, we will offer all three of you one of our limited three-person dorm rooms. It comes with a lot more space and slightly better facilities than a usual one…”

---


“Wa-hoo! Look at this place!” Futaba yelled as she span around her new home away from home.

“It certainly is roomy.” Tsuru commented.

“Come on! Gather round, gonna take a selfie here!” The rocker-chick grinned as she beckoned the other two over.

*click*

Looking at the picture Futaba noted how Hazel and Tsuru were actually smiling in the pictures. Probably the first time she had seen either of them smile.

“Ooo!” The punky girl noted as her eyes caught the site of the welcome basket. Running over, Futaba practically dived into it with glee.

“Do you mind not acting quite so piggishly?” Tsuru commented snottily as she dragged her suitcase over to one of the bedrooms.

“Oh lighten up Tsuru! I didn’t eat anything for dinner!” Futaba yelled over her shoulder. “Hmmm Tsuru, bit of a long name. Can I call you Tsu?”

“No. It’s Tsuru.” The studious girl snapped, shutting the door behind her.

“Hmmmph, you’re no fun.” The hungry girl huffed, before turning to the remaining member of the group. “Hey Hazel, wanna have a bun? It’s really good!”

“I… I think I am just going to go to bed…” Hazel mumbled, dragging her suitcase away as she blushed shyly.

Futaba huffed again. “Ugh, what downers, hope the rest of this place is more lively…”
1323123.title: The Three Little Guinea-Pigs

choices: Two weeks later, and the transfer girls have to report back to Jocelyn
The girls appetites only grow stronger
Amy introduces the group to her circle of friends
13231233.content:
The next morning passed without incident. All three transfer students managed to wake in time for breakfast, got dressed in their new uniforms and headed to their first class of the day. Everything had been such a blur on their first day that they hadn’t had time to take much stock of their surroundings, especially with the trip to the nurse’s office; they hadn’t even seen much of their fellow students… until now.

When the trio arrived at their first English class (early as well), they had been baffled by the sheer size of the desks. They were much wider than any they had encountered before, and set with a concave center. All was made clear when the first girls arrived.

The three girls hadn’t arrived early, it was everyone else who was late, and for good reason. The first girl who entered the classroom easily looked like she was clear of the three hundred pound mark, with a great wobbling gut that swung across her knees.

None of the transfer students had time to drink the sight in when they were then greeted to a second morbidly obese student waddling her way in, her gigantic hips slightly catching on the doorframe. Then a third, a fourth, a fifth… there was not a single girl in their class below two hundred and fifty pounds! And there were quite a few that were reaching well beyond that threshold.

While the sight of the gigantic nurse should have prepared them for such an onslaught of blubber, they had collectively shrugged the rotund Jocelyn off as just matronly and her bulbous figure borne of a lifetime of sitting in her office chair.

Thankfully their teacher was of a much more slim build; a rather busty blonde woman who smiled a lot.

“Hello girls! I’m Ms Morrison! And I will be your English teacher this year!” She positively squeaked. “Now, this is my first year teaching at your wonderful school, so if you know any tips tricks or shortcuts around here, just give me a little whisper after class, k? It seems we also have some transfer students as well, so don’t forget to share your tips with Hazel, Tsu…Tsuro… oh no another difficult one… Footaba…?”

Tsuru scoffed; of course the teacher was still thin, she was new. Something wasn’t right around here. While Futaba and Hazel didn’t seem to be questioning just why the class had a 10/1 ratio on obese pupils, Tsuru was, and she was going to get to the bottom of this.

---


“I am telling you, something is up with this place.” Tsuru hissed between bites of lasagne.

“No shit.” Futaba replied, “I deliberately asked for no mayo in my burger and they loaded t with the stuff!”

Tsuru eye-rolled at her.

“What? I’m hungry!” The rocker chick replied.

“That’s it! Everything here is about food!” Tsuru pointed out, “The portions, the size of the desks, the size of the students!”

“Are… are they going to brainwash us?” Hazel mumbled, “because I saw a horror film… it had a school full of brainwashed kids and and and…” The brown-haired girl could barely get the words out before she panicked and started munching on a poptart.

“Who let you watch a horror film…” Futaba thought to herself. But as she picked up her soda to take a sip, there was a rumble, and her drinks surface rippled like a tremor hit.

But it was no geological phenomenon, as a big shadow loomed over the group.

“Hi!” Came a friendly voice; “I’m Amy! We were in English together!”

The transfer students remembered Amy, they certainly remembered Amy. She was the one who literally didn’t stop snacking through class; granted most girls were eating throughout a lot of it, but Amy was the only one that figured out a way to keep eating even when she had to take notes using both hands. She was also one of the largest girls in their class.

Amy was very “apple-shaped” with a pair of colossal breasts, perkily pressed upwards by a big round ball of a stomach, itself perched upon some thunderously large thighs. Her black hair was cut into a pudding-basin fringe, while the rest flowed over her shoulders (dyed a rich purple) and ended in a straight cut.

“Mind if I sit? Ms Morrison said you were new; I’ve been here a while and thought I might help you out?” Amy beamed nervously at them.

“We would love for you to sit with us.” Futaba offered, patting the empty section of the bench next to her.

“Thanks!” Amy replied as she gingerly lowered her bulk, the frame holding despite her immense bulk.

“So this is Hazel…” The punky girl introduced, “This is Tsu…” Futaba stated, grinning wickedly at the long-haired girl.

“IT'S TSURU!”

“And I’m Futaba!” She finished, ignoring the fuming girl on the other side of the table.

“Nice to meet you… does this mean we’re friends now?” Amy asked, cocking her double-chinned head slightly.

“Oooo! Then it’s selfie time!” Futaba cheered, looping an arm around Amy’s plush shoulders and drawing her close, spending a few moments first fixing her hair, and then taking several snapshots. “No no no… yes! Perfect! And uploaded, let’s see how many likes my new bestie can get.”

“Well thanks for leaving us in the dust…” Tsuru huffed.

“Sorry! Amy's more my style...” Futaba teased, as a gurgle cut her off, her stomach was growling like mad. “Ugh, Amy you know what food’s good around here? I’m starving here.”

“I’m really hungry as well…” Hazel added, nodding towards her now-spotless plate.

“As am I.” Tsuru remarked.

Amy smiled a big cheesy grin, “Great! Food is kinda speciality of mine!” She chuckled, patting her big dome of a belly, causing ripples to spread out like the surface of a pond. The three transfer students stared at the mass of fat jiggle, just what was going on here…
13231233.title: Introduced to the fatter side of life

choices: Futaba starts suffering side-effects
Tsuru starts suffering side-effects
Hazel starts suffering side-effects
132312331.content:
Jocelyn was once again relaxing in her office; she had birdsong playing in the background from her phone, and she would pop the occasional imported bonbon into her mouth. Complete bliss!

*knock knock*

“Shit!” The obese woman cried out, her relaxation thoroughly interrupted. She had totally forgot that the girls who were unknowingly taking part in Dr Schwartz’s little project were coming in for their checkup today!

“One moment sweeties!” Jocelyn called out as she flung the bag of candy unceremoniously into her draw, straightened her uniform and wiped away a chocolate smear from her lips. “There we go… the door is unlocked!”

Jocelyn smiled as she watched the three subjects walk in. She had spent long enough at this strange academy to have an eye for how and where people were getting fat. She instantly spotted that tummy poking out from under Hazel’s blazer, or how Futaba’s pants skirt was lifting upwards, or how Tsuru was walking awkwardly to avoid getting chub-rub on her thighs.

“Sooo, how are we today?” The heavyweight nurse greeted with her trademark warm motherly smile.

“Alright… I guess…” Futaba replied, her voice a little more despondent than usual, and her eyes flitting down towards the buttons around her chest, stretched quite tight over the white undershirt.

The other two kinda nodded along. Jocelyn could hazard a guess as to what was going on, but she wanted to be sure.

“Now, you are in here for your first routine health-check to make sure your medication isn’t causing you any problems… are any of you suffering side effects?”

Hazel mumbled something.

“I’m sorry dear, I couldn’t quite catch that.” Jocelyn asked politely.

“She said we’re getting fat!” Futaba snapped.

The African-American woman jumped what little she could from the outburst. “Riiight, so this weight gain is not normal for any of you?”

“I’ve never been fat in my life!” Tsuru snapped.

“I just have to be sure,” the nurse replied, jotting it down in her y-pad. “If that is the case, do you all mind getting up on the scales?”

One by one, each girl got up and weighed themselves on the scales by Jocelyn’s left wall, each result being read-out by the worryingly-cheerful voice. As they came though, Jocelyn wrote each result down on her pad.

Futaba: 133 pounds

Tsuru: 128 pounds

Hazel: 127.5 pounds

Thanks to the original data sheets, Jocelyn knew that each girl had put on roughly about fourteen pounds, with Hazel creeping up a little more with fifteen and a half. For just two weeks that was astonishing, it seems the stimulant had increased their appetite and neutralized their metabolism enough that they were putting on roughly a pound a day!

Nevertheless, she had a façade to keep up. “Don’t worry Tsuru, you’re not fat. A hint of chubby perhaps, but nothing a bit of diet and exercise wouldn’t solve.” Jocelyn comforted, knowing full well that nothing in the school grounds was remotely healthy enough to help anyone lose weight here.

Once they were sat back down in front of her, Jocelyn tried to do a little more probing. “Any other side effects you might be having?” She asked, “Don’t worry if it’s a bit embarrassing, just us girls in here!”

The result was a resounding no; that was good, meant the chemical was doing its job right on target.

“Well, if there is nothing to report, than I can let you all get back to class then! Just to make sure nothing develops though, I will ask you come and see me again. Perhaps three weeks this time?” Jocelyn pulled that number out of thin air, she didn’t want to say two weeks again in-case the girls thought it seemed a bit odd. “Don’t want you losing too much study time if you keep coming down to my neck of the woods too often.”

---


“A pound a day you say?” Dr Schwartz remarked as she contemplated the results.

“About that, one of them seems to be slightly above the curve.” Jocelyn explained.

The blue-haired woman scratched her chin, “Interesting, we will want to keep a closer eye on that one.” Dr Schwartz then made a sucking motion through her teeth; “But if I am honest Frau Rose, I was expecting more. Yeng put a lot of money into obtaining this chemical, we were hoping it was something special.”

Jocelyn’s left eyebrow rose. “A pound a day in excess fat isn’t exceptional?”

“Hohoho…” The doctor chuckled, “My dear, if you knew what Yeng had stored in its vaults, you would have to redefine your definition of exceptional.” The plump woman leaned back, “But I am nothing if not patient, perhaps it takes a while to take full effect. But if we don’t start seeing results relative to what was spent on this sample, we might have to double their dose.”

Jocelyn thanked the doctor and began to leave. What was so special about this chemical that made it so pricey to get hold of? What were the kind of effects Dr Schwartz was looking for? Surely she didn't expect the girls to just blow up into humongous heifers instantly? And what kind of side effects would a creepy psycho doc like her deem unacceptable?

Little did she know, Jocelyn would soon be finding out…
132312331.title: Check-up time

choices: Hazel's side effects run their course...
Futaba is next to starting feeling side-effects, and they are quite different...
Tsuru is next to starting feeling side-effects, and they are quite different...
1323123313.content:
Hazel’s slight edge over her fellow test-subjects was no mere one off, it was a subtle sign that the long-mentioned side effects of the chemical compound were starting to take effect in her first. Perhaps it was the nature of that side effect? Perhaps Hazel’s constantly high stress levels set it off prematurely? Whatever the causality was, Hazel was about to feel very different.

Her weight gain may have only been a stats change to Jocelyn, but to Tsuru and Futaba it was visible; Hazel had developed a serious snacking habit. She ate the same at lunch dinner and breakfast, but during the time between classes, it seemed that Hazel couldn’t go without nibbling on something. Their new friend Amy didn’t seem to notice, but that might have been the distraction from her own snacking at work.

Then one morning, things started to get really strange…


***


Tsuru and Futaba were already up; the former going over her notes for the lessons ahead, and the latter making sure her hair was flicked just the right way, when they heard a yelp.

“Guys! Little help!”

Out of her bedroom wandered Hazel, halfway through her uniform, unfortunately literally.

“I think my clothes have shrunk or something!” Hazel squeaked, pointing at her middle. Her dorm-mates looked; Hazel’s white undershirt was looking woefully small. The material stopping only an inch onto her belly, refusing to be pulled down over the round mass in the middle.

“I thought that was just an urban legend…?” Futaba commented.

“Because it is.” Tsuru replied sharply. The studious girl then took a minute to look over the situation, investigating the material in detail. “If your clothes shrank Hazel, then why do your arms fit so well?”

Hazel pulled at the material, Tsuru was right, it did fit.

The long-haired girl’s investigation continued, looking at some angry red stretch-marks that were running up the sides of Hazel’s stomach. She knew Hazel had been getting fat lately (hell, they all were), but none of them were sporting something like this.

As Tsuru lightly placed a finger on one of the markings, there was a sudden lurch and she swore that Hazel’s skin swelled outwards all of a sudden. Not to mention, the stretchmarks turned an even brighter shade of red.

“Eeeee!” Hazel screamed. “It moved!”

That was worrying.

“I’m blowing up!” Hazel continued to weep, as Tsuru stood back to her full height.

“We need to see the nurse, now.” She remarked.

“What about Nurse Jocelyn?” Futaba suggested. “We were supposed to report to her if we noticed any side effects, right?”

Everyone agreed, and grabbed their keycards to head straight for the boulder-shaped-woman’s office.

As they ran, Tsuru had a thought, it seemed weird for Hazel to have such a delayed reaction to the medicine. Plus, shouldn’t the swelling be happening where she was injected, not in her middle?


***


Thankfully Jocelyn was able to help. Hazel was quickly moved to the schools better equipped medical facilities, where she was looked after in the best of care. But once Hazel had been pronounced stable, and there was no real danger to her health, Jocelyn had some questions, and there was only one woman who had all the answers.

“Hello herr Rose, how may I help you?” Dr Schwartz greeted, as if nothing in the world was wrong.

“I think you know…” The obese woman replied as she heaved her bulky body into one of the good doctor’s chairs.

“I have no idea as to what you might be refereink to…” The blue-haired woman replied, barely hiding her grin.

Jocelyn was not really in the mood. “A girl starts swelling like a balloon, and you don’t think I might be asking the woman who supplied the dangerous untested chemical about it?” She snapped a little more coldly than she thought in her head.

Dr Schwartz’s expression soured. “Very well; what would you like to know?”

“Firstly, what happened to Hazel?” Jocelyn asked, rolling out one chubby finger for emphasis.

“Subject C?”

“Hazel.” Jocelyn was starting to find Schwartz’s cold inhumane tone annoying now. “I at least need to know so I can treat her, should this happen again.”

“Fine. Her stomach lining has began creating new cells, it’s quite fascinating.” Schwartz seemed to look off in the distance as she spoke, her smile re-emerging. “Ze human stomach is generally the size of a fist, but Hazel’s has enlarged to several times that. Ze bloating she has been encountering is actually her stomach wall pressing against her skin.”

Jocelyn held her disgust, and continued to press on. “What of the rest of her organs? Won’t they be crushed if it keeps on growing?”

“Not at all!” Schwartz answered with a smile. “A woman’s organs can tolerate a lot of stress; during pregnancy most of a woman’s organs are shifted up into her ribcage cavity. Hazel is not that big yet, so no cause for alarm. Plus she seems to be expanding to the side, rather than just to the front or upwards.”

Jocelyn continued driving to the point. “And what would I have to prescribe?”

“Oh nothing special, but she will need to eat a lot more now, if she wants to feel full zat is.” Schwartz suggested. “So if she comes to you with hunger pangs, tell her to eat more, that will sort her out.”

“Right…” Jocelyn replied, worried as to what path Yeng (or at least the good doctor) were going down. “Now answer me, what is actually in this chemical?”

“Zat is above your pay grade.” Schwartz hand-waved.

“Then I think I need a raise... handling unknown medical emergencies wasn’t in the job description…” Jocelyn stated in a low, slightly threatening voice.

The doctor’s nose crinkled distastefully. “Fine, if you wish to know… but I am only telling you this so you can prepare a diagnosis for the subjects should more complications arise.” Schwartz took a deep breath, and explained; “When I said zis was an appetite enhancer I was telling the truth, just missing a slight detail. It was made for cattle, not humans.”

Jocelyn’s eyes bugged out of her head. Schwartz was giving animal medicine to people!?

“Do not give me zat look…” Schwartz hand-waved. “When the original product was released, some stupid girl took a bunch of it. The company had tested to see if there were side-effects in humans if they ate beef that had taken the stimulant, but not if someone guzzled down the damn stuff raw!”

“Was the girl ok?” Jocelyn asked.

“Eventually…” Helen teased. “But you should have seen her right before the doctors had a look at her, what a mess. But I would have given anything to have been able to study her at ze time… but oh well. After the incident, the company recalled all versions of that product to destroy them, and then released a safer version later, which was also much weaker.”

“I can tell there is a but coming…” Jocelyn added.

“Correct! Not all of the formula was destroyed, very little remained and turned up on the black market. Which is where Yeng acquired it, through several other proxies of course. The stimulant was incredibly powerful, and if we can create one without the… intense side-effects that girl inflicted on herself, then we stand to repay the price we paid many times over.”

“So what, I need to be looing out if those students start eating grass or mooing?” Jocelyn remarked, not really joking.

“Mmmm, somezing like zat.” Helen replied with a wink. “Now, if you don’t mind, I have a lot of work to do with these test results…”

With that, Jocelyn slowly got up to leave, none of this was sitting right with her, but with the kind of creepy stuff Helen had just revealed, she didn’t exactly feel safe backing out now.


***


Meanwhile; Tsuru and Futaba were happy to have their best friend back safe and sound. Hazel had been given both the all-clear and a new uniform tailored for her bloated mid-section.

Amy had texted them, suggesting they celebrate their friend’s return with a big meal… and Hazel was very quick to say yes to that…

choices: These were all luxurious self contained apartments, score!
Lauren was on a floor with a mix of Buttercombe students
Wait a minute, Lauren is amongst all the staff residencies?
1323312.content:
Lauren Garner was a princess through and through.
Between being an only child, getting mercilessly doted upon by her parents and a natural ability to wrap her peers around her finger, Lauren rarely had to suffer even the slightest indignation be it real or perceived by the youngster.

Even as she barrelled through the mountains in her parent purchased Mercedes en route to her latest residency in the form of one Buttercombe Academy the silver haired girl indulged herself in loud music whilst picking away at a bag of fries forming the last remnants of a drive through pit stop.

Not all was quite so peachy for the college student though...

*****

“Lauren, you are going to have to pick up your grades otherwise you’re going to have to drop out of college” announced her college tutor with a hint of disgruntled tone as he pressed his finger tips together.

“What? But I’m doing so well!” complained Lauren, subconsciously pushing her cleavage together in a move she often dropped with guys to throw their attention off or to carry favour.
Despite her life of luxury, Lauren’s academic ability never did compare with the wealth of money her parents had spent on her education and, now she was in an environment that wasn’t so cheaply influenced, the cracks were starting to show.

By no means was Lauren lacking intelligence, rather she lacked application or any kind of drive to apply herself properly.

“Well that’s not strictly true Lauren but you can fix things yet” mused her tutor, brow creases easing slightly as he flicked through a scattering of paperwork before him.
“Everybody always tells me you have a strong compassion for people and a willingness to help, occasionally at the cost of your own academic progress...ahem...so I’ve come up with some ideas to channel that ability”

*****

A long and frankly boring conversation transpired but eventually it was decided that Lauren would offer her services as a T/PA at Buttercombe to gain some extra credit and she was quite excited.

The drive had been long and she had had to make a number of stops, mostly for food, but finally she was making the last climb to her newest venture.

Everyone she had spoken to on the lead up to her arrival seemed very friendly so the young college student couldn’t ask for much more.

“I love this song!” cheered Lauren as she cranked the volume, taking one last corner to the sound of Little Mix as the heights of Buttercombe Academy pierced the sky before her.

*****

Navigating the academy grounds, Lauren finally found her way to the visitor parking she had been directed to in order to partake in her orientation meeting, allowing her car to crawl to a halt before knocking the engine off and taking a deep breath.

“This is it girl” whispered Lauren to herself “make yourself proud”

With one last deep breath Lauren swung her door open and stepped from her Mercedes, the suspension groaning slightly as her full figured frame departed the driving seat.

Lauren cut quite the hourglass shape that had expanded in just one year of college life and assisted by an unbridled appetite befitting of her addictive personality.
With a snug pair of high waisted jeans hugging her thighs and wide bum/hip combo as well as the full bulge of concealed tummy Lauren looked bottom heavy to say the least as her thighs rubbed together with each heeled boot step.
Her top half certainly kept up with her bottom though as a plump bosom strained her top a smidge too much as a slither of chubby stomach poked out between her short top and jeans.

Her figure had certainly worked in her favour at college to garner a huge helping of the attention she craved even as she befell the freshmen 15 and then some.
Her natural curves aside though, Lauren possessed the kind of beauty that just hooked people from her piercing blue eyes to the shapely lips beneath her button nose combined with cheeks just chubby enough to not look gaunt even before her college calorie intake.
Combined with a flirtatious nature and tendency to exhibit herself in all the right ways, Lauren was the full package that only helped to fuel her need for attention.

It did cross her mind that she would be without her friends for a great deal of time but there was always social media to stay in touch and she was confident she would develop a new circle of adoration.

As she strode from her car to the reception building Lauren began to notice people milling around her, some students and some staff, and a familiar warmth bubbled inside the grey haired student.

‘I could get used to this place’ Lauren thought as she entered the intricate double doors to her next adventure.

*****

“Well yes Miss Garner, you’re all set on our records here” gushed the bulbous receptionist, a radiant smile bursting through chubby cheeks “I can see here too that your welcome pack is already set in your residence and it includes instructions for your first assignment as a T/PA”

“Great!” cheered Lauren, her spirits elevating just from the happy presence before her.
As her tutor had rightly identified, Lauren was enthusiastic to a fault even if her motivation and direction failed her sometimes but she had an energy right now.

“Let’s get you sorted with a key then and you can concentrate on settling yourself in” smiled the receptionist as she awkwardly pushed herself from her office chair.

Lauren couldn’t help but, rather hypocritically, smirk at the tight squeeze the buttery woman before her had to remove her rump from her chair but the notion was intended harmlessly.
Again, Lauren lacked motivation not intelligence but her own princess complex afforded her a slight naivety to her own weight gain whilst she garnered that all important attention.

Ok here we...huff...go Miss Garner” announced the receptionist, posting a single key through to Lauren who swiped it up eagerly, taking a moment to cautiously tug on her shirt in a futile attempt to cover her plush middle “just straight ahead down that corridor, take a right and then up a floor in the elevator and you’ll find your way from there”

“Thank you so much!” purred Lauren politely as ever as she turned on her heels and made to follow the directions she had just been given.
She would come get her bags later but first things first was to find her room.

*****

With little effort with the clear instructions Lauren easily found the floor she was on and made her way down the corridor to find her room which came with its own realisation...

Before she can be let loose, Fuschia must pass her assistant training
Fuschia’s first charge is a familiar face from her student days
13233131.content:
‘Damn this place is a dive still’ Fuschia internally grunted as she flicked her smoldering fag butt vaguely in the direction of a bin as she ascended the stone steps leading into her former school-come-prison.

Truth be told, her school life hadn’t been so terrible in the grand scheme of things but her identity had been squashed to a near nonexistent smear left only to weekends and holidays back home.

Fortunately, those days were now behind the metal head as she threw open the double wide front doors and, as the school themselves had asked her to come back, Fuschia would be damned if she was going to stop being herself again for that poxy reason.

With great stomping strides of leather and pewter clad platform boots, Fuschia strode through the familiar corridors filled with gaggles of students going about their academic lives. The memories came pouring back as Fuschia continued to stomp through the gradually parting sea of younger, and generally fatter, girls all dressed in yellow as the frightened looks of intimidation met Fuschia’s own stern, unyielding face.

Dressed head to toe in black, Fuschia couldn’t have been in greater contrast to the brightly dressed girls with her shoulder length black hair, a tattered and long-faded band shirt with holes showing her trim midriff and black bra, and the leggings enclosing her legs and plump rear.
To add to her intimidating air Fuschia also sported a lip ring that she often chewed for a multitude of emotions alongside her jet black lips, a nose ring through the left side of her button nose and a collection of tattoos spreading her svelte body from her wrists to her ankles with her limbs and back taking a share of her ink collection.

As she made her way through the halls towards Dr Hinamizawa’s office, a place she had been a couple of times during her school life, students continued to part before her; some subconsciously, some out of fearful respect for the dark girl approaching them and, rather proudly, one backed away in tears following a particularly vicious sneer.

‘The doctor better have a good excuse for bringing me back to this stupid place’ groaned Fuschia as a familiar smell of cafeteria wafted to meet her.

*****

*knock knock knock*

“Come in” mused Dr Hinamizawa, not looking up from a diary she had before her.

“Sup doc” harped Fuschia as she slid through the door and, without invite, practically threw herself into a high-backed mahogany chair opposite the doctor whilst swinging her legs up in one smooth motion allowing her heavy boots to land loudly on the broad desk between the former student and her vice principal.

“Ahh, Miss Sinclair” announced Hinamizawa as she looked up from her work, managing to bite back a harsh telling off aimed at the boots level with her eyes “it’s...good to see you again, how are you keeping?”

“Not so bad” shrugged Fuschia, picking her teeth with her tongue “saw a few killer shows last month and got a new tattoo behind a merch stand so can’t complain”

This was not the kind of person that Hinamizawa made a habit of spending time with but needs must.
“Lovely dear” forced the doctor out of politeness.

Fuschia smirked sensing the Vice Principal’s discomfort.
It had become a favourite past time of hers to garishly flex her alternative lifestyle in front of ‘normies’ just to watch them squirm and this was no different.

“Anyway, I’m sure you’re curious as to why you’ve been summoned back to your alma mater” continued Hinamizawa as professionally as she could manage as a want of smoke permeated from Fuschia from across the desk.

Fuschia simply nodded as she idly glanced at her black finger nails, fiddling with a ornate silver skull ring around her right forefinger.

“Well, we would be honoured if you would be willing to rejoin us here at Buttercombe as part of our new Teaching/Personal Assistant scheme”

Although the basics had been outlined in the letter she had received, hearing the actual words did half Fuschia in her fiddling.
‘Why the hell would they want ME to be an assistant to anyone?’

“I’ll take your silence as consideration” smirked Hinamizawa before continuing “you would be assigned to either a teacher or a student and basically assist them in anyway that they may require”

“Ok doc, let me stop you there” interjected Fuschia, swinging her legs back down to the ground in order to lean towards her superior “I’m gonna guess something has gone a little wrong here because I am not the girl you want helping anyone, I barely made it out of here for starters”

“Oh Fuschia, you are a hoot” smiled the doctor with an almost sickly laugh “truthfully, you were picked by our high tech algorithms based specifically on your personal traits and academic achievements”

‘Pfft, doubt that’ thought Fuschia.

“Ok, but all of the students are shit...sorry...terrified of me, a girl literally cried as I passed her today” responded Fuschia, even more confused now than when she first arrived.

“I doubt that, I’m sure she was just...crying over something else” placated Hinamizawa “besides, I’m sure it would do the school good to have a former student back with us who is so outgoing with her lifestyle”

Fuschia could barely believe what she was hearing at this point, Hinamizawa really was giving her some bull squirt now.

“Look, I’m totally flattered but I don’t think this is for me, there must be some better candidates for...”

Behind Fuschia, the office door opened and a slender red-head poked her head through.

“Sorry doctor, I just wanted to let you know that the kitchens have called and want your lunch order” purred the girl at the door.

“Oh thank you Felicity, I’ll just have my usual” replied Hinamizawa with a smile “can I get you anything whilst you’re here Fuschia?”

“Oh no, I think I’ll be heading off soon so...” tried Fuschia before being cut off.

“Nonsense, you always were a fan of our cheeseburgers if I remember rightly? Felicity, a cheeseburger for Fuschia here please”

“Absolutely” smiled Felicity before ducking back out.

‘That was a little weird that she remembers I like cheeseburgers...’ thought Fuschia as the door clicked shut.

*****

“Mhm, this is definitely as delicious as I remember doc” mused Fuschia around a mouthful of cheeseburger as she clumsily wiped her lips with the back of her hand.

“Glad it’s gone down so well” smiled Hinamizawa as she far more delicately dabbed at the corner of her mouth with a napkin she had pulled from her desk.

Fuschia smiled as she swallowed the last of her meal and slid her plate onto the desk in front of her.

“So, where do we stand on my proposition now? We really would love to have you be a part of our team”

Fuschia internally groaned as the question resumed, she really didn’t want to do this stupid job. If nothing else it sounded like a lot of work and Fuschia really didn’t need that in her life.

“Look, I can see you still have some reservations so what about this” proposed Hinamizawa “you can stay here for a month or two and see how you fit back in, we’ll try you out with some basic duties and then take things from there, no obligations at the end”

“Hmm, I don’t know...” sighed Fuschia, still not sold on the idea. She had a lot of shows coming up and she was pretty sure this time she would finally finish her Slipknot signature collection.

“We do already have somebody lined up who is very keen to work with you if that helps” suggested Hinamizawa, elbows on her desk with fingers clasped together under her chin now.

Fuschia sighed heavily, her lunch sitting a little heavy now that it had settled combined with the very pushy doctor, this really was the last thing she expected to come out of her life two years after leaving Buttercombe...
Mind you, her parents were sick of giving her a free pass (or so they said) and there were worse places to mooch from than her old school...
Oh, what was the harm.

*****

“I’m very pleased to hear you will be joining us Fuschia, I’ll be in touch shortly to get you fully inducted back into the school and we can take things from there” smiled Hinamizawa with a hand on the small of the metal head’s back, just north of the curve of her ass.

“No problem...I guess” muttered Fuschia as she made for the door to leave.

“Oh, and don’t forget your keys” purred the doctor as she produced a small set of keys and placed them into Fuschia’s dainty, ring filled hand.

“Thanks”

‘Jeez, still don’t get why I’m here’ moaned Fuschia as she left the office ready to start the next chapter of her life, oblivious of the wide grin adorning the doctors face behind her.

info.description:
—WELCOME BACK TO BUTTERCOMBE ACADEMY—

This is a story about various characters of various ages gaining weight. Though we strive to make the storytelling experience as diverse and enriching as possible, the main goal behind most every story line is to satisfy a fetish based around weight gain. If the thought of women of varying ages getting fat offends you, personally morally or otherwise, then I'd suggest turning back now.

Moving on with that same spirit in mind, this is a story about female weight gain. No boys allowed! Male characters are allowed to appear off-campus, but they are not permitted to be the main focus of any story line. The minimum age requirement is 15 years old. While this interactive is designed to be less restrictive creatively than its predecessor, the basic spirit remains the same. No exponential weight gains in the blink of an eye, no magic potions that make characters fat, so on. There will be odder, stranger, topics explored in this setting, but we're going for quality storytelling here!

With that in mind, I implore you to add. Please, add! This is an entirely community-driven interactive, capitalizing on years of storytelling throughout my portfolio from lots of authors just like you! As long as you follow the rules and do your best, I'll be happy to host your chapters.

Now then, I hope you enjoy your return to Buttercombe Academy. You might find it a bit different from when you last left it...


*



—INTRODUCTION—

For those of you unaware, this interactive serves as a direct sequel to Buttercombe Academy, one of the largest and most popular interactive stories on this website. That being said, it also involves plot threads and story lines that have premiered in other interactives from my portfolio as well. Listed below is a small bibliography of involved works that this interactive is layered atop.
Reading them is not essential, but it might enrich your Buttercombe Academy experience!

Buttercombe Academy for Growing Girls  [E]
#1856959

a quality-controlled interactive about life in a pudgy prep school
by Bobo the Hobo (83)

follow Mel in her attempts to go from big, to bigger, to biggest!
by Bobo the Hobo (83)

#2072923

Dakota moves to a new town, where she finds herself and her friends getting bigger...
by Bobo the Hobo (83)

 
Packing on Pounds: the Piper Black Story  [E]
#2141026

Piper porks out into her own weight gain interactive!
by Bobo the Hobo (83)

 
Young & Hungry: the Zack and Alice Story  [E]
#2091444

two young lovebirds who may find themselves growing together in more ways than one...
by Bobo the Hobo (83)


This interactive takes place 15 years after the beginning of the original interactive. And in that time a lot of things have changed!
The staff has seen a lot of shifting around, there have been many new classes of students to wander the halls, and a partnership with the enigmatic mega corporation, Yeng, has finally put an end to budgeting issues.
Things have changed for Buttercombe Academy alright, but folks always seem to come out bigger than when they came in!



*



—YENG & YOU—

Since its debut in the States, the Yeng Corporation has grown immensely. In just 15 years it has become a name synonymous with progress, ingenuity, and innovation. They produce any number of products designed for the comfort and efficiency of their busy clientele. They provide appliances, electronics, and even their new pharmaceuticals to the school in exchange for detailed and important data on how the lives of the faculty, staff and student body are enriched.

However, not all is as it seems with the seemingly benevolent megacorp. Since their involvement in the school some time ago, the average size of the student body has increased exponentially. The pandering devices and coddling technologies they pad Buttercombe Academy with are enough, but those who find themselves directly under their microscope may have a hard time fitting into their uniforms than anyone else...

Whether or not you choose to peel back the layers of the Yeng Corp. conspiracy are entirely up to you. However, some characters will be rooted firmly in this story line.

*


—ALL-NEW & IMPROVED SSS PROGRAM—

One of the many improvements that the Yeng Corporation has been working on since the inception of their partnership with Buttercombe Academy is some greatly needed changes to the SSS program. Previously known as the Special Services for Students program, the name has now been changed to Special Services for Stipendiaries program, to better reflect an emphasis on helping everyone. That means Teachers & Faculty are now eligible for SSS!

If you have any questions about the program or are curious as to whether or not your character becomes eligible for one of the leveled tiers and any accommodations that might bring, please consult this helpful guide!

 the SSS Brochure  [E]
#2171376

a world-building guide for those with questions regarding SSS!
by Bobo the Hobo (83)



*



—WHAT IF? CHAPTERS—

A carryover from the previous interactive that will be implemented as the story grows is the aspect of "What If?"

When you see the phrase What If? before a chapter option, that's your cue to stray off of the beaten path. Sometimes these choices involve something character based like weight, sexual orientation, or off-the-wall interactions, and sometimes they're story-based like, what if the least expected thing were to happen.

You're of course free to create your own What If? scenarios! However, I'd recommend going lightly! Too much of a good thing turns into a really lame storytelling device!


*



If you find yourself itching to add to a story line, but don't have any clue as to where to begin, let me know! I'm happy to facilitate additions to this story. In that same spirit, if you require an edit to something you've posted, or perhaps want me to alter a chapter choice option so that it better fits the story line that you want to create, send me an e-mail! It takes me like, five seconds to do it and I'm happy to do so as long as it helps keep the story going!

ENJOY YOUR RETURN TO BUTTERCOMBE ACADEMY
